comments: Repetitive game that requires a lot of thinking. Quite addictive as I've been playing for nearly year and half now. I didn't spend a penny on game but quite a lot of time. Its very difficult to be very good without spending real cash but it's possible. You can watch adverts for coins, so be patient and play. The more you play the more you get. You don't need top characters to have great team - you can create great team with average characters if you focus on weapons. Get yourself into a good team, hit faction's minimums and you'll become great.

There are good and bad aspects of this game, but the pros out weigh the cons. You can absolutely level up incredibly high without spending a single penny on this game. You just need patience. One of the funniest aspects of this game is its long term playability. There is always something to do every day and in the long run it all adds up to your benefit.  My only complaint is the pop up windows when you first get on. They show you you've been raided...then you have the notification that you have to check that gives you the same info. If the pop up already gives me the info, why do I still have notifications?

Rubbish repetitive game. After spending ten's of thousands pointlessly I can tell you honestly... don't waste your time or money. It's a very addictive cash cow and just a very smart way to take your money and keep you hooked. Scopely has repeatedly lied and will continue to do so. You have been warned

Ive been playing this for 2 years, love it but support is well below standard. I have a problem just now where it crashes every 5 mins and support do nothing. Its become unplayable. Avoid if you have a samsung device

The game has slowly been turning more p2w than ever before. Before 6 stars had come into play, you could easily get any 5 stars. Even some p2w toons were able to be accessed later on in some events. With 6 stars, this really isn't the case. This has also caused the Road to Survival community to become more toxic and started making the game unfair/not fun for other players.

I like the strategy involved in playing the game. The only thing I think I would change is when you kill an enemy and he comes back to life,  they should come back as a zombie. .not keep all their ability before death. .otherwise it keeps you interested.

descriptionHTML:
The Walking Dead Road to Survival is the definitive Walking Dead strategy RPG game, brought to you by Robert Kirkman, creator of The Walking Dead comic series.

Build your team of Survivors and develop battle strategies to lead them into battle in an uncompromising story, fraught with danger. Fight for survival against walkers and humans alike, using strategy to attack enemy weak points and deep RPG progression to decide your path. Build a town to keep the walkers at bay, but be warned – The horrors that lurk outside aren’t the only threat, and your decisions are all that stand between life and death.

Based on an all-new story from award-winning Walking Dead writer Jay Bonansinga, the dark aesthetic of this game reflects the uncompromising decisions you will need to make as you strategize for survival.

Stand with Michonne, Rick and other survivors from The Walking Dead, and join the epic battle against the darkest enemies from the Governor to Negan.

THE WALKING DEAD: ROAD TO SURVIVAL FEATURES:

Fight Walkers & Survivors
• Battle against fierce opponents and use your best strategy to survive
• Headshot! Land critical hits and deal crippling blows to your enemies
• Charge opponents with special melee and ranged attacks using deadly weapons like Michonne’s katana

Collect & Recruit Survivors
• Collect new Survivors from The Walking Dead universe, each with their own specialized battle strategy

Upgrade Your Survivors
• Level up and customize Survivors to enhance their fighting strategies, weapons and skills
• RPG progression makes your Survivors stronger as they cut down more walkers

Strategy Gameplay - Capitalize on Strengths & Exploit Weaknesses
• Battle strategy is key to scoring powerful hits – but watch out for retaliating strikes
• Your battle strategy is all that’s keeping the Survivors of Woodbury safe – Strategize and strike to win

Maps & Locations From The Walking Dead
• Explore a new 3D map featuring real locations from The Walking Dead comics

Build your Community Base & Expand into the Wasteland
• Build houses to hold Survivors, a Town Hall to expand your city, a Workshop to craft items, and more

PvP - Raid Enemies
• Use your battle strategy to raid enemy factions for resources in the All Out War online mode
• Strategic Multiplayer battles in a wide-open world filled with potential enemies and vicious walkers.

Alliance Factions & Online Strategy
• Multiplayer alliances and battle strategies keep you safe. Join allies in a faction to create a battle strategy and pool resources in the harsh world of The Walking Dead
• Battle and build together with friends in multiplayer role-playing strategy gameplay

Battle in Iconic The Walking Dead Locations
• Fight alongside your faction for control of areas from The Walking Dead
• Battle to conquer and defend locations like Alexandria, Woodbury, Sanctuary, and more

Make Strategized Decisions to Change the Story
• Decisions impact the story mode and make each game campaign unique
• Write your own Survivor story in this dynamic and compelling Walking Dead RPG

Live In-Game Events
• Play to obtain valuable resources and new, exclusive Survivors.

Walkers tear at your city walls, while desperate Survivors rip apart the town’s foundations from the inside. When the time comes to fight, what will you choose?

One way to check how much products I have left is by touching the machine and thr corresponding product but sometimes the game will assume  that you are putting the product into production hence it will put the product into production whether you want it or not so it will waste production time. They took 50 from my husband and only refunded him 30!! Super cell is ripping players off!!

I buy an axe it will last forever same thing with other tools but here I have to keep buying tools to do the job. An if I need more crop I get the land ready for more seeding get the water. This you have to bring in more people that never show up to do the work. That's why if I'm going to farm I count on one person me. Here you need others. It not for me.

Love this game. My mom and I play it 24/7. It's addicting. Annnd it's a great time killer. Just like everyone else there are things that I would suggest to improve the game. Like for example the time frame for waiting on items. Crazyyyy long. Like the fish nets are like 14hrs! Could drop all the high times to half. That would be cool. But of course if you guys did that then it would be super easy to level up. And you guys would loose out on money cause there are some impatience people out there that just go ahead and buy diamonds and such. Anywho. Love the game. Please consider some of these people's suggestions. Thank you. #HayDayFan

Long time player returning to the game after taking a break. I leveled up to level 41 today. Before leveling up it showed I should get 1 white and 1 black rabbit with the new level but I didn't get either of them. I would also like to see it a bit easier to get wildlife refuge animals. 36 puzzle pieces seems a bit much.

descriptionHTML:
Best. Farm. Ever. Welcome to Hay Day, the most popular farming game on mobiles and tablets, number one in 122 countries.

Learn the lay of the land, tend to your crops, and trade goods with neighbors and friends. It’s a real special place where the crops never die even though it never rains. Sharing the farm with our quirky animals only makes things more fun!

PLEASE NOTE! Hay Day is free to download and install. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.

~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~
♥ Grow and customize your farm
♥ Trade crops and fresh goods with neighbors and friends through your very own roadside shop
♥ Fulfill orders with your truck and even by steamboat
♥ Repair your dock and cast your lure to fish the waters
♥ Build your own town and welcome visitors

~~~~~~~~~~~
MEDIA MENTIONS
~~~~~~~~~~~

Hay Day‘s presentation is fairly cinematic for a mobile game. It’s eye candy. [...] If you’re a fan of simulation games, Hay Day is visually pleasing and will definitely keep your inner agriculturalist giddy for hours

http://www.gamezebo.com/2012/07/03/hay-day-review/

Watching your crops grow and your twee factories spew out products is a quietly pleasing experience.

http://www.pocketgamer.co.uk/r/Multiformat/Hay+Day/review.asp?c=42764

~~~~~~~~~~~
PLAYER REVIEWS
~~~~~~~~~~~

Hay Day is very proud to announce over 5 million five star reviews on Google Play!

~~~~~~~~~~
SUPPORT
~~~~~~~~~~

Neighbor, are you having problems? Visit https://supercell.helpshift.com/a/hay-day/?l=en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Hay Day is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age.

description: Bubble Witch 3 Saga ‚Äì A magical bubble shooting puzzle game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga.The newest game in the popular Bubble Witch series. Stella the Witch is back and she needs your help to defeat Wilbur in this exciting puzzle blasting adventure! Wilbur may look cute, but he's full of magical mischief! Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game.Help Stella, Nero and Violet restore piece to the realm by matching bubbles with the unique aiming line that allows you and Stella to blast and pop with magical precision! Solve the puzzles to reunite the ghosts, save the owls and rescue the important fairy queen in this explosive bubble shooting adventure. Cast spells and power ups with Nero and blast your way through those extra tough levels to keep up with the mischievous Wilbur!Blast! Stella needs to rebuild her home all thanks to the evil Wilbur. Take aim and pop your way through the levels to find the magic star dust Stella needs in order to rebuild, customize and style her new home!The only bubble shooter you will ever need! Take on this magical Saga alone or pop with friends, burst their bubble by setting an all new high-score.Bubble Witch 3 Saga features: ‚Ä¢ Match 3 bubbles to pop them in this magical puzzle shooting adventure ‚Ä¢ Spellbinding game modes and cute characters!‚Ä¢ Release the owls, free the ghosts and save the Fairy Queen from Wilbur!‚Ä¢ Rebuild Stella‚Äôs house and visit your friends to get rewards ‚Ä¢ Special boosters to help you pass those tricky levels‚Ä¢ Easily sync the game between devices when connected to the Internet‚Ä¢ Leader boards to watch your friends and competitors!‚Ä¢ A free & easy to play bubble shooter, challenging to master! ‚Ä¢ Available to play on Android phone and tablet devicesBubble Witch 3 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!Follow us to get news and updates:https://www.facebook.com/bubblewitch3sagahttp://www.youtube.com/c/Bubble_Witchhttps://www.instagram.com/bubblewitchsagaofficial/http://www.twitter.com/Bubble_WitchStart the bubble bursting experience today!Have fun playing Bubble Witch 3 Saga!
descriptionHTML:
Bubble Witch 3 Saga – A magical bubble shooting puzzle game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga.

The newest game in the popular Bubble Witch series. Stella the Witch is back and she needs your help to defeat Wilbur in this exciting puzzle blasting adventure! Wilbur may look cute, but he's full of magical mischief! Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game.

Help Stella, Nero and Violet restore piece to the realm by matching bubbles with the unique aiming line that allows you and Stella to blast and pop with magical precision! Solve the puzzles to reunite the ghosts, save the owls and rescue the important fairy queen in this explosive bubble shooting adventure. Cast spells and power ups with Nero and blast your way through those extra tough levels to keep up with the mischievous Wilbur!

Blast! Stella needs to rebuild her home all thanks to the evil Wilbur. Take aim and pop your way through the levels to find the magic star dust Stella needs in order to rebuild, customize and style her new home!

The only bubble shooter you will ever need! Take on this magical Saga alone or pop with friends, burst their bubble by setting an all new high-score.

Bubble Witch 3 Saga features:
• Match 3 bubbles to pop them in this magical puzzle shooting adventure
• Spellbinding game modes and cute characters!
• Release the owls, free the ghosts and save the Fairy Queen from Wilbur!
• Rebuild Stella’s house and visit your friends to get rewards
• Special boosters to help you pass those tricky levels
• Easily sync the game between devices when connected to the Internet
• Leader boards to watch your friends and competitors!
• A free & easy to play bubble shooter, challenging to master!
• Available to play on Android phone and tablet devices

Bubble Witch 3 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.
You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates:
https://www.facebook.com/bubblewitch3saga
http://www.youtube.com/c/Bubble_Witch
https://www.instagram.com/bubblewitchsagaofficial/
http://www.twitter.com/Bubble_Witch

Start the bubble bursting experience today!

Have fun playing Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

Not a great game. Played for half the day. Game will no longer start and tells me to make sure I'm connected to the net. Oh I'm really that dumb. World chat is more like a dating site and is not child friendly. The admins do nothing to stop the behaviour in world chat. I strongly advise you not to allow your kids anywhere near this game

If your hobby is watching paint dry this is the game for you. This game is entirely too time consuming for anyone with a real life. Which I guess is why no one is here for the game . Everyone playing is here to get credits in another game .  Which is why this game has so many downloads  not because it's actually good. The over-sexualized comments in the chat rooms are ridiculous. Parents if you are reading this I would not allow my child to play this game unless you are going to sit with them every moment. If you have to do that is it even really worth allowing your child to play the game.

I just downloaded the game to rate it... enjoy my one star review lazy jerks... rate this a one star and download clash of clans.

They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

comments: Castle Clash I love the game so much..feel like a blast..Since I played this so much better have daily sign-in and free gemsüòäi wonder if you could add more Hero And Upgrade All To Level Maximum To 500..Please Up More Level Until Level 500 heroüòäSo Addicted..

I really love this game, i've been playing it for nerely 5 years now and although it can be hard to progress without paying money it is possible. I am free to play which can make it hard but for the people that are not willing to pay money igg is there for you, every week i can earn up to 1500 gems which is probably the reason i have yet to quit. Other than that the leveling and many heros makea the game that much better.

I up my rating to 4. After playing 5 years, this game is really fun to play. I cannot give 5 star as i still having issues with the gem price too crazy expensive. Hope igg can revise gem price back, so many player can support this game, not the rich guy only. I believe you guys has realise many p2p player already quit, so better to revise the germ price again. Overall, i love this game^^

Decided to edit my review to clear things up for people that says this is a money making scheme etc. To the people that say that, do u understand that this game is Free? The devs spend a ton of money making a game enjoyable for people, adding new content such as, new heroes, new events, new upgrading features etc. It's only normal to lock some heroes behind a paid service, and the heroes behind the pay wall isn't even game changing or op. U don't have to spend a cent on this game to make progress. Rolling heroes takes time but it's so rewarding when u get that one hero u were looking for. This is a great game and if u complain about ingame purchases for a game so well maintained then rather go play another free game full of bugs and zero updates.

comments: I really hated this game at first, when i was trying it on a friend's phone. It has really grown on me since then, i love it. I've been playing it for years now and still love it; the graphics are amazing, the game play is smooth, my clan is great, there's always new stuff to do or new bots/weapons to acquire. Yes, there are some people playing that kinda ruin a battle for your team but Hey, it's just a game and you still get points if you lose. Do your best and have fun.

Great start! No glitches. Performs smoothly! One of the best games on Android!! Must download Belive me I have never spent a single penny of "real" money and the game has never been unfair to me. Its really very good game. They found a sweet spot to balance both paid and free players. You just need to go on playing. I got the costliest robot of the market for free. Keep playing you'll eventually be strong enough and then you'll never stop to play.

After being so long on the game I can see that the development team behind this game is pretty committed. I can see they really put effort into debugging, improving and renewing some elements of the game, I've decided to increase the star counts for War Robots (This is the original one). It's one heck of a game for mobile device I can tell you that. As for attaining the "best robots" or the "best weapons" in the game, it's hard but it's not impossible.  Just take part in the festive events... and you don't neccessarily need the "best bots" to annihilate your opponents...

Supposed random game is not random. You only win the lowest prices until you start spending gold.  Black market is the same. Also it will take you a decade before you get the best robots unless you shell out your hard earned money. I hope the drop off scheme would earn me points, however it's just for one type of robot.

This game is very much Pay to Win. So expect some people to crush you.  All the "gambling" games are fixed to make sure you get the lowest possible reward. Don't waste your gold gambling. All that said this game is worth 5 stars just for the gameplay. The graphics are amazing and the game is fun even when you end up against someone spending hundreds of real dollars on robots and gear. Be patient. You may not always win or do well but in time you can give all but the most hardcore spenders a run for their money (all pun intended)

It will be cool if we can upgrade not  just one robot but all!! And pls double the gold I rlly need it right now for just 1 orkan And also why is it so hard to get a weapons like with puzzle logo on it it's like 10,000 can you imagine that! If I made the game I would do just 6,000 or 5,000! One more make a single player like player vs AI and it will say easy medium hard
description: War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors! descriptionHTML:
War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors!

"If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won’t cost you anything." - Droid Gamers

"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it’s such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines

"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android Police

It's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!

MAIN FEATURES:
– 34 battle robots with different strengths;
– more than 30 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?
– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;
– create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;
– join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;
– complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.

Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!

Want to talk about the game or find allies?
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_Pixonic
Watch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS
Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/

Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.
Enjoy the game!

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!

Protect your empire by shooting and battling the zombie army that wants to steal your resources in Last Empire - War Z, a strategy RPG and base building war game. Build an army with other players from around the globe and plan an attack with your own zombie army! Develop your kingdom and befriend empire allies to combat both zombie and human enemies. Do you have what it takes to be the strongest commander?

Last Empire - War Z is a zombie-themed free-to-play war strategy game. Battle zombie troops and survivors to protect your empire against the upcoming zombie war. Team up with friends from around the world to build an army, increase your zombie defense strategy and participate in special events. Take part in brutal zombie warfare and build an army to grow your empire – surviving the zombie apocalypse is in your hands in Last Empire - War Z!

Last Empire - War Z Features:

Strategy War Games & Empire Defense 
*Strategy war games pit you against an endless zombie horde!
*Empire building games – Base building strategy that encourages players to work together and achieve powerful bonuses!
*Build a zombie defense strategy during in-game events and regular survivor challenges for great rewards!

Battle Zombie Troops with Alliance Members
*Battle zombie troops and other survivors during the zombie apocalypse.
*Attack zombies in real time on the world map and chat with alliance members worldwide!
*Empire allies battle with you to destroy zombie troops and other survivors to expand your empire.

Build an Army with Zombie & Human Troops
* Build an army of deadly Zombie Troops to destroy your enemies and defend your empire!
* Zombie apocalypse survivors can be recruited and upgraded with unique war skills and strategy.
* Strategy is everything. Varied Skill Trees allow players to enhance their heroes.

Build an army of zombie troops, battle to survive the zombie apocalypse, and defend your empire in Last Empire - War Z!

NOTE: Last Empire – War Z is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

Download and battle in the most exciting zombie war and base building game available today!

Good luck in this game if ya don't want to spend money. No game balancing meaning a lvl12 can attk lvl  1 with no post attk shield or protection of any kind. Got attk 12 times in a row by same player of higher lvl. Also If you have issues with game content good luck getting a good answer on that too.

Hi A.K server 52. Have been playing for couple of months now and still love the game.just when you think you are on top of things something new comes up. I personally like the challenge and new changes.for those who have not played this game before I would recommend it.  Very addictive. If you are going to spend money in this game spend wisely.
After last update, this game getting worst, score for pirate event has been reduced, and the pirate getting stronger.. fix it fast.. many player complaining about this Nick : Premi06 Server : 041

Please add more vessels like USS Carl Vinson, and enabled to play offline too. And please make no time limits to purchase for the new promotion with a cheap price such as new ships or aircrafts, when that happened I bet there will be more interesting. Thanks.

If you don't have money to burn then don't play this game. This game is the embidiment of the 'pay to win' phrase and would make EA look like a baby when it comes to that. Levels are easy to scale up in the beginning but as you cross level 10 through 20, you'd realise that without paying through your nose, you are just fodder for paying players. Don't be a sheep they'd like you to be. On top of that, the game is riddled with bugs and the developers are unresponsive, unless again you are a paying player. Do yourself a favor and Invest your time in another game.

comments: First off to all those saying too many ads, there aren't any ads. What you're seeing is game packs that can be purchased to help you advance within the game. I love the game. Everythingis great. I just wish they would give everyone time to adjust to previous items before creating something new. And also the pricingis too high. $20-$50 is fine but $99 is way too much.

This game has become a cash cow for the developers at MZ. New features are added making the game more complex and diverse weekly. Costing players money. While old features players are familiar with and depend on break down  After contacting MZ you get a nice form letter stating thank you for bringing it to there attention but they hope you understand these things take time to fix.

This game should be awesome, but the updates just come too fast now. I bought 2 packs this week and still got zeroed as soon as i dropped shield. By the time you spend 2 days clicking upgrades, someone is stronger than you and just waiting for you to try to use your new stuff.

This game was fun about two years ago before MZ started trying to milk players each month for money.  If you buy a package from them,  which ranges from $14.99 to $399.99, make sure you get what you pay for. ..many times you don't get everything they promise; especially with the BOGO packages.   MZ will do little if anything to correct the matter.  Also, even after you spend tons of money, if you wait long enough they will give you the same stuff for free to all players.   My advice...find another game to play. ..something more fun and worthwhile. ..and not sponsored by MZ.

If you want to be at top of this game then be prepared to spend more than the price of a top end BMW in one year. I am not kidding. MZ releases major game changing upgrades every day for several $99.99 packs. Then you get tge worst customer support in the industry. Terrible software quality control and business practices that mirror drug cartels.

Mz took a once decent game and ruined it.  The weekly changes are senseless change is to be gradual.  Im finally walking away.  Im done with ur bots, done with admin accts and done with daily chances.  More and more people have quit and droves more will follow.  Choke on the money u got from all  of the foolish people who actually paid.  You deserve none of it

descriptionHTML:
So begins a new tale of crystals....

A tried-and-true, yet brand new RPG！

SQUARE ENIX’s first title aimed at a worldwide audience;
a brand new FINAL FANTASY game available for smartphones!
Play an entirely new RPG made in classic FINAL FANTASY style!

Includes characters
from past FINAL FANTASY titles!

Enjoy this expansive storyline
right on your phone!

=========================================
Features

-Simple battle feature with strategy!
Easy and interactive battles! Tap the screen to attack, but combine magic abilities with tactical know-how to overpower your opponents in strategic maneuvers!Plus!
High quality CG animations of your favorite FINAL FANTASY summons!

-Search in the field and complete dungeons!
Move characters through fields and dungeons to search for items, hidden paths, and new routes to your destinations!
Talk to people in towns to receive quests. Complete them to get items, gil, and even rare items!
It's got all the many features of an RPG in an easy portable form!

- Arena PVP battles!
Fight other players and get to the top!
Take your favorite party to war against your rivals and fight for great prizes!

=========================================
Story

Visions――
The hopes and dreams of
legendary warriors given life.
 
Lapis――
A world of crystals and the visions that slumber within.

Harnessing the power of the crystals,
mankind prospered, nations flourished.
But just as day gives way to night,
that era of peace proved but a fleeting illusion.
 
Now, as their world stands on the precipice
of ruin, two young knights summon visions
to their side as they strike out on a journey
to chase the shadows.
 
So begins a new tale of crystals,
and the heroes who would save them...

comments: Used to be five stars now 1.  FIX THE DOWNLOAD ISSUE WITH THE SPRING UPDATE!   Listen to your customers and at least acknowledge that you might be working on solving the problem.  Not responding at all is horrendous customer service.  Will be deleting the game shortly if not fixed.

Sometimes I would give it a five star other times 4 star. Good number of challenge keys per visit to none challenge sites. As few as two visits needed for one visit to challenge site in final level of challenge (requiring 25keys). Love the two modes for cards of fate. No time limit but fewer tries works great if you write down what you find. It surprisingly has improved my timed play of this mini game. There are getting to be too many items and NO search functions to facilitate where to find a particular item, what collection items belong to if someone wants it and you don't want to send it anonymously (case if you send a requested item) and don't send it from the gift bar. One of the better hide and find games.

I changed my previous rating. There are so many glitches, especially with new events  and support doesn't respond to requests. I haven't gotten totem bonuses for three days and new event is nearly impossible at times to find bunnies and objects. This used to be my "go to" stress reliever but now it just creates more stress.

Instead of relaxing me this game stresses the hell out of me. New bunny location is extremely hard to find the üêá. And the time limit is too short. I know im wasting my time writing this cause I've seen a lot people complaining about it and nothing is been done. Will be unistalling if it doesn't gets fix. Good day

The main complaint is that some tasks have insanely short timers, like for the new event where you have to find optionnal stuff that's really well hidden as well as the usual pack of items that usually takes the whole timer to find. Great game, bases itself too much on money dropping.

The only thing I don't like about the game is that by the time you search a couple of places (depending on ur level) is how long you have to wait to get enough energy up to search again. Depending on what you want to search it can take up to an hour or more to get the requirements. Other than that I really like the game.

descriptionHTML:
#1 MOST POPULAR HIDDEN OBJECT GAME IN THE WORLD!

Get ready for a journey unlike any other!
Mirages of an unknown city have been seen around the world. Is it real … or a hoax? While your detective agency is busy gathering information, your friend is dragged into the phantom city by black smoke. The only one who can save him, you must now enter the strangest place you’ve ever been … where magic, witchcraft and science work together, imagination turns real and weird creatures wander the streets. All around there are people and things gaining unusual abilities and a black smoke that seems to be alive, bringing with it enigmatic artifacts, secrets and dangers.

In order to rescue your friend and solve these unexplained phenomena, you will need to fulfill risky quests, explore dungeons, research amulets and get help from friends. Unravel the many mysteries of Shadow City as you fight monsters, confront a cult and rid the city of a horrible evil!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● 41 eerie locations to search
● Over 2968 quests to complete
● 430 collections to piece together
● 33 distinctive characters to meet
● 15 monsters to battle in mini-games
● Play with your friends to fight the evil together!
● Regular free updates with loads of new content
● Google Play game services support
______________________________

COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.
______________________________

comments: To the guy that says stop bitching cuz it's free. Reviews are so they can get feedback to improve the game. What good is the game if you can only play 2 games a day? There are too many other games out there that are free that customers can get chips to play for hours. This game should take care of their loyal customers before they move on to some of the other games. So many have posted about the small amount of chips received and they added the spinning wheel, maybe by reading the reviews they are listening and trying to improve chances of getting more chips. If everyone continues to give low reviews, maybe just maybe they'll increase our chances to get more daily chips!

Purchased 90 rockets pack. Explained to me how I used all 90 in one game? Smh, that's too much.. So y'all want ppl to purchase rockets each hand. Y'all can do better. Chip packages as well. Maybe u will get more to contribute to the game. Smh, better chip packages probably will definitely help this game. Especially the price of chips to play verses what the rooms payout... Really is at a disadvantage to players to even purchase.

I usually love this game. However, today I decided to treat myself and purchase some chips to get the last two battle ships that I needed to get 800 chips. The game is so frigging rigged it's just sad. It took all 600 chips that I bought and all that I won trying to accomplish a goal.  I will NEVER purchase chips again, especially in this game.

Most of my purchases lately have been strange disappearing chips and rockets i have spent SO much  money on this game!!! and another thing i could not access any games for 2 days now but it TOOK ALL MY CHIPS AGAIN SOMETHING NEEDS TO BE DONE I HAVE ALREADY CONTACTED YOU IN REGARDS TO THIS.

Good variety of games. Not many free chips once the first few rounds are played when compared to what the rounds cost. Be ready to buy, buy, buy if you aren't patient. They have added many more chances for free chips. Thank you guys.

I love the game again.  I'd been struggling with glitches and now they're fixed  I'm especially loving the free chips you give sometimes daily!  I've become re-addicted to it!  The new format IS easier to see, but it gets slightly boring when the two cards you CAN daub don't get any numbers!  It looks as if you're phasing out the gems, which is fine with me; I'd rather have all free daubs, chips, and only a FEW coin power plays.  The free daubs make all the difference between winning and losing.  Also, would like to see winning bingos actually give me the items I need to complete rooms and for you to increase the daily chips for every completed room.

comments: Not a bad game but it's typical like some other games. It starts off with the levels being super easy, letting you build your confidence to get you thinking you're really good.  Now I understand the higher the levels the more difficulty there is but not to the point where they make it almost impossible trying to get you to buy more chances. Another words they're trying to get you to pay to win and advance not necessarily on skill level. Very sneaky. Uninstalling. It's fun for a while but overall I do not recommend.

Love this game, but it freezes up. I go to try and reinstall it after a few days but it won't let me reinstall the game. Just stays at the same  level last completed. Still having the problem of when having to reinstall I lose all my lives and charms. Love the game but hate ,owing all my lives and charms
I love this game but damn, why does the videos seem to always freeze up. I mean, don't get me wrong, it's a good game and all, so why don't you guys just fix the glitches. Thank youü§î

The update took me from level 400 back to level 1 very upset be first I wasn't getting my daily play rewards so I figured like everything else it may need to update and the update blow my whole progress. I'm so pissed is there a way to fix this?

I actually enjoyed the game and would give it four or five stars except 200 coins and multiple items were taking away simply because I got logged out if Facebook. Also several levels were lost.... This I understand, glitches happen. What I don't understand and don't accept is the lack of response from the developer. I've sent several emails and have yet to get a non automated response.
I installed the game about 3 times and gave up. Can't connect with Facebook and when playing it suddenly stop and say it's not responding.

comments: Do not spend any money on this game. This used to be one of the best slot games until the developers got greedy. Payouts are small and events are nearly impossible. They try to make it all sound good but it's not. They also changed the customer service on here where it's hard to get anyone. You cannot message them on Facebook if you have a problem and if you say anything negative about the game you will be blocked. Hope this review saves some of you some time so you can find a better game!

What the hell kind of question is that?  "Is it beautiful".... meaning the game! HOW NOT PERTAINING TO ANY GAMES!  Anyway,  this game is hands down the best Slot game EVER!  Have played slots in and out of casino's for over 20 years and this is the one to play! A huge variety of Casino games,  easy to maneuver and a lot of really nice people.

I used to love this game but something they did changed it. Winning is nearly impossible even if you are a paying customer. I know it is a game of luck but when you purchase 85 silver tickets you should be able to complete puzzles when you only need 1 piece for each of them. Make winning a little easier and people will be happy to spend money.  I think the game is broken. I was just playing in a room on Billionaire with a person who was playing on Huge Casino. I know it's the same developer but I don't think that is supposed to happen. I know the person was playing Huge Casino because it was my husband playing it. May want to look into it.

Customer relations are horrible even non existent. If you spend money you will lose far more than you win, in their eyes you will spend even more. If you send a message they will hide behind a canned "industry standard" response. This is not a free standing casino there are no freebies and you can't collect any winnings. Yet they have their games dialed in so you lose in hopes you will spend money. Horrible company.

I just started this account in hopes of recovering my lost one. If it goes smoothly, I am happy with the app to date. The slots don't pay as much as they used to, a little tite , otherwise a fun app. The events they choose for you to play, daily, do steal a lot of chips. If u want to remain in a successful club, you must do them, is the main downfall. I would recommend it to my friends.

This is an interesting game. After I played it for awhile it became very boring. Haven't gotten a big or any good win for the past 70 million. I guess if you buy chips you might win more often. It doesn't give you all the bonuses, and it takes gifts and doesn't give them to the gamers you gave it to. So all in all it's just okay. I've never been able to get anywhere with their support team as they added to my reply. I'd give it a one star but if you buy chips it might be better.

I can‚Äôt remember‚Ä¶That lonely, cold, dark past‚Ä¶ was it all just a dream?Captain‚Ä¶ Please use the Bronya‚Äôs power to help Bronya to escape from the prison of her dreamland.The Bronya of the present cannot be lost to the Bronya of the past.[Chapter 5 Now Open]Bronya secretly followed Theresa into the Schicsial‚Äôs data center, and what appeared before her eyes was the snowfields of Siberia in the year 2000.The bonds of blood, selfless sacrifice, and fate are all reunited.A new story and a new enemy waits for captains to explore and battle![Support]If you encounter any problems while playing Honkai Impact 3, please contact the support center in-game and send us your feedback!Player support links:honkai3rd_asia@mihoyo.comOfficial website: http://asia.honkaiimpact3.com/Official Facebook fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/HonkaiImpact3rd
descriptionHTML:
New Update—The Wolf's Dawn Awakens

[Game Description]
“Honkai, the mysterious power that has destroyed human civilization many times before has now descended once again on this beautiful world—”
With the lands now crawling with deadwalkers and Honkai beasts, a group of girls bearing the burdens of despair continue their fight onward. Will there be any hope of clinging to survival?
Players will take on the role as captain of the mighty battleship Hyperion, commanding an elite team of Valkyries in battle against the Honkai in a variety of stages, experiencing different storylines, and fighting for all that is beautiful in the world!

[Update Features]
[Wolf's Dawn Awakened Form]
Covered in the white of snow, the Hyperion’s undefeated Silverwolf of the Urals takes on a new form as she is awakened.
Steeped in violence, was this life meant to be one of eternal solitude and killing as a weapon?
Could admitting the former self lead to rebirth at dawn?
Bronya’s awakened forms—Rank S [Black Nucleus], and Rank A [Wolf's Dawn] join the fight!

[Dormitory Party - Time to Move In]
Would you like to decorate a dormitory and interact with the cute Valkyries up close?
St. Freya Real Estate Co. is proud to announce the opening of the Valkyrie Dormitory!
Choose from a variety of styles and move in right away!

[Select Dreamland]
Who… who am I?
This action figure-like creature, have I seen it before? I can’t remember…
That lonely, cold, dark past… was it all just a dream?
Captain… Please use the Bronya’s power to help Bronya to escape from the prison of her dreamland.
The Bronya of the present cannot be lost to the Bronya of the past.

[Chapter 5 Now Open]
Bronya secretly followed Theresa into the Schicsial’s data center, and what appeared before her eyes was the snowfields of Siberia in the year 2000.
The bonds of blood, selfless sacrifice, and fate are all reunited.
A new story and a new enemy waits for captains to explore and battle!

[Support]
If you encounter any problems while playing Honkai Impact 3, please contact the support center in-game and send us your feedback!
Player support links:
honkai3rd_asia@mihoyo.com

Official website: http://asia.honkaiimpact3.com/
Official Facebook fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/HonkaiImpact3rd
recentChanges: 1. New characters [Black Nucleus] and [Wolf's Dawn] join the battle.
2. New Extra Chapter "Bronya - Select Dreamland."
3. New collection of weapons and stigmata.
4. New Final HOMU Fantasy event stage.
5. All new ‚ÄúValkyrie Dorm‚Äù game feature.
6. Opened Chapter 5 of the main storyline.
summary: Life is reborn as the Wolf's Dawn awakens!Attack the Honkai and save the world!
title: Honkai Impact 3

Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience![FEATURES]Fighting Card Games- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missionsOnline Multiplayer Battles- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai! - Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!Card Battle Deck- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!- Shop for cards in the game store!Stay tuned for future card additions![ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. descriptionHTML:
Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!

Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience!


[FEATURES]

Fighting Card Games
- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks
- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!
- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!
- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missions

Online Multiplayer Battles
- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai!
- Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize
- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!

Card Battle Deck
- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!
- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top
- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!
- Shop for cards in the game store!
Stay tuned for future card additions!

[ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and above

descriptionHTML:
Play the card battle game downloaded by over 16 million players worldwide in WWE SuperCard!

Start collecting thousands of cards featuring your favorite WWE and NXT Superstars, Legends and WWE Hall of Fame Inductees. Play highly competitive Player vs Player (PVP) Leagues and rise up the unified PVP leaderboard system. Improve your card battle strategy in new arenas like Monday Night Raw, SmackDown Live, and NXT! Test your skills in the new Elimination Chamber PVP mode, and a whole lot more.

Collect every Superstar to create a powerful card deck, step into the ring, and prove you’re the best in the world!

WWE SuperCard Season 4 has finally arrived with over 250 new cards across 3 brand-new tiers!

WWE SuperCard Season 4 includes:

CCG - START COLLECTING CARDS
-WWE SuperCard introduces 250 new cards across three new tiers–Beast, Monster and Titan.
-WWE Superstars like Roman Reigns, AJ Styles, Sasha Banks and Braun Strowman are all collectible

PVP CARD BATTLES - ONLINE MULTIPLAYER LEAGUES & MOMENTUM
-Level up your deck to become the top ranked SuperCard player in the world!
-Check WWE SuperCard’s new unified leaderboard and League system for PVP game modes.
-Win PVP games and earn Competitive Points based on your rank to get even better rewards.
-PVP Competitive Points can be used in the CP Store to get new cards, cardbacks, and packs!
-Unlock powerful boosts with the new Momentum system to defeat champions and prepare for the next League.

Battle for the KING OF THE RING title
-Card battle in the ever-popular ‘King of the Ring’ mode with an all-new bracket structure!
-Tournament gameplay – Battle head-to-head in groups of eight during the 32-player tournament.
-Keep wrestling to earn awesome rewards for each stage you advance.

POWER UP YOUR DECK IN OPEN CHALLENGES
-Collect and earn tickets each day by completing new daily and event-based challenges.
-Collecting powerful cards is easy when you redeem your tickets for more rewards!

NEW GAME MODE – ELIMINATION CHAMBER
-PVP Mode – Elimination Chamber is the first mode to feature an all-female Superstar deck!
-Use strategy and skill to prove you’re a wrestling technician in head-to-head, deck-elimination gameplay

Build a deck of your favorite WWE Superstars!

Download WWE SuperCard now to start collecting Superstars today!

***Update requires OS 4.2.1+ WILL NOT RUN ON ANY EARLIER OS***

comments: The game is amazing, addicting and a lot of fun just to collect and level up dragons. The events that are constantly coming on always make you feel like you have something to do. However when of the events are very unbalanced and, if you are against one of these people, not very fun. The heroic races are a great way to compete with other players to add a powerful dragon to your collection but some people take the fun out of it by spending 100's of gems to ensure that they come first. The ability to use gems during these races should be removed as it is highly unbalanced, or at least add another way of collecting the heroic dragons without having to compete with people who pay to win.

I love this game. Its very addicting and fun, but I find that there are barely any female dragons. This upsets me very much and I would like for this to change. The only females I see are the dragons with names like  motherly dragon, belle dragon, viktoria dragons, and sleeping beauty dragons. There are also descriptions like "add some girly pink to your collections with the gummy dragon"(which is also coincidently a girl). Then I see cool legendary dragons, but OH plot twist they're all boys. This is a very fun game no doubt on that, but please, stop with the sexism and make cool female dragons. Thank you.

Still Having Lot's of Fun! Cool to mix different dragons just to see what u get!  I just opened my 6th island, When I first started playing this game I think there were only 3 or 4 islands & maybe about 300 to 400 dragons. I'm having trouble keeping them long enough to get the next island!üòâüòÑüòÅ!!

Game would be great except for the fact that you can't do certain things without bugging people on Facebook for help. I just want to play the game. I can't level my dragons past 10 without building a special building which you build without gems or bugging people. No way to get gems other than extremely slowly by completing achievements which take days to complete and give 1-3 gems. Supposedly you can watch videos for gems but there is absolutely no place on the game that allows this. If your friends on Facebook don't play this game they can't help you and you are screwed if you truly want to enjoy the game. You can't win battles with level 10 dragons. You can't breed more than one dragon at a time without gems. You can't expand past 2 islands without gems. If you get the required gems to level your dragons past 10, then there is another super expensive building to level them past 15, and get, guess what, you need gems for that too. Other games allow in game friends which this one doesn't and that is frankly ridiculous as it's a "social" game. Other games allow other ways to obtain gems like watching videos or trying other games which this one doesn't. There isn't enough time to complete special events for special limited dragons unless you can get gems. Overall, the game would be fantastic if gems were easier to come by and you could make in game friends instead of having to rely on Facebook friends!

Just a few gripes. 1st of all I LOVE DRAGON CITY. Been playing for years. About your survey, I would never. You ask for too many permissions. Tree of life....when I get a Dragon here comes the same Dragon adding up for hatching. Like why? 815+ dragons are more than enough. Why do u keep adding, adding, adding. We could NEVER get all of them as it is. Why more? Love me some Dragon City like a said in the beginning.

THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER!!! I totally recommend it to EVERYONE who loves addictive games and dragons. I find myself constantly playing this game all the time! I honestly feel like I can't say how much I LOVE this game with words. Again, this is the best game a player can have. Just one thing, I wish there were more ways to get gems instead of just buying 'cause I can't buy anything. So please make gems more easier to get. Also please make the islands worth less gems.üòä

descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

comments: So much development has went into this game, the reason why I like it is because of the consistent updates and new stuff. It's hard to find games now with nothing new to bring to the table. It makes you want to invest into this game. Not to mention how generous they can be with the free gifts and whatnot. Keep it up Netmarble!

This game is awesome. Love playing it everyday and everytime. But  recently I have a problem with the game crashing almost all the time. Please help me fix this problem.  I also want to ask when will you give Odin a uniform? A better skillset, a heal, and a piercing ability for him to shine again as a god. Looking forward to it Netmarble.

There are some incredibly predatory practices with the in app purchases.  For example, if you buy the new Emma Frost pack, you won't get her work fully leveled gear, and that isn't made clear on the purchase screen.  You will need to buy the package at least once, and possible multiple times over to actually advance her.

This game was good. The past 6 months have just been a display of how game companies do not care for user experience but rather their pockets. Cash grab all the way. This game had potential to be the greatest, but a pure let down for the entire community.
Game is easily a 4/5 stars, it's fun, addictive, and fair. It has had it wobbles but for new players, there is enough to do to keep you interested without needing to pay cash.
Downloaded d game yesterday thinking am gonna have a swell time . it's telling me unable to establish a network connection. That's d error code I get . pls I need help on this

descriptionHTML:
An epic blockbuster action-RPG featuring Super Heroes and Villains from the Marvel Universe!

The Avengers, Guardians of the Galaxy, Inhumans, Defenders, X-Men, Spider-Man, and more!
Over 100 characters from the Marvel Universe are available to play!

S.H.I.E.L.D.’s very own director, Nick Fury, has sent an urgent message from the future... the convergence is destroying the world as we know it! Prepare to defend your universe!
Recruit your favorite characters, complete missions, and compete with other players to be the greatest hero and save your world.

Collect over 100 Marvel Super Heroes and Super Villains to assemble your ultimate team.
- Level up your characters and their gear to unleash their full powers!
- Build classic teams like the Avengers or X-Men to take advantage of special bonus effects.
- Choose from hundreds of Uniforms to increase your character’s powers and perfect your hero's look.

Upgrade powerful characters in Epic Quests!
- Get everyone’s favorite Super Heroes, from Captain Marvel to Doctor Strange, and level them up while playing thrilling Epic Quests.
- Unleash each character’s unique super powers as you make your way through various missions. Blast enemies with Iron Man’s Unibeam and bash opponents in the name of justice with Captain America’s shield!
- Experience even more thrilling action in PvP Arena modes, where you can bring your best team to take on the world.

Team up with friends and overcome incredible in-game challenges.
- Take a friend’s character with you when you go into a mission for emergency assistance!
- Join an Alliance and make friends. Compete with other Alliances in Alliance Conquest and take home the glory for your own team.

Original new stories only found in Marvel Future Fight!
- Experience unique, never-before-seen stories to find out who’s responsible for threatening the existence of your universe!
- Play through Special Missions featuring the New Avengers, Inhumans, and even Spidey’s Foes!


Terms of Service: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/terms_of_service.asp
Privacy Policy: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/privacy_policy.asp

comments: I've been playing this game, since it came out. I love it the same as I did then to now. This game does allow f2p to challenger some p2p as well. Sure there is a point where there is a wall, but at least you know your one of the strongest. Plus it makes me want to climb that wall, and topple whales.

Maybe one of the best games that still let you play to win. You can get everything with enough patience and a little luck. If you do want to pay though, it's gonna be pretty expensive and the stuff you get does not really let you advance a lot (unless you actually spend A LOT of money).

+ Easy to play + Good story line + Also easy to get the items + I like the game mechanic  - Need more challenging on battle - Need table of hero type - Inventory items don't include the gear being use  Overall i like this game, very good. Also, more hero will make this game more good. And... adding charge chain attack will be awesome  Edit: After update my account was lost, please fix it

This game is great. It doesnt beat you over the head with paywalls, you could probably play f2p and still have a ton of fun. Graphics are good and mechanics are deep and satisfying. Only complaint is the reddit coommunity, but cant blame the devs for that.

Previous rating was üëçüëç. Now üëç.  Content drought at the end of the game with some very expensive in app purchases. End game is killing the same dragon or farming the same level over and over and over...there are daily tasks which are a chore. Hoping for quality of life improvements similar to what the reddit suggests.   I really like the art style.

Great game with the most responsive and generous developers.  The only thing bad about this game is the toxic gaming community.  Full of unjustifiable whiners who are so poor they need their freebies for EVERY event or else they have a hissy fit and threaten to quit game AND also cry koz of nerfs on their heroes and threaten to quit(but really don't). They also attack every person who does spend for the game (casual spender or whale) God-forbid the devs need to also earn for a living.

comments: I love this game but because of they last upload, the game stop to work properly I rated with 1 star

Almost two years later and still love the game. It is a good game to relax to. I do spend money occassionally on the game but the game is not "pay to play". That means you can progress through it without even spending a dime. Its a simple game with decent graphics to play at leisure and has become my current pass time.  Update 3/22/18  I decreased my rating to three stars (from 5) until the developer can correct the latest flop from most recent update. Flop regards being able to log in but paralyzed from any action that requires an in game pop up. I including the "Help" module which is used to contact dev with. If no improvement after a week, I will delete game and draw stars to 0.

I've always loved this game, but my tickets go ignored for days. Latest update has handicapped me completely in that I cannot click on anything or log off 1 world to log onto my other world. The game is starting to suffer because of bad customer service. Reduced my rating to 1 star until they get their act together. To think I've actually spent real money on this game and can't get a timely answer.
The latest update has locked me out of the ability to select anything. Its like pop ups have been disabled. I used real money in this game and now i cant play.Fix it please! Samsung note 4

I hate to leave 1 star just to get a developer's attention, but I have been unsuccessful in contacting customer support. Since the update, buttons in Uceria are no longer clickable. I cannot even access the second world I play in because I am locked into Uceria. I have uninstalled and reinstalled,but still does not work. Please help!
Downgraded to 1 star until the latest bug is fixed. Frustrating to say the least! UPDATED: Looks like They got it fixed quickly! Good job!
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access. Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint

comments: Uninstalling!!! Took less than 24 hrs to take 300 million i won away. Payed off great for the first 20 levels. I was thinking "finally a slot that pays!" Sat and played it for hours straight to try and build up the bank. Made it to level 23 and the game just stopped paying. I know you want us to make purchases but how is anyone going to want to purchase if it just depletes your winnings that fast. I'm done!!

Great slot game, graphics, music, bonuses, all terrific, I really enjoy this game, very addicting, I want to play it in my sleep. All true, I don't have to lie to kick it. Thank you.   One more thing, do you guys really read these reviews? You people are geniuses. It may take me forever to finish this game, so you have a friend for life now. Hasta luego. I will never finish because it is impossible to do for free.

Great Graphics. Over 2.5 GB Big. Uses a lot of data. Starts out Winning, Then You Lose Quick. HARD to regain. Higher & Higher Achievements needed that are Tough to Win. Wants YOUR Cash ! IF it were in a Real Casino-people would Walk Away. I Played over 19 weeks. Thats ALL !!!

Honestlt this is worse then playing at a real casino this is supposed to be a game and yet the slots dont let u win anything im brand new to this and have been stuck on the same mission for 7 days because i cant win any coins. One spin out of 150 gives coins and then u lose everything its stupid and annoying. I feel u only win if u pay with real money. Increasing ur bet doesnt help the odds of winning either. This is a video game not a real casino payouts should be more fair

Great graphics. Games kept a fast pace with  winnings one on top of the other. No boring games here. Other apps I have played are not quite so generous with coin winnings meaning if you want to keep playing, you need to buy, buy, buy.

It's fun when you just start. You never lose. Like most casino apps, once you've played for awhile, you never win. Maybe someday the creators of these types of apps will realize that people will purchase their chips if they feel it's worth it. They'll always have those folks who will throw their money at the game, but you'll have people like me who will never purchase coins from a game that takes much and gives little or nothing in return. I will be deleting this game just like all the others before.

comments: WARNING: IF YOU DO NOT CORRECTLY SELECT POWERS BEFORE APPROVING, YOU LOSE THE POWER(S) YOU SHOULD HAVE RECEIVED! ALSO, DO NOT USE YOUR CRYSTAL SKULLS TO POWER UP, USE THEM TO EVOLVE! If you like One Piece, you'll like this game. The One Piece story line is faithfully adapted to the plot of the game (not exact, but great for a game story line). The characters are great. If you are patient and power up your characters, you don't have to pay to play. Basically no advertisement,  except for self promotion of the game.

Whether you are a fan of One Piece of not, this is an awesome game. Lots of fun, great and faithful art, and a rich combat. Best of all, they practically cram gems down your throat so you never feel forced to actually have to buy any.  An update to this is that I have been playing this game for years, so it is nice to see them keeping it fresh and fun. Still love this game. And as always, anni is the planni for my fellow Redditors.

This game is so fun collecting all the characters and trying to evolve them. Over the years I've had multiple phones so the only downside is the saving of data I wish it would just be connected to your account like most other games in case you lose or break your phone. Rather than having to start over is they can fix that issue this game is one of the best on the app store.

I have always loved onepeice and liked brave frontier very much so it's the best of both world's if you have ever beenm waiting for a one piece rpg then this is it. And grinding for items could of not been anymore fun than this. Still having fun with this game. And it's still getting better and better. Thank you for a perfect one-piece game. Also I normally hate grinding for items but when you live one piece like I do then it's doesn't matter. They also update the game with new content making it even better. 2018 and the game is still going strong.

Good for a One Piece fan! The many aspects of the game makes it interesting. There can be a bit of a learning curve for new players, but the slight challenge is what makes it fun. The updates and changes keep the game from becoming dull as well. Btw I have fun playing even as a free player because they are pretty generous with the game currency. You just need patience as with any game you play for free.

Game is fun overall. But get ready to grind after a week or so. Gems comes pretty easy overtime. But the prize in the store is a bit pricy especially when you are never guarantee the characters you want in the draw. So if you are not in a hurry. Save up your gems until they have a event with a guarantee 10th draw or something that has a character you want. Other than that, this game is great time killer and I love playing this game while waiting on the animation renew.

comments: Love it to pieces. The characters are loveable and the stories are fun. I got through three to four in a few days I can't put it down. The only downside is certain decisions cost gems. Major ones are fine and expected but to have to be a jerk to someone because you don't have enough kind of sucks a little. But it's not often and by no means a deal breaker.

Actually, I came here because I'm a fan of Jakayla Toney. I'm a reader from wattpad, and I'm checking out her story here as game. üòÇ Anyways, I finished one chapter and I'm enjoying so far. Gotta check out other book after I'm done. Looking forward to this app, though I don't really like the choices costing gems.But its okay, still like it. üòä

Every GOOD choice involved money.  Hard to find one interactive story game that doesn't involve money so much.  I don't mind paying for extra bonus scenes in the end but at least give us some GOOD selection WITHOUT charging!  Then maybe I'll rate it higher

I've really enjoyed reading All the Wrong reasons.  The author is very talented, a true story teller.  As I was reading I felt like part of the story I was so enveloped in the lives of the characters they were alive and real. I was sad when the story ended wanted to keep reading.  I was overjoyed when K. I. S. S.  came out by that very sane author who transported me to a whole new world yet again. I look forward to reading more from this amazingly talented storyteller!!

I'm frustrated by the fact that this is supposed to be a choose your own adventure game, but all the choices that make the most sense to me are stuck behind a paywall, requiring me to purchase those choices with a currency called diamonds. I get the story passes, and I would have been fine if that was the only barrier to read the story, but to require you to pay money for making what you feel are the right choices is just greedy.

The only reason I'm giving 3 stars is because the chapters update too late that you lose interest and sometimes forget what's happening in the story. If the chapters were to update on a regular basis then readers would feel the need to keep this app and will constantly play instead of playing the waiting game. However the content is good and most storylines get you hooked.

descriptionHTML:
Choose your story with Chapters, the interactive story game that lets you choose your path in every story. Read through pages and pages of fun interactive stories that fit your mood, from romance to suspense!

Choose your story from our top collection of romance, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, comedy, and drama series! Chapters combines a unique style of choose your own story gameplay with fiction stories that you simply can't put down!

YOU get to make the choices in each story. Decide on hard life choices such as falling in love, discovering secrets, or unravelling deep mysteries! Make your choices wisely; every ending is different!

Chapters Features:
- Choose your story! Dive in and start making choices that affect the overall outcome!
- Adventures start with you choosing your name and style to reflect your personality.
- All stories come with info directly from the author!
- Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers! 50% Off starting March 20th until March 30th!

Our exclusive collection of choose your story games include:

ROMANCE - ALL THE WRONG REASONS
- Romance story unfolds when YOU have a one night stand with the city's most notorious playboy.
- Drama unfolds after a one night stand suddenly explodes into many more nights of forbidden passion.
- Make the choice between what’s more important – letting go of your insanely jealous boyfriend or keeping the complicated love affair going?

DRAMA - PRINCE WITH BENEFITS
- Fantasy story mixed with comedy! Play as the hopeless romantic that never seems to catch a break.
- Make bold choices and decide how your romantic story unfolds with your almost knight in shining armor.
- Drama arises when you find out that he's the Prince of England. For real.

SUSPENSE - KIDNAPPING THE PRINCESS
- Choose your life as a supermodel by day and a kidnapper extraordinaire by night.
- Make the choice to play as the hero or villain who kidnaps the only heir to a whole country.
- Make choices to pull off the biggest kidnapping ever while keeping your feelings for the Princess in check.

HOLLYWOOD STORY - STARSTRUCK
- Try surviving high school after a world-renowned actress suddenly puts her career on hold and enrolls in YOUR high school
- Hollywood life isn’t what it seems, and you realize there's more to this media darling than meets the eye.
- Romance is in the air, but can YOU avoid your crazy ex long enough to figure out this mess?

ROMANCE - BAD BOY BLUES
- Your life choices led to you becoming a master at playing the piano and fleeing problems.
- These choices lead you to Adriano, a brooding mob boss, who steals your heart and the rest of you.
- Romance blossoms and you decide to jazz things up and stand your ground.
- Have your life choices made you tough enough to rescue your handsome kidnapper and make the murderous rival family dance to your tune?"

SUPERNATURAL ROMANCE - MR. DEVIL
- When your boyfriend falls terminally ill, you make a deal to save him: spend the rest of your life together or surrender your soul to Hell.
- Then you discover your boyfriend is cheating on you, so do you break up with him? The Devil comes to collect his prize...you.
- Transported to Hell, you face difficult choices that determine whether you will survive fire and brimstone, fallen angels, and hot gossip.
- And more importantly, can you find everlasting love, not in Heaven or on Earth, but with Mr. Devil himself?

And more interactive story games with fun choices!

Chapters: Interactive Stories will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, romance, or even a gamer, you’ll love making choices in this interactive story game!

Please note that Chapters: Interactive Stories is an online game that requires an internet connection to play.

Follow us on: facebook.com/ChaptersInteractiveStories

2051 JUNCTION AVENUE #212
SAN JOSE CA 95131
