descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers

The alliances of Good and Evil have been forged. The final battle between epic warriors and heroes on both sides is about to start. Ride the crest of the Idle RPG wave with Epic Summoners!

Prepare your best summoner heroes for the fight. Join friends and players from across the globe as you embark on an epic action journey of enchantment to explore the Magic Ladder and the secrets contained deep within. Lead your action troops -heroes and warriors- into the light and overcome all battle challenges that lay before you to emerge victorious in an epic war! The world's destiny is in your hands!

ENGROSSING ACTION RPG GAMEPLAY
Your summoner heroes can’t wait to fight auto-battles against the enemy on your behalf! Recruit and gain experience with every powerful war hero in a legendary battle in this idle game!
Epic equipment and legendary summoner heroes and warriors challenge waiting for you!
Earn awesome combat rewards even when you’re offline. No need to stress when life calls!

ENDLESS TACTICAL AND STRATEGIC FUN
Plan your battle troops tactics and maneuver with your legendary hero to secure victory, it's your free action RPG destiny!
Collect, upgrade and use your equipment wisely to show off your strength as leader on an legendary epic adventure game!
Simple, yet effective strategy combat allows you to enjoy this RPG at home or on the go! Plan your characters tactics and troops maneuver and dominate the battlefield to defeat every evil challenge hero and enemy warriors adventure troops!

THRILLING ACTION BATTLE CONTENT TO KEEP YOU ON YOUR TOES
Summon and recruit summoner heroes and legendary warriors troops, deploy, defend, fight, collect and upgrade to accomplish your RPG challenge!
Between the Expedition Airship, Arena, Magic Ladder and Wishing Pond, there’s a huge world to explore in this idle war game and new creatures to find!
Your interest will never waver with our steady stream of great war content! Challenge your friends and defeat players from all over the world in this free action RPG!

A HIGH QUALITY VISUAL AND AUDIO FEAST
Exquisite warriors' aesthetics and creatures artwork in this free action RPG adventure full of fun and challenges!
Jaw dropping epic combat and maneuver animations in the arena and awe inspiring action battle challenge effects!

THROW DOWN WITH PLAYERS AND FRIENDS
Step into our battle warriors RPG Arena and compete with skilled players from all over the world! Recruit new legendary summoner heroes and warriors troops with different abilities to defeat every evil enemy!
Change your tactics and action maneuver against rivals to see your name climb the rankings and beat your friends best scores!
Win awesome battle rewards on your way to claiming the ultimate victory wih your army in this action hero war idle game!

Start now this epic adventure challenge with your best legendary hero and powerful warriors action in a fantasy adventure with different creatures and battlegrounds in a non-stop free RPG! Your destiny is to lead your magic summoner legendary heroes guild army and war troops in a battle adventure to the death!

comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

It shouldn't be easier to level up rather than actually playing game. I wouldn't say that the gameplay is difficult to play, but the purposefully placed trucks that shoot you is a bit ridiculous. Other cars are in the way which ultimately eliminates you before you can attack the shooting trucks. There really is no challenge except trying to beat your previous score. I give this game an eh out eh.

comments: It's easy, enjoyable and EVERYONE from my 73yr old mum to a young adult (due to the images and content of storyline. .not suitable for kids) can play and EVERYONE can progress no matter how agile they are with their fingers or brain. LOVE IT!!! PLAY IT EVERY DAY WITHOUT FAILüòä

MONEY HUNGRY! Play only if you intend to pay. Only got to the 4th it 5th puzzle and the only way I could continue was to pay! Don't misunderstand, this is a very good game. But unless you're willing to pay you have to wait for quite a while to get to play again. All of the Criminal Case games are the same way. Never been so blown away by a game insisting on paying money like this before. Very disappointed!

Great gameplay. Colorful and vivid graphics. Smooth gameplay on LG Aristo 2. Been playing this a long time, took a break and came back. Why am I seeing Ads every minute in the game now ?!?!? I've never had that issue before at all. Now its Ads every minute !!

Getting less fun than ever.  Pop up adverts in game very irritating.  Reported glitches in game to get response to follow self help which i already did.  Constantly bombarded by attempts to get you to spend money.     Used to be a great game by now would not recommend.  Will stop when i complete in 6 levels

this game is so addicting. the only thing I hate is that they don't reward energy anymore. No drinks etc. I just wish you didn't have to buy energy to continue . otherwise I love this game. it's a great time consumer when you are borwd

I played this game for a VERY long time. Recently, the creators have made lousy changes, making it difficult to get energy to play and giving us adults some stupid, useless stickers. Most of the regular players feel the changes are to force us to buy energy. Instead, many people are leaving the game, which is very unfortunate. Advertisers take notice! The creators aren't listening to the players and you may want to seriously consider before investing in this game.

comments: Great game the reason of why the one star is no matter what if you delete the app or get a new phone it doesn't save. Not to your Facebook account, or Google play game and has problems with it's server. Why any one would spend money on this game until they could at least save stuff is beyond me.

MY STORY OF HUNGRY SHARK  I've been playing hungry Shri since years and I reached my tiger shark.... suddenly it got updated and I lost all my progress and returned to the first level of reef shark...I was so disappointed and uninstalled the game after a few months I reinstalled it and while playing I saw the cloud save and clicked it.....I WAS SO HAPPY THAT I COULD RETURN TO MY PROGRESS....I enjoy playing it and I love the new background and updates  Best wishes- A hungry shark fan

! GOOD !, Arcade style eat'em up game. Feels ALOT like "Echo The Dolphin". Except ur a badass shark! The ONLY hold backs is the controls, but u really can't do much about that problem unless u actually had physical/analog joysticks built n2 ur phone.?. The basic control problems u have w/ ne downloadable games.
Addictive, played for hours at a friends house until 3 in the morning. Got it for myself. Gems are costly, but save up and you can get the baby on the last shark. Then get hungry shark world.

This game was awesome but sometimes I don't like it when my Shark freezes up and who came up with all these sharks? It is a fun game but why are there pressure limits sometimes I don't like it but this game is it for teens it's for everyone it's really fun and well sometimes I don't like it when it takes me a long time to get money for a shark

It's mindless fun and the soft gore while eating a human is fun. The underwater scenes are visually pleasant. I also like the feature that warps you to the North Pole once a day. The random vortexs that throw you into space are also a really fun feature.

comments: It's my favourite of all the poker apps on the market so far. Two things I would change... Enable chat so you can say what you want. Also make buying chips less expensive (it's far too easy to go bust, then you can't play unless you spend lots of money on PLAY chips) sort it out please

I'm giving 4 star becuz I need help from you devs! I play GOP3 in STEAM directly in PC & I have an option to synch my steam account to my Android, I tried all the steps that's listed. But it ain't working. Can you help me out? Cuz if u help me, I personally feel you guys deserve a 5 star :)
Now I remember why I deleted this in the first place. Terrible game. Hardly ever win a hand. Too many so called 'players' keep raising so you lose more than you win. Deleting for the last time!

If you continuously win you lose continuously and if you have a lot of chips you'll lose the chips know why? This games is money hungry and wants you to buy stuff I had 25 million and now I have 13 million because the dealer got 20 2 times in a row mabey if you made the cards random and didint do what I complained about I would've gave this 5 stars.
There's a few small glitches but they are always keeping up and listening to players comments to make things better,  bravo! Really fun team challenges separates gop3 from all others.
This game is garbage the daily spin is garbage and the hands are not good ever. Unless your willing to spend money everyday don't bother. IT doesn't respond back to tech issues eith.

comments: Buggy! Once they fix the signing bugs, this might be a good game. Now, there are widespread examples of users not being able to get in; instead, it freezes at a white screen.  Many videos crash the game, which means you lose the treat you would otherwise earn by watching those ads. Other crashing problems as well.

For not getting even the first event bird out of 3 in alien excavation after opening so many premium eggs reaching (*4) of the premium eggs. I blame - chimera and rovio. Either the makers of the game are idiots or the game is stupid and seriously 2000 per month for an imaginary egg everyday that cannot guarantee a 4 or 5 star bird. Yeah, the makers of the game really are idiots.

the game is really fun and humorous. I love the clan feature- found a great clan to be part of. there are glitches that rovio needs to iron out that affect play. I am hoping this new big update helps fix all that. the changes look to be really good. excited to see what they've done.

I did not expect to enjoy this nearly as much as I have. The frequent events are nice and having a guild just makes them better. I don't feel compelled to be social be because there is no chat, just playing the game. It is a wonderful balance.

Love the game. The game play is great. Only down side is that I feel that the game cheats against me sometimes by adding enemies. Only happened about 3 times now. ***edit*** I have since realized there are certain pigs that do add more pigs when hit. The game doesn't cheat. I'm extremely happy with the game play and ability to build a great team without paying a whole bunch of money. You just need patients and good planning.

Decent game, lots of fun to keep you coming back. I would of rated a 4 star game but every time I need to watch a video the game stops working, stopping me from getting a free premium egg or opening chests!

descriptionHTML:
Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.
100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We’re gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before. Build your own team, combine super skills and evolve your birds into their ultimate form.

Embark on an epic adventure.
Something sinister is brewing on Bird Island. Why are there so many pigs around? Who is behind the mysterious Bacon Corp? What’s the Eagle Force? Who lost the dungeon keys? Find the answers – only in Angry Birds Evolution.

Crush the pigs in explosive battles.
What’s worse than egg-stealing pigs? Over 90 different varieties of egg-stealing Pigs, that's what. Pirates, ninjas, tourists – someone has to clean this place up. Let the feathers fly in full contact battles and send the pigs packing.

Join weekly events.
Earn awesome rewards, and get a chance to add extra rare birds to your team by taking part in weekly events. Join by yourself or assemble a clan of buddies to compete with other clans. Build the strongest, most awesome clan on Bird Island and rule the roost!

Compete against other players.
The Oinktagon: two teams enter – only one leaves (victorious). Challenge other players in PVP tournaments of the Bird Island pastime, Pigball, and dominate the leagues for even more awesome rewards.


FEATURES:
– Over 100 colorful new characters to hatch and collect.
– Assemble the ultimate flock of birds and take down the pigs with ease.
– 5 Classes of birds with unique abilities.
– Evolve your feathery heroes into unstoppable super birds.
– Explore the island and stop the Bacon Corp.
– Climb up the Eagle Mountain and win ultimate eggs.
– Battle other players in the Oinktagon.
– Join clans to unlock perks, compete with other clans, and chat with clanmates.
– Send out scouts for rewards & challenges.


This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.

There‚Äôs never been a better time to buddy up and kick some pig butt!
Read more: https://rov.io/evo116

title: Angry Birds Evolution

description: We welcome you to the legendary world of wise Kings, great Lords and valiant Heroes. Walk the exciting path of a city builder and warlord! Assemble an army of faithful warriors in gleaming armor. Create a powerful Order and demonstrate your might to players from all over the world. Glorious victories in bloody battles for supremacy in the Kingdom and the brutal struggle for the ancient Throne are just a small part of all the adventures that await you in the lands of fearless rulers.From the moment you begin the game, the atmosphere of a medieval town in an expansive Kingdom, courageous marches, battles and ancient riches will take you on an unforgettable journey. My Lord, your vassals are waiting for your orders!Throne: Kingdom at War is free to play. You can purchase in-game currency in exchange for real money. It gives you the ability to buy various boosts and items that will make your gaming experience more dynamic and exciting. If you want to switch off this option, you can set a password in the Google Play Store menu to prevent any unwanted purchases.Game features:- Access to a completely free mode- High-grade graphics and sound- Localization into multiple languages- You can create your own Order or join an existing one- Dynamic real-time battles with players from all over the world- Several troop classes to choose from: knights, spearmen, ranged, cavalry, siege, scouts- Armor, weapons and other equipment crafting for your Hero- Numerous quests and errands with valuable rewardsWe are constantly improving the app, making it better and more entertaining. You also can help us sending your feedback and suggestions.Support: http://support-portal.plarium.com/ticketcreator/store/throne/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ThroneKingdomAtWarGoogle+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/104394834691619177858Twitter: https://twitter.com/throne_plariumInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/thronekingdomatwarPrivacy Policy: http://plarium.com/#/doc/policy Terms of Use: http://plarium.com/#/doc/terms
descriptionHTML:
We welcome you to the legendary world of wise Kings, great Lords and valiant Heroes. Walk the exciting path of a city builder and warlord! Assemble an army of faithful warriors in gleaming armor. Create a powerful Order and demonstrate your might to players from all over the world. Glorious victories in bloody battles for supremacy in the Kingdom and the brutal struggle for the ancient Throne are just a small part of all the adventures that await you in the lands of fearless rulers.

From the moment you begin the game, the atmosphere of a medieval town in an expansive Kingdom, courageous marches, battles and ancient riches will take you on an unforgettable journey. My Lord, your vassals are waiting for your orders!

Throne: Kingdom at War is free to play. You can purchase in-game currency in exchange for real money. It gives you the ability to buy various boosts and items that will make your gaming experience more dynamic and exciting. If you want to switch off this option, you can set a password in the Google Play Store menu to prevent any unwanted purchases.

Game features:
- Access to a completely free mode
- High-grade graphics and sound
- Localization into multiple languages
- You can create your own Order or join an existing one
- Dynamic real-time battles with players from all over the world
- Several troop classes to choose from: knights, spearmen, ranged, cavalry, siege, scouts
- Armor, weapons and other equipment crafting for your Hero
- Numerous quests and errands with valuable rewards

We are constantly improving the app, making it better and more entertaining. You also can help us sending your feedback and suggestions.

comments: Pros: funny animations, charming stylized set and character designs. Nice to see Teddie, the bartender and beta Angela. I have yet to meet the other chatacters from the tv series. Comfortable gameplay, not a time hog. Cons: 40gems for an additional host slot in diagnostics was for the que, not simultaneous diagnostic host tests. Game could only be played online. Completing 2 Escalante training sessions don't always get rewarded in daily tasks.

I like the game it's quite engaging but  at some point in the game it becomes limiting because of the 30/30 host cap and it's difficult to get more hosts to combine with the existing ones because there's not enough space. I can't just delete or combine the existing ones just to free up because I need them too.
The Delos installation is taking all daaaaay! Stuck in it! Tech support is USELESS!

The 30 host cap immediately becomes pretty difficult to work around, especially when you need to have duplicates of the  hosts to increase their max level cap/attribute score as well as duplicates of hosts for hat colours. I'm hoping there's a way to increase this later in the game. Also, synthblood is incredibly difficult to obtain especially when you need more to fix higher level hosts. Overall though, the game is pretty generous with currency, so I don't think I've ever ran into a hard building wall that made me think I had to spend money on it to progress further. So far, I'm enjoying the game and looking forward to the updates
The host cap of just 30 is a real problem because it becomes difficult to rank up higher level hosts. I would love to continue playing but the cap is a dealbreaker. Hope you can fix this asap

Without any explanation, my level 25 account couldn't be logged in for several days now (I've tried using different wifi and different devices, but still couldn't log in). I spent SO MUCH TIME and effort in achieving everything, and yet all of a sudden you'd lock me out of my account like this. I am gravely disappointed, and I hope you could fix this issue.

descriptionHTML:
A Dark Fantasy, Collectible RPG

[Google pre-registration]
**Google pre-registration rewards will be sent to users who log in by April 6, 2018(PDT).

Darkness has overtaken the realm, and the world is in chaos. The only hope to restore light and order lies with you, an Heir of Light. Embark on a crusade to renew a hope that has been lost for generations. Ready your weapon and journey to restore the light of the world!

[Features]

■ Be a Light in the Darkness
- Shine light upon a world shrouded in darkness. The war will only end when light shines upon every inch of the land.
- Expand the territory in any direction you desire!
- Mobs are no longer in your way, Exclusive Boss Battles Only!

■ Collect Masters & Servants
- Form your Crusade among 5 Masters and over 100 Servants.
- Enhance, Evolve, and Awaken to unlock their true potential.
- Diverse Roles for each Masters & Servants: Attack, Defense, Support, Healer.

■ Devise and Strategize
- Your Master is the key of your Crusade, customize your Master's Skills for every battle.
- Unleash Combo Skills powerful beyond measure with perfect Master and Servant pairings.
- Customize your Rune Combination to gain unique Set Effects.
- Couple the various different Skills and Elements to assemble the most strategic Crusade.

■ Heed the Savage Battlefield
- Pulverize your opponents in PvP mode to prove your power.
- Preserve your Towers! Defense is the first step in strategic combat.
- Challenge yourself to various dungeons and earn rare rewards. Godspeed!

■ An Eerie and Mysterious World
- Not just another RPG! Immerse yourself in a magical and mysterious fantasy world.
- Cute yet bizarre, uncanny yet charming! Masters and Servants are ready to accompany you on your journey.

* Heir of Light Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/HeirofLightGAMEVIL
* Heir of Light Official Forum: https://m.gamevilusa.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?1896-English

▶Required Permission Guidelines
When using the app, we may ask permissions for access to provide the following services.

[Required Permission]
- Storage: The authority is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.

[Optional Permission]
- Phone: The authority is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.

comments: This game is good and the story was interesting. The reason why i give three stars is because the magic challenges sometimes need to consume lots coins or lunes. And everytime there is new event which need to collect bonbon... It is teally hard to collect it and instead we need to buy... i know this game is free for both pay to play and free to play... but all i see is pay to play since the bonbons need to buy and sometimes events that come back by popular demand also consume lots of money.... I actually liked this game but since you made this game really.... i had to give only 3 stars since the game had to use mk ey A LOT....

Rather then an actual chapter as in some other games, game play is only a page in a normal book if you are lucky. I love the story lines but I would actually love to read the story and not be teased with a tiny blurb of the chapter instead. Maybe if the chapters were longer and worth buying tickets for I would actually spend more money on this game bc it's very cute.   Trying to play threw the stories are so annoying! You need sooooooooo many story tickets! The chapters should be longer per ticket.. it takes like 15 tickets to get threw a chapter! The only good part is u get 5 a day unless u buy more.... please make the chapter length longer per a ticket :( I'd like to actually read a story..

I loved it , it is so addicting and the characters are gorgeous, but it is way too short. I find myself paying fake money from the game to buy tickets just to know what happens next! You might actually fall in love with the characters! That's how amazing it is!

This is my favorite app and has been for almost a year. The only problem now is the adds they can get very frustrating and angering. I do put a lot of money into this game and wish you would consider taking away the adds per player after they put so much money into the game.

I adore this game, I've almost had it for a year now. I chose Klaus and I am head over heels in love with him. I enjoy playing a little bit of his story everyday. The artwork is just beautiful as is the story. It's well written and interesting. However, there's one thing that really upsets me and that's the in game currency,  coins. They're incredibly difficult to acquire. Yes, there's the "free coins" but unless you want to spend actual money(which you're trying to avoid obv). The free options that take the least amount of time only give you 7 or 9 coins so good luck with that. Honestly, this game would truly be a 5 star gem if that was fixed. At least bump it up from 7 to 100 and make the offers that cost money actually work. I just did one(it was for a 1$ basically) and didn't get it. Otherwise, thanks for an absolute gem of a game c:

This used to be my favorite Solmare game, but the pop-up ads have ruined it. They can pop open at anytime, playing loud music and ruining the experience. When they pop up, I usually just end up closing the app, no matter what I was in the middle of because they are so annoying. I will probably end up uninstalling this app because of them.  If this was not an issue, it would be a 5 STAR game.

You are a vampire hunter who is about to head to Idra Forest with your partner wolf.
The forest is believed to be where the vampire castle is.
Your mission is to visit this castle in order to save the village people.
Can you complete the mission without being consumed by vampires?



You are a witch who is led to Idra Forest by a mysteriously beautiful melody.
You soon find yourself at a hotel named Libra Sincera, where you are turned into a vampire.
A black cat comes to tell you that you have only 10 days to find the rose garden, whose roses can turn you back to human.
What's their motives? And can you go back to your normal life?

descriptionHTML:
If you love Hidden Object Games, epic adventure, and romance stories, Pearl's Peril will be your new favorite!

Find objects, solve the mystery and discover a new world full of twists. This game offers graphically beautiful scenes where you will have to reveal secrets and intrigues.

Pearl’s Peril is a stunning hidden object game that sweeps you away into an age of intrigue and romance, where polite appearances give way to inner greed and familial bonds are broken by betrayal.

Make friends, fall in love and seek clues in hundreds of hidden object scenes.

*YOU WILL LOVE PEARL’S PERIL*

● EXPERIENCE THE BEAUTY
No other hidden object adventure game can match Pearl’s stunning, hand-drawn scenes. Hundreds of unique locations transport you to a historic era when adventure pilots like Pearl were just beginning to open up our world.

● DISCOVER NEW ROMANCE SCENES
An epic story-driven game you’ll experience over years of gameplay! It will leave you with many dramatic scenes and stories to cherish and experience over and over again.

● UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY
Have fun! Find romance! Fall in love! Get swept away! Be shocked! But beware… in a world where power goes unchecked and hidden ambition knows no bounds, nothing is ever as it seems.

● BUILD YOUR PARADISE
As you journey through Pearl’s exciting challenges and hidden object gameplay, always return to Artemis Island to rebuild and expand – to create a paradise that you will love.

Join more than 40 million others when you play the most beautiful, deepest, highest-quality an epic hidden object adventure game on your mobile device. Adventure is waiting for you, so get started today!

~

Pearl Wallace lives the exciting life of an heiress and socialite in the 1920’s in New York City. That is until her father’s sudden suicide plunges her into a world of intrigue and mystery. Despite overwhelming evidence to the contrary, Pearl knows in her heart that her father’s death was no suicide. She will stop at nothing as she seeks to unravel the series of events leading to his untimely death and find the hidden villains who were really responsible. Money, danger and even death is no object as Pearl works to clear Samuel Wallace’s name.

As an ace pilot and cunning detective, Pearl flies headfirst into a whirlwind of adventure which takes her around the world from the depths of Africa to the heights of the Eiffel Tower. However, she’ll need your keen eye if she’s going to find the evidence she needs to confirm her suspicions that her father didn’t commit suicide at all. He was murdered!

Travel with Pearl to her family home on the Polynesian island of Artemis and help her find clues as well as piece together the puzzles, revealing the truth about mysterious secret orders locked in a struggle to determine the rise and fall of nations. Join our heroine as she unveils the hidden story of deception and betrayal that involves nearly everyone she has ever known or loved. Stand beside her as she seeks and finds hidden strength. Along the journey find the wealth to rebuild Artemis Island to its former glory, while discovering loyal friends, love and ferocious enemies that will test your limits.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Having problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us here: http://woo.ga/PPhelp

Become a fan of the game by keeping up with the latest stories, rewards, and competitions here:

http://www.facebook.com/pearlsperil
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Like us on facebook.com/wooga

Pearl’s Peril is free to download and play but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

You may require an Internet connection to play Pearl’s Peril and access its social features. Pearl’s Peril may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: http://www.wooga.com/legal/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/

comments: Awesome game.  Biggest downside I don't like is, unlike similar games, once the small packs are bought you are only offered the largest ($50/$100). I'd honestly like to see all packs back or at least if you're going to tier up buying options, at least offer a $25 as lowest.

Once you loose the shield, you will get farmed by higher level players, forcing you to use whatever resources you have left over to repair. Once you finished repair, you not surprisingly get attacked again. This results you in being frustrated and uninstalling or you foolishly spend your hard earned cash for resources that you will soon enough loose from being attacked.

Why do you need a commander to be sent to gather resources? This is absurd! I need troops to gather but then again I want my commanders to attack renegades and stuff! Please make gathering without th e need to send a commander with troops!!

Don't waste your time unless you are going to spend large amounts of money. Free to play players get attacked daily by credit card players and you dont get a chance to progress. Good idea for a game but sadly very imbalanced.

Overall an excellent game IF you have an alliance to back you up.  Otherwise you are a sitting duck. I recommend this game anytime to anyone because you do a lot in half an hour.   Only option I request is warlords events diring the weekend.  Poly and Thor are critcal resources and there never seems to be enough unless you pay for it.

Again the only way to move forward is to pay large amounts of money.!!! every rss is so scarce to retrieve and trying to obtain VIP is I don't even know how without paying money.... the chat is just plain messed up also...
description: When the entire world is at war, bold generals rise to the challenge and lead their armies toward Global Conquest. The time has come for you to strike! Do you have what it takes? Build your base, dominate regions of an actual real-world map, and lead your faction to conquer every nation of the globe! You are a single modern military order, cut from the same cloth as a sultan or the Vikings of old, destined to forge a mighty empire. But you are not free from rivals. Many generals share your ambition and have their own loyal armies to back them. Some will join you and your clan. Some will clash with you as rivals. But friend or foe, only one can reign supreme. Go boom or go bust as you recruit skilled commanders into your army, build a massive war machine, forge brilliant strategies, and order strikes on enemy bases in the most massive free MMO warfare game on mobile! **GAME FEATURES** REAL-WORLD ACTION‚Ä¢ Play with thousands of real mobile players as they clash around the world.‚Ä¢ Talk to your war friends and foes alike in the global chat as you plot every strike to grow your empire.‚Ä¢ Build and order ultra-realistic units based on actual modern war machines like mobile artillery, battle tanks and big boom-dropping bombers! ‚Ä¢ Wage total warfare as you clash across a faithfully recreated World Map. REAL-TIME CONQUEST‚Ä¢ Clash with the ferocity of modern Vikings in live, real-time PvP warfare.‚Ä¢ Become the Sultan of Boom by issuing split-second orders in-game that determine which army will emerge victorious in battle.‚Ä¢ Call on your clan for reinforcements when the clash is most intense. REAL MILITARY STRATEGY‚Ä¢ Feel free to build your war base however you want in a customizable mobile experience.‚Ä¢ Order your commander to strike, then power them up to bring the boom!‚Ä¢ Forge a clan, lead it with the strategy of a sultan, and plan your strike together._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/SNS_FB_ENTwitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_ENInstagram: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_IGYouTube: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_YTThis app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-usePrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-noticeEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula

When the entire world is at war, bold generals rise to the challenge and lead their armies toward Global Conquest. The time has come for you to strike! Do you have what it takes? Build your base, dominate regions of an actual real-world map, and lead your faction to conquer every nation of the globe!

You are a single modern military order, cut from the same cloth as a sultan or the Vikings of old, destined to forge a mighty empire. But you are not free from rivals. Many generals share your ambition and have their own loyal armies to back them. Some will join you and your clan. Some will clash with you as rivals. But friend or foe, only one can reign supreme.

Go boom or go bust as you recruit skilled commanders into your army, build a massive war machine, forge brilliant strategies, and order strikes on enemy bases in the most massive free MMO warfare game on mobile!

**GAME FEATURES**

REAL-WORLD ACTION
• Play with thousands of real mobile players as they clash around the world.
• Talk to your war friends and foes alike in the global chat as you plot every strike to grow your empire.
• Build and order ultra-realistic units based on actual modern war machines like mobile artillery, battle tanks and big boom-dropping bombers!

recentChanges: TONS OF FUN!
Airport City's residents are preparing to celebrate St. Patrick's Day!

Holy moly! Have you seen the dancing leprechauns all around the city? Catch them, assemble the collection and get an awesome bonus: a Pot of Gold! It'll increase your commercial buildings' profitability.

Collect Clover for good luck and send flights to Ireland; really get into the festival spirit and have loads of fun! Become good friends with Lady Luck and the unique Leprechaun Museum building will be yours!
summary: Collect all sorts of airplanes, customize your airport, and live like a tycoon!
title: Airport City: Airline Tycoon

comments: Most missions are 1 to 8 hours long leaving you bored and playing other games. Want to do ANYTHING, it'll take real money but gives you nothing in return. Now events keep expanding and back to back. Only way to advance is money. Went from pay to play to cash cow. They have terrible customer service and just ignore emails and they rigged the game so some missions you have to buy things with real money. And they actually punish good players and there is zero recourse.

It is an entertaining game. The latest update won't let me play the game. It states there's an error with the map and to reload again. 24hrs now and I still can't play it. Also very very jumpy and takes a  good few minutes before it takes action and that was before this update. It looks cool and is more interactive but so much slower and frustrating.  Otherwise it would be PRIMO. Just not quite there yet.

My first game glitched and didn't load the free black widow quest, or the black panther event at level six. Be careful about buying buildings you don't need yet, I had no way to buy Club A and had to start over.

Too expensive at times to get the best rewards and all the goals. Love the concept and game play. Some adventures take a bit long.  Used to love this game. Have spent a fortune on it. Since the upgrade hate the gameplay....not that I can play anymore. Since the hulk event the game comes up and then crashes.  Give me my thousands of dollars and hours of time back, since it's now useless to me.

After recent update game is not starting. As it is not working just uninstalled. Installed game as new event has started. I thought developers sorted out the issue. But after starting the game it downloads around 500mb data and stopped working. Wow what a beautiful new event.after new update & bug fix still game not opening.23 March still app is not working.

So, a lot of problems have been fixed and now it's actually enjoyable and fun to play again. Thank you very much. Just a thing left to change, please lower the price for Ranking a character to 5, 20000 credits are hard to get, maybe 10000, or 15000 as well. üòÄ

comments: This game was absolutely perfect and was very much enjoyable, but now to unlock the full experience you have to pay. One of the reasons I enjoy this game and recommended it to my friends is because it is one of the only games that isn't locked behind a paywall. Overall, I have had countless hours playing this game, and trying to land on everything and return successfully. Instead of the microtransaction, why not institute a merit-based system for unlocking parts?

Very great!  Here are a few suggestion from me to make your game more enjoyable :)  1. Can you please make the earth scale correctly because its diameter is around 12.000 km and moon orbit is around 380.000 km  2. Please make a smaller powerful engine like the 9 engines of the falcon 9  3. Please make a button that is simple to cycle from another rocket to another one to ease the attempt of landing a booster  4. Please add an ocean on the earth for some splashdown  5. The last one. Im a free 2 play player and i cant enjoy a majority of the new update :*(

This game is awsome. Loads of fun. Told my friends about it. Could you add a free sandbox mode and more free parts. Thanks. Keep up the good work. Shouldn't have added micro transactions. It just ruined the game for me. Had to take it from a 5 star to a 3 star. Please bear this comment in mind for future updates. This game was 100% free when i downloaded it in december last year. Since then, you added a new build system, free parts which make the game absolutely amazing, and then you add pay for parts. Thats just buzzkill.

Very fast and simple rocket building and great graphics. I wish there was a sandbox mode with infinite fuel. Also there is no indication for loading screens when you hit the launch button. Somethimes you think you tapped the button and end up sitting there for a minute or two wasting time.  Edit So glad they made a small payment option. Well worth the money and glad to support

Great!  Only thing I miss is the ability to rendezvous and dock with another object.  In a moon landing, you could leave a stage in lunar orbit and pick it up for the outbound burn.  Also, karman line should be 100 km??  Edit:. Great updates.  I have no idea how to use docking to reattach parts that have been undocked though.

Can you please add option to center the map on the rocket/vehicle when being in the map mode? It is difficult to switch between near objects in the current version, since I assume the map is stationary relative to the body in which influence sphere we're in at that moment. Also, a "docking guide" would be cool in some future update
description: This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!‚Ä¢ Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.‚Ä¢ Realistic orbital mechanics‚Ä¢ Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.Current planets and moons:‚Ä¢ Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)‚Ä¢ Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)‚Ä¢ Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)‚Ä¢ Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)‚Ä¢ Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)‚Ä¢ Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9CVideo tutorials: Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQMoon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
descriptionHTML:
This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!

• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.
• Realistic orbital mechanics
• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.

Current planets and moons:
• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)
• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)
• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)
• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)
• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)
• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)

Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9C

Video tutorials:
Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQ
Moon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
developerAddress: Leona Zalaznika 4 Maribor
recentChanges: Added: Fairings, Probes, RCS, Solar panels and one new engine [Free].
Increased build space height by 2 [Free].
Added option to get a parts extension with: Docking, Rovers and Big parts and Extra build space (The extension also includes ALL future parts), I really tried to make this the best deal I can :P
Quick fix: Fixed problem with purchase, if your problem is still there, try restarting or reinstalling.
Major performance improvements.
Added clear all debris button.
summary: Space has never been this easy, or this hard!
title: Spaceflight Simulator

comments: Nice game but the way they select the game players within the same "strenght" is unfair. Because they use infamy to measure your lv but at the same time you can get infamy even when you die in the first seconds of a match. In that way you are obligated to face strong enemies because your team is good enought to win the battle without you. In that case the game delievers a bad experience for the player.

Plz push an update to hide chat button during battles, while battle the screen should be much cleaner with minimum icons on screen or transparent eg weapon icon. Auto on off header which shows ship names icons etc to enjoy the game screen on mobile.  Ship score is added but how know the quality / grade /% over the other strong ships where do our ships stand on that point of the certain ship levels.   Sea texture and colour need to be more improved, i really love the water in the poke'go. The way it appers its great. Plz add weather effects lightings nights Strom snowy etc head lights to ships, Reload animations, ship colour paint jobs decals,

Could you fix the guild rivalry page. After battles when people go to check the quests etc. it does not pull up. Have to exit game and restart. Happens a lot and gets frustrating. Other than that it's a very good game

Bear with me here.  How about introducing a pulse that stuns? A yellow item, radius 5, 1 slot point and stun duration probably shorter than the Tesla stun in the respective training level.  OR!  have the fixers pulse gain the ability (training maybe) to stun enemies for like 1-2sec. Same duration as when a Tesla shield is forcefully taken down. (not so sure about the second one, but the first seems good)

I love this game and the fact that all the pictures of the game above aren't hyped up. They are the real game. The game is good and I love being able to select my weapons I'm still figuring the system out completely but it's great overall. The only thing I might ask for is a slightly better tutorial

Edit: The updated version of this game ja madr me dislike playing anymore. We have been playing by the laws and rules of the game upgrading our ships to what were the obetives of the game. Now that we have done this they have changed point system for damage and the fire duration of weapons. Dont fix whats not broken. Plus could there be more maps please. Great game all around. Fun with responsive controls.

descriptionHTML:
Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles – it’s sink or win.

A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.

Mobile MOBA
The thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves – all while you wait for the bus.

Choose A Ship
Choose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality – the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is… speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. Level up your ships for more healing, defense, speed, and firepower!

Weapons, Armor, Items, Abilities
Cannons, torpedoes, grenades – Collect, fuse and modify items to almost infinite variations. Choose from an arsenal of destructive or defensive items to fit your fighting style. Whatever it takes to keep you and your team stay afloat.

Get Strategic
Attack your enemies with a full on offensive assault, or play defense and capture the point. With different classes of ships to choose – each with their own unique abilities, and a motherload of weapons, armor, items, and perks, there is plenty of room for a wide range of battle strategies.

Join a Guild
Team up with your friends in a guild and chat with your guildmates while you send your opponents to the depths. Guild leaderboards pit your crew against other bands of blast-happy captains. Who will rise to the top?

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula

Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.

comments: Nice Game! At the start its easy, like many players said, but maybe they didnt stick through to further their games,I believe the easy start is needed to build for the later part of the games specially if you are a f2p player. Though being F2P isnt as bad here as it is on other games (speaking from experience). I like thier new updates now and specially the "sweep" requirement. Thanks Devs! my only hope is that please make planting/ crops a little easier on us common folks,it gets a little bit tiring to have to press from seed>plant repeat (depending on your available field). Anyway, besides this i do not regret playing the game, easy controls, f2p friendly, graphics is good, controls are good. Keep up the good work devs!looking forward to more updates
For the love of God let me grammar check your game...
Very nice and addictive game, i like it.  Would be nicer if pvp is already availble
Nice game. I just hope more free diamonds to be given during quests :)

Downloaded the game just to see LoL heroes like Ahri and Sona on action only to found out most of them in preview screenshots doesn't exist in-game. But overall a fun game and f2p friendly.  Edit: upped my rating to 5 after 5 days playing, you guys deserve it. Keep up the good work. :)

I thought its good. The game play is so fast and there are other things that are non sense(the trial) you just click the heart multiple times like theres nothing happened when u can  make it just 1 click. Disapponting gameplay. Too easy. I cannot appreciate such game but the controls are good and graphics. Make it hard game. How can this be so important to me if this is so easy?

comments: Some issues. Like *Seven Knights has stopped working* is probably my phone specs is freaking low. Also, I can grt my 1,000,000 gold from logining in for 14 days. It was from the newbie reward. But it keeps popping in the game. And I can't get the 1 million or I can't get it off the screen every time I logined the game. For the gameplay, graphics and all, I have to say this is the first game I actually think is more than decent. More than average, the characters are cute where as the art design during chapters dialogue it is really fantastic. About the story it is cool I loved it. And the gameplay, I pretty much liked the grinding systems. Is like if you are impatient, you can buy something. If you are patient, keep grinding and keep earning. So, this game is my 9.5/10

I'll give you 5 stars if you continue the story, not to release unknown hidden masters anymore.. This game is dying and many of my guild members are leaving this game because, you know, you only care about money... you keep repeating your mistakes by releasing hidden masters, seriously who are they? We need stories go on

Won't let me connect to the server unless I'm connected to a wifi or unless I have ALL 5 bars which really sucks. It used to work fine with just 3 bars but now it wont even work with full bars :/ literally can't play it anymore...

Nothing but praise for this game. Was recommended by a friend and I've never enjoyed a mobile game so much. Hours of time can be killed, each of the hundreds of heroes have unique skills with unique effects. Not hard to get the hang of, and has a wonderful pacing.

Latest update broke my google play connection. It just loops back whenever my brother tries to connect to his google play acct in-game. "Connecting to..." is all he could see and we needed to close the app to stop it. Moreover, when we get in again, it'll still connected to my google play profile and my game acct. Please fix or please tell me how to fix it.

So just got back playing it again after i lost interest for a bit. Then decided it to try it again and wow its good no prblems so far. Sad i missed some updates and events. But oh well my fault. Other than that 10/10

comments: Fun and easy to pick up and learn quickly. The game has nice effects and a huge variety of characters to play an upgrade. Love the auto play button for when I'm doing something around my apartment. I can still play it but not having to keep my eye on it too much. Music and voices can get sort of annoying but that's what a volume button is for right?

One of the better rpg strategy games out. There's a ton of things available to do if you run out of stamina. The main currency is diamonds which you can purchase but surprisingly they are not that difficult to acquire in game.  Overall I recommend it to anyone who enjoyed games like Fate grand order, syd story and dokkan battle.
Its kinda good, not my favorite but still pretty good. Also, J hate that you took Sayori from Doki Doki Literature Club just so you can have it in your commercial. Talk about copy right.

Game is fun. I like the arts of character, well designed but some new arts like Cynthia looks really weird. End game seems alot of harder, and lately requires alot of luck or money to get stuff like skins etc. Still a great game, been playing for over 1 year.

I used to love this game before a few months ago and was having a blast just playing hours on end until the next daily mission. But ever since the update, servers are terribly slow, game always forces out from time to time. Even despite that internet is at a excellent proximity range, the servers are just terrible for some reason which is sad since as an experienced player who been playing and supporting this for over 1 year, it feels as if it's getting worse and worse with each new update
This game has not fixed the commercial issue. Still illegal. Plus the loading screen is taking forever and it seems they did not like my last review so they deleted it.

descriptionHTML:
◎Game Intro◎
Girls X Battle is one of the most popular anime style games in 2016, which contains hundreds of Anime Girls under master summoners command. Girls X Battle is also a game combined with tactics and manually microing features. Each player has to consider not only the skills composition among Battle Girls, furthermore with enhanced gears and timing on skill casting to conquer tough quests, while enjoying competing with other players in PVP.
◎Game Features◎
★Conquer Your Path With Over 100 Battle Girls ★
Girls X Battle’s biggest feature is that we have crafted our characters into Japanese Anime style Battle Girls, hundreds of them are leading by master summoners. Each of Battle Girls has her own background story and unique skills. If you wish to dominate the world of summoners, not only you need to know each of Battle Girls’ unique skills deeply, but also require tactics and powerful composition to defeat your opponents.
★Real-Time Micro, Command Your Battle Girls To Cast Their Ultimate Skills ★
Girls X Battle has the coolest animation effect on each skill cast, while the facial and motions on each girls are carefully crafted and drawn by our designers. Whether during combat or rest, you can see each girl’s motions clearly from walking, swinging her weapon, even when she is seducing. Under master summoners command, you only need one finger to give them your orders.
★Timing Cast On Your Skill，Is The Key To Your Victory ★
Unlike the traditional styles RPG Game without any microing！During the battle you have to observe constantly, along with microing on your girls such as interrupting on your opponent’s skill casting, change on your skill directions, crowd control skills on opponent’s girls etc. Another feature of Girl X Battle，experience the joy of giving your Battle Girls command in the battle field, even players with lower Attack Power can win against players with higher Attack Power!
★Buying Drinks From The Campus Store, Full of Academy Elements ★
It has been a month since summer recess, don’t you miss the breakfast sold on campus? In Girls X Battle，you may even face variety quizzes as in the actual school. Besides the Battle Girls' world we made, there are numerous tasks await you to conquer. If you favor in PVP, try to fight your way up to the Top Floor!
────────────────
Visit Girls X Battle’ official Facebook page to participate on our wonderful events, and earn your great rewards! (Hint: Search Girls X Battle in Facebook)
────────────────
For Latest Events and Guides！！Please Click The Link Below↓
☞Official Facebook Page：https://www.facebook.com/GirlsXBattle/
☞Girls X Battle Customer Service E-mail：gxb@carolgames.com
Our development team will cherish every player for trying Girls X Battle, and thank you for your support!

comments: I absolutely love the story line and I've spent more on the game than I'd like to admit. But spending money doesn't really get you much farther because the energy goes so quickly. I think you would get far better reviews and more happy customers if you got rid of the energy system and upped the ads for more revenue from that standpoint. Then you could keep the micro transactions for the secret scenes. This way you'd still be making money,  but your customer retention would go up. I have so many ideas that would help this app out and I'd love to share them as I love this story. If you are interested in what I have to say please reply

I love the game. Wish we didnt have to pay for every secret scene and had a little bit more energies before having to wait for more or buy some. Would be great if we had more options for free energy. Love the story and characters. Hurry with season two already!!!  Im anxious to see further stories on ryan and the character Lol ‚ù§.

It's really a good game. It's awesome! But that energies are my main problem! Don't you think that...... only 300 energies that means only 30 lines are not enough and too little for a day..!?..!???!.. and 10 energies per line isn't too much!!??! Please make it down to 5 energies for each lines...and only for dialogues.. And if you give 500 or 100 energies (if 1 line cost 5 energies then there will be only 100 or 200 lines. Not much for a whole day!!!!!) and take 10 hours to get free energies again then the game will be perfect!! Everyone can't buy energies (including me)! You know! Please consider this case sympathetically.!.!..  I beg you.....!....

Lovely story line... love story that keeps you coming back everyday.... at times we are urged to buy energies.. however the energy provided gives sufficient dosage of the story each day... sad that it's going to get to the end...  And i wish I could go back and re read certain moments which is not possible.... apart from it.. this is amazing...

Great storylines!!! Great graphics!  However the energy to even do one chapter is way too low!!!  There should be more choices in filling up the energy.  Let your veiwers choose to watch more ad's or something similar to games where each day you can have one chapter and keep the secret moments as a paid option.  I myself would  have more of my friends play,share and even buy if the cost wasn't $100+ for ten chapters!  Oh and FYI check your editing just a few hiccups in a few clips.   Huge fan on the writer/authors...  Very steamy!! Sincerely JR

This game is misleading. You can only play the "secret scenes" if you pay, but the wording makes it sound like your choice so you keep playing in hopes you can see one. And the secret scenes I assume are the ones which actually push the relationship forward. The game staggers and is deeply misleading.

comments: The game itself is wonderful, but I've had this bug ever since Chapter 2 or 3 (I just finished Chapter 12) where when I finish the final level, the screen goes black and won't play the cutscene. I end up having to close the game and never get to see it, then I go into the next Chapter not really knowing what's going on. The story is important to me and it's very unfortunate that this is happening. A fix from the developers or a suggestion on something I can do would be greatly appreciated.

Really enjoy this game.  Just wish we could pay for land expansions because they don't come fast enough.  Running out of room to place everything.  Yes they have the cargo ship but you lose points for doing that.

I play whenever I can. Very Enjoyable!  Love both searching scenes and decorating my island. Love being able to rearrange, and I wish I could move the gifts I receive.  Don't like waiting the 4 hours to regain energy and I would gladly watch ads to be able to fill my energy. It would be nice to have a larger expansion area while needing the same requirements. Love the speciality collections!  Great job!
Game is too slow to progress. You find the clues, you get the flowers but you have to spend DAYS to get stars to progress!
Energy Bar drains too quickly. Other than this very cool game.
I gave 2 stars because the game won't even load since today's update. Fix it and I will consider changing my review.

descriptionHTML:
A hidden object game for story lovers everywhere

Discover June’s Journey, the brand new hidden object game from the makers of Pearl’s Peril. Find hidden clues and solve exciting puzzles across beautiful locations that draw you right into the heart of the mystery!
Surprises at every turn, stunning hand drawn scenes, and a cast of glamorous characters await you in a globetrotting story game. From the heart of 1920s America to the perfect style of Paris and beyond, enjoy a story unlike anything you’ve seen before.
With every new chapter, you’ll sink into a world of thrilling mystery and exciting drama in a story to take you around the world.
Take a break from the stresses of life, and dive into a mystery game like no other.

*MORE THAN JUST A MYSTERY!*
FROM THE MAKERS OF PEARL’S PERIL – The follow-up to the hit hidden object game played by over 90 million fans

MODERN WOMEN – Join June, a brave adventurer in a mystery game you’ll love

Solid game, definitely becoming one of my favorites. Only thing I have an issue with, when we die, respawn us back in the zone we died at, for a chance at claiming our body. Also, a friend system outside of a guild would be great. Chat and trade would make encounters with other players more entertaining. Last thing, classes would complete the game. And don't just do three classes if implemented, do 5 or so. But A+ to the devs for a wonderful game!

Great game, restrictive on recipes, needs to improve learning them better. Durability can improve with repair proficiency. Lower proficiency lower durability,  houses could have durability consistent to material. Stronger longer lasting. Anything and everything on enemies gatherable would be awesome, i.e clothes off walkers armor off knights. Environment growth above dungeons could be progressable. Never completed dungeon no growth completed many times a knight.  Fishing would be nice. Hire vendor would be great in player compound. Upgradable structures is cool. Learning them.

I love this game, very addictive and fun. Few things i would like to see change. When you die you can not always find your body to retrieve your things or get to them due to monster. I uninstalled the sister game because if thia as it become impossible to progress when you loose all your best stuff. Also should include the add option to make energy easy to get.
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!‚óè EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors‚Äô castles to obtain the most valuable resources.‚óè LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands‚Äô most dangerous inhabitants.‚óè IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don‚Äôt forget to explore your enemies‚Äô territory to collect valuable loot.‚óè DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!‚óè SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don‚Äôt miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.‚óè OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.‚óè BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.‚óè JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.‚óè PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you‚Äôll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.‚óè RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There‚Äôs always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that‚Äôs the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.‚óè SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire‚Äôs ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

descriptionHTML:
This soccer simulation game for the Pro Evolution Soccer series has racked up a total of 28 million downloads from all over the globe.
Major update with the 2017/18 roster included.
New elements such as My Hometown area expansions with new facilities, an online live match mode against members in the same Association, and a ""Limit Break"" feature, which extends the players' potential maximum abilities, have been added in the new version.
This world standard of soccer simulation games will continue to evolve.
Test your soccer management skills in various roles, including as a coach, a scout, and a general manager against rivals from around the world!

[PES Console Game Engine on Mobile Devices]
Enjoy playing realistic soccer matches with high-quality 3D graphics and analyzing tactics in realtime on an animated 2D screen.

[Licenses Around the Globe]
Official licenses for popular European and Southern American teams/leagues are included, with more than 5,000 authentic players.

[Soccer Simulation Enjoyable for Core Strategists (Basic Gameplay All Free)]
Simple controls allow you to easily set tactics during matches. The tide of matches will change based on your management skill.
Experience gripping matches in which you are in total control.

[Try out your Soccer Theory in Player Training Mode]
Train players however you want by assigning them to a quality trainer and the training venue of your choice. You can compete against rivals around the world with the team built under your team concept.

[User-Driven League]
No need to log in at a fixed time. Play each season at your own pace.

[Play the Global Standard of Soccer Games for Free]
Winning matches with your own tactics/skills is more satisfying. Win League/Cup rewards to build your team. Bid for players on the market at the lowest price.

We recommend PES CLUB MANAGER if you:
・For those who want to construct a great stadium that will be iconic to the club's fans, just like how Borussia Dortmund did.
・Possess a soccer philosophy like FC BARCELONA.
・For those who are attracted to clubs like Borussia Dortmund, a team that contributes to their hometown and is loved by their local fans.
・Believe tradition is important for a soccer club.
・Think a soccer club can become something more than a ""club"".
・Believe ""winning in a style"" is the ideal victory.
・Think soccer is all about tactics.
・Want to manage a dream team with your favorite players.
・Want to become an owner of a soccer club with a long history.
・Want to test out new soccer tactics.
・Are curious about young soccer stars.
・Are curious about mid-season transfers.
・Watch national matches.
・Root for young players in international tournaments.
・Think training young generations is important.
・Think philosophy is necessary for strong clubs.
・Soccer is your favorite sport.


* PES CLUB MANAGER is a free-to-play app. No purchases are required. All users can play the entire game free of charge, although purchasing PES Coins can speed up gameplay and help to strengthen your club faster. In-app purchases can be disabled by “limiting in-app billing” on the device used.

Required OS: Android 4.2.0 or later
*Operation is not guaranteed on other OSes.

Compatible devices:
https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#compatibilty
*Please note that support is not offered in response to inquiries that involve non-compatible devices.

This is an online game only. Users must be connected to the internet (3G,4G,or Wi-Fi) to play. Internet connection charges may be incurred separately depending on the user's network environment.
Use of this app requires agreement to the app’s Terms of Use, Virtual Currency Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.

License Rights:
https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#license

comments: I used to play this game and it never gave me the option of saving before and it still doesn't. That was over a year ago. I love this game but when I had to get a new phone I had to start all over, so I didn't play for a long time. I just recently redownloaded it and it still doesn't have a save option. When are you going to change that? I play one of your other games and it has a save option. When are you going to give this game a save option because I have mentioned it before and nothing has changed. I want to keep playing but I would also like a Google play save option in case I have to get a new device.

This is a great app. It has great graphics and doesnt make up anything from the actual show like other games do. My little sister is just crazy for this game. She even pursuaded her friends to get this game! Amazing game, no flaws. Definetly worth 5 stars!

I like this game. But there's a bug. When I try to watch a video to play a mini game for free, the video freezes but the pop up ads don't freeze.... It doesn't make sense.  Why add pop up ads when we're already watching them for the free mini games.  At first I couldnt put this game down, I became addicted, but since the bug started to happen, I started to lose interest.

I'm not sure what happened but my game reset. What also stinks is my game used to be glitchy when I'd leave the game a day later and come on, not even two seconds passed in the game. If highly suggest to stay on online mode since that seems like the only mode that keeps time

This is bullcrap! This is the second time this game has all of a sudden stopped working and I cannot get back in to play. I am soo disappointed that you keep letting this happen!! I seriously could use some HELP!!! Please FIX this issuse immediately!!! I want to continue to play MLP... :'(

I will give this game 5 stars if u can get some help.  When ever I try to open my inbox to look at my shards or collect the hearts I have been sent,  my game just crashes. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game,  playing offline,  clearing the cache data and almost everything else I can think of. Also when I try doing anything with twilight I can't do any tasks, plus I can't find twiligr either.  Please help me. I love this game. But I may stop because it keeps crashing

description: Celebrating Spring with our limited-time offers! New players installing the game between March 27 and April 6 will receive THREE Sicarios for FREE!Destroy your enemies and become a powerful Capo - the leader of your own cartel in the official game of NARCOS!Power. Loyalty. Warfare. Product.Step into the dangerous and thrilling role of cartel kingpin in the official game of the hit television show NARCOS. Decide between leading through raw power or gathering respect through loyalty. Sometimes bad people do good things‚Ä¶ In the end you must decide, will it be ‚ÄúPlata o Plomo‚Äù?NARCOSLearn the ropes of running an operation from El Patron himself and manage your ‚Äúrelationship‚Äù with the authorities through agents Murphy and Pena.
