descriptionHTML:
Celebrating Spring with our limited-time offers! New players installing the game between March 27 and April 6 will receive THREE Sicarios for FREE!

Destroy your enemies and become a powerful Capo - the leader of your own cartel in the official game of NARCOS!

Power. Loyalty. Warfare. Product.

Step into the dangerous and thrilling role of cartel kingpin in the official game of the hit television show NARCOS. Decide between leading through raw power or gathering respect through loyalty. Sometimes bad people do good things… In the end you must decide, will it be “Plata o Plomo”?

NARCOS
Learn the ropes of running an operation from El Patron himself and manage your “relationship” with the authorities through agents Murphy and Pena. Enter the world of Narcos with exciting events and updates of content from the show.

Recruit and build
Choose Plata and hire sicarios and build your defenses. Collect different sicarios, level them up and have them defend your base and add bonuses to production.

Wage War
Choose Plomo and send sicario led death squads to take over high value resources from other player cartels.

Profit
Develop your operation by building out your jungle finca with processing plants and labs. Select smuggling lines and plans to maximize revenue.

Cartel
Team up with other players to form cartels, lay siege to enemy cartel compounds in multi-day campaigns for domination.

There is money and power to be made. From now on, nowhere is safe.

About NARCOS:
Narcos is an inside look at the men who would stop at nothing to take down the cocaine drug lords. From the Colombian government to the DEA agents, from the policemen who would risk their lives to the US officials who would spin the story. Narcos is an unfiltered look into the war that would change the drug trade forever.

comments: Love this game  I just wish you got more than 1 or 2 power ups for completing challenges.  I also think the feather rounds should be more often.  Love going back levels to see if i can get the feather.   Coin packages need to be more attractive if you want people to spend real money and tbe power up packages are way too expensive. Still....... i love the game

Well did love the game not now as it's taken me a long time to get off one level even brought more coins just to get. Only just now finished the last one I mean really come on now. Wat a joke  This why I've given a low rate

I'm addicted to the game. The only problem is that you are not given power ups that you earn. I spend good money paying for power ups so, I would like to get the ones that I earn for finishing levels. Thanks.
Previous Connect with FB, Then it's up to level 1100 with coins I have 253 .. But when I invite friends In FB, my level back to 744 .. And I am disappointed

Game coins are very expensive and you don't get much unless you spend the money for the $99.99 package I got better things like clothes and bills and a few new additions to my home before I'd spend it on this game that's for sureüíµüíµüíµüò£üò£üò£üò£

comments: I love all the Is-it Love stories, they're fun and a great distraction. My only complaint is that there isn't enough free daily energy! You only get a teensy bit of the story every day, which is maddening. There should be loads more ways to earn energy, especially like the mini games.

Matt seems like kind of an asshat in Season 2. She should just dump him. Could do way better. Like with Daryl perhaps? He obviously cares for her wayyy more than Matt does. Matt only has eyes for Lana. Like he says he loves our girl? I don't think so. I wish you could choose somebody else to date.

Energy is too short & there isn't anything other than a side game for 100 more points to keep you entertained. The app is basically a story with a couple of nice artistic pictures.  Way over priced. You can buy a book for less at Barnes and Nobles and still get twice the amount in content. The the amount of money they ask for engery in this game is ridiculous. Don't be silly  and spend money that you can do better with. Just play for free or not at all.

I think it's a good game but... Let's be fair you don't get to play for long each day before you run out of energy and have to wait 24 hours and even then it's only a few minutes play.... The lack of play time makes me loose all interest in what I believe might be a decent game

So. This is an addictive store. The main characters are very well thought out. A few Grammer error and hick ups in game play. Although this game can be expensive if you don't make the right choice. I had bought the same secret scene twice and it still asks me to buy it. This is the second time this has happened. All in all great game.

I find it aggravating that your energy goes down so fast. You get a few seconds of free play per day. I've paid to get more. But I can't and won't keep doing that when even paying for extra doesn't last long. üòí

descriptionHTML:
The second Otome Game (dating game) in our « Is it Love? » series, is now available in English.
Try out this brand new love game with a French Touch!

SYNOPSIS

For three months now, you’ve been working at Carter Corp a company founded by the mysterious R. Carter and based in New York.
You immediately get on well with your work colleague, Matt Ortega. A charming and sweet guy, who seems to always find words that make you smile. You feel extremely attracted to him and have set your mind on seducing him. But the moment you move up a gear, his brother steps in and his arrival may well change things...

This is YOUR story!

You are the heroine of this free scenario game! Beyond simply reading, the choices you make influence the story and its final outcome.
New stories and new chapters are regularly released allowing you to live the love story you’ve always dreamed of.

CASTING

Matt Ortega : graphic designer
Teasing, sensitive, creative, sporty.
25 years old, single, epicurean.
Distinguishing feature : Warm­hearted Bad boy.
Star sign : Scorpio.
“I know, I’m so bright that I light up your days”.

Daryl Ortega : Undisclosed.
Insolent, daring, passionate.
25 years old, single, audacious.
Distinguishing feature : Latino Bad boy.
Star sign : Scorpio.
“Each and every forbidden pleasure is worth living”.

Ryan Carter : Founder and director of the company.
Magnetic, charismatic, guiding, bright, intimidating.
28 years old, single, multimillionaire.
Distinguishing feature : Control freak.
Star sign : Sagittarius.
“Miss, there is nothing that I can’t have.”

Mark Leviels : Managing director of a company branch.
Intellectual, ambitious, calm, accessible.
28 years old, work addict.
Distinguishing feature : never without his smartphone.
Star sign : Libra
“Choosing means dropping something. I choose to devote myself to my job.”

Gabriel Simons : Manager
Outgoing, manipulative, insolent, tactile.
28 years old, single, “serial lover”.
Distinguishing feature : Uses his seduction asset.
Star sign : Leo.
“ I fought to get where I am. I know how demanding one must be.”

Cassidy Sparke : Human Resources manager
Cold, haughty, social climber.
25 years old, single.
Distinguishing feature : is very self­confident.
Star sign : Capricorn.
“I can ruin your career with a single snap of my fingers.”

Colin Spencer : programmer
Curt, terse, mysterious;
25 years old, single, somber.
Distinguishing feature : leader of a heavy metal group.
Star sign : Pisces.
“Hey.”

Lisa Parker : secretary
Gentle, sociable, competent, loyal.
24 years old, single.
Distinguishing feature : is always smiling.
Star sign : Virgo.
“On bad days, I look at my smiley post­it and it helps me smile.”

Fantastic illustrations.

The further you go in the Otome game, the more beautiful pictures you will unlock which will illustrate your romance!

But beware of the choices you make! They influence the unravelling of the illustrations and the unlocking of secret scenes! But no worries, you’ll still have the possibility of playing the game or a certain chapter again to unlock the pictures you might have missed!

And much more...

Discover the secret love stories, the new flirt stories and much more.

Follow us on Facebook simply by liking our page: https://www.facebook.com/Is.it.Love.Games.world and stay informed of all our updating news.

Any queries? Any questions? Contact our client support directly in the game’s Menu by clicking on Support or through our website: http://1492studio.freshdesk.com

Free Download

“Is it Love” is a free game. You do however, have the possibility of buying bonus points. You can deactivate your purchase possibilities through your device set-up.

Internet connection required, some additional fees may be applied.

comments: Works great, normally fun and able to gift to friends. Except now it will not open, says to check my internet. Amazingly ever other app, that I have works fine. So what's up with this one. There isn't anyway to contact tech team to fix. It will not open. Please fix, hopefully I haven't lost all my coins, because I can't load this app.

Ok as I am considered a VIP player on this app, the reply from developer should be a pretty good indication of what your in for with this game. I have purchased enough to know that what use to be a pretty good slot has become excessively greedy. I don't mind supporting an app but this one keeps getting worse.

Players Beware !!! Level 25 is a bank buster !!!! Play minimum bets be prepared long stretches of no wins .  None existent scatter bonuses. That's any machine you play you've been warned. 2.5 million coins played 8k per spin same machine never hit the scatter..  85% of wins less than bet ..  Beware !!!
I have not gotten a bonus sent you so-called fixed your games. All it does is spin spin spin. And I did not get a bonus when I leveled up. Hope she will fix this problem soon

I am deleting this game and suggest no one else download it either. I have reported problems several times over the years and never get a response. This latest problem has been going on for days and gotten again no response
I've been robbed. I could not download from any device for 36 hours. I lost my daily bonus and I am starting at day one again. I can't play the wheel bonus yet either. Thanks a lot!

comments: Used to be one of the best time management games available but they no longer fix the glitches.  There hasn't been any updates or new venues for a long time so think the game is being phased out. The game is free but you do need to buy gold with hard cash to progress. No longer worth downloading, my advice is to find something else to play.

It is an awesome game. It is very addictive and I feel very invested in it. If you don't want to spend any of your real money to buy gold, you sure don't need to. It takes a hell lot more to get everything you want but it's still playable. It has some bugs, sure, specially regarding your wireless connecting but it's nothing major. The levels are really hard sometimes but makes up for the good challenge. Thanks, devs, for the awesome game

I love this game. I play it almost everyday. The only thing I don't like is when you spend your supplies to play even when you win you still lose those supplies to play instead of keeping your supplies so you can continue to play on. Other then that. It's amazing. So download this app and have some fun today, tomorrow, or whenever you have some past time. Thanks Chef Ramsay.

I love the game. But there's some bug issues like   1) login to claim 10golds - didn't happen. Where'd the gold? 2) now I can't even login to social. It keep loading, then kinda leave it at that.   I would rate it 5 stars once this is resolved. It's really getting on my nerves.

Game could be cool but has way too much stuff crammed into the tiny screen of most phones. Graphics need to be simplified so that you can see things easier. Overall, the game freezes and crashes every time I try to play. Spend more time making this game stable and easy to see and it might be more fun.

Up until five days ago I wasn't having any problems with this game and I played it nearly everyday. Now I can open the app but nothing happens when I click on any part of the game. This has kept me from being able to do anything with the game for nearly a week. I've missed out on events and opportunities to move up on leaderboards. Please fix the app. I enjoy the game and I don't want to lose progress because of a technical error.

comments: Cannot get in touch with support. When Pennypop ran the game, they were very helpful and easy to get ahold of. Now I can't reach anyone and my account is in limbo (even after having been a dedicated player years ago). Be warned, it's not the game it was and until it steps up on customer service, I wouldn't put any money into it.

Tried reinstalling on a new device and it couldn't connect to facebook. Couldn't recognize my email (even though I get emails from them). Kept trying to get me to make a new account. I'm sorry, but when I play something off and on for roughly half a decade, then I'd like for the app to work so I can retrieve my account. Fix it, and I'll change my review because I really do love this game.

I'll give this game a higher rating only if the game support will release my epic monster, which is permanently locked for mission at the dig site. A glitch that they fail to do anything. No response, no support.

I'm revising my review.. I use to love this game. Now it's becoming more like a pain in my behind to even play. The game is not allowing me to do normal things that I'm suppose to be able to do. It's really making me angry!
I really love the hell out of this game.. Those haters who say its slow its not.. your phone is. your CPU is tacy as F plz don't blame the game..

Takes 2 mins to load then you have to press "try again" 20 times then wait for 2 mins and repeat everything 100x before it can load then just after you beat a boss you have to press try again 100x then it crashes. Best game ever.

comments: Cost of everything in the game is particularly high. And gems??? Don't even get me started.  They just dropped some limited time dragons in the game, and the cost of EACH them is OVER $100 if you haven't been able to earn that many gems in game yet.  Which takes a very, very long time.  Uninstalling today, casual players beware.

Very relaxing game. I wouldn't say it's a "time killer" because after playing for hours you'd probably spend a lot of cash out of your pocket, if you don't want to pay this game calls for lots of patience. If you have PATIENCE you will NOT have to buy anything. I've been playing for almost 2 years now and I have only spent 30$ on the game and not because I felt like i had to but because I just wanted to; to speed the game play up a bit. I have gotten every dragon so far, even the event dragons, and limited time dragons, etc. Without  having to spend any gems. Sometimes it takes days of breeding the same pair but it will work if your persistent and patient! :)

Concept-wise the same as with many breeding games. It's fun, a nice game to have for here and there.  Generally good ideas were implemented into this game. Most dragon designs are really good. Unfortunately I don't understand some of the mechanics in the game like removing something from the market makes you lose this item? I mean the last time I have opened a market on the street, I kept my things I put for sale. :? Please fix those logic flaws.

It's fun enough if you don't take it too serious. I could write a long review but I was in the middle of playing when the game kept asking for a review, kind of annoying. But in all honesty this is one of two games I have consistently played for a long time now, so I really do like it.

I really love this game...i have this one and the other DragonVale. I have alot of fun with my grandkids breeding the different dragons. I will say tho that I would have given this 5 stars all the way across if it didn't take so long to get some of the dragons. We have been trying for the Knarr dragon for months and can not get it. It is very frustrating. If it wasn't for the new events that give us a chance to breed new dragons I am afraid I would have uninstalled this due to it taking wayyyyyyy to long to breed certain dragons.

I've been playing this game for a LONG time. And it continues to keep my interest! It's so fun! And with the constant release of new dragons and events, it stays fun. I wish there were more events, but Hey! It's a great game! Expand that market place though...

descriptionHTML:
We’ve hatched an all-new DragonVale game! Enter a magical 3D world of dragon-filled adventures.

Once you start collecting, you won’t stop. These fiery buddies love to roam and they need a skilled curator to help them thrive and explore.

Build habitats, farm plots, and other creature comforts to make your dragon sanctuary a paradise. More dragons will fly in as they see your experience grow. It’s up to you to discover every dragon in the land and record it in your magical Dragonarium ledger. Trade resources with other players, visit their parks, and gift gems to each other in a bustling community. There are also structures to help power up your park like the Boost Brewery and the Arcane Airship. Save up the right materials, and you’ll be able to customize your strategy.

-Discover over 280 dragons
-New Crystals guarantee an enchanted dragon
-An epic Zodia dragon flies in every month
-Bring back almost any dragon with the Bring ‘Em Back boost!
-Keep limited-time dragons around a bit longer with the Encore Boost
-Brew potions to speed up nearly everything, even brewing other potions!
-Increase your desired breeding odds with the Rarity Remedy boost
-Feed dragons to make them grow from baby to juvenile to adult
-Experiment with spells to alter dragon appearances
-Elevate your park with a dizzying array of decorations
-Complete quests and Airship orders for rewards
-Participate in limited-time events to discover brand new dragons and decorations
-Meet the witches and wizards that help you maintain and upgrade your park
-There are even stories to read about your favorite dragons!
-By the way, there’s a free reward every day just for checking in on your dragons

Install DragonVale World for FREE today!
PLEASE NOTE! DragonVale World is completely free to play, but some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases. DragonVale World requires an internet connection to play.
______________________________
DragonVale World is brought to you by Backflip Studios, makers of absurdly fun mobile games and proud partner of Hasbro, Inc.

I just wish there was that option on here

Build a rising kingdom, research technologies, upgrade arsenal, train warriors, cavalries, giants, dragon knights, and elf archers. Travel back to the age of Empires, join a powerful alliance and engage in real time PVP combat. If you are a fan of empire games, and with ambitions for world domination, this cool game is unmissable. Write your name into the history of Rome as the emperor of a powerful, rising kingdom. Recruit and train warriors, cavalries, giants, dragon knights, and elf archers. Join the millions of global hardcore players in the real time social system. Combine forces with your friends to fight in formation and conquer your enemies and occupy their kingdoms. Defend your city and fortress from those who would occupy or destroy it and face some of the most dangerous combat ever seen in the history of Rome.If you‚Äôre a hardcore fan of war and empire games and you‚Äôre looking for a new warrior game, then look no further! Train your warriors to fight in formation watch on as they defend your fortress.*Research and upgrade innovative technologies that can boost your resource production and your combat abilities (Attack/Defend).*Join your friends to form a mighty Alliance.*Lead huge armies in real time PVP and Inter-Server battle.*Conquer the enemy and occupy their territory. *Employ cunning tactics and formations and organize your plans to defeat the enemy emperors.*Chat with players across the world, any time. Organize your campaign in your own chat group.*Use diplomacy and work together with allies to succeed in conflict.*Train heroes and upgrade their leadership skills to get the upper hand on the enemy.*Watch your battles play out in real time on the world map.Experience true power in a true epic Roman strategy MMO! Control every aspect of your territory from building, resource production, the research of technology and ancient tactics in this cool RTS game. Your leadership style will determine what a successful emperor you are.Recruit the best soldiers! A powerful army can help you expand and protect your territory. Train warriors to lead your cavalry troops into conflict and watch the conflict in real time!Forge powerful alliances with global hardcore players! Band together with your allies and face the ancient world as one Alliances. Empire: Rome Rising, the epic war game of Roman Empire is waiting for you to join the battle to rewrite history of Rome and Europe! Build a rising kingdom, research technologies, upgrade arsenal, train warriors, cavalries, giants, dragon knights, and elf archers. Travel back to the age of Empires, join a powerful alliance and engage in real time PVP combat. If you are a fan of empire games, and with ambitions for world domination, this cool game is unmissable.
Write your name into the history of Rome as the emperor of a powerful, rising kingdom. Recruit and train warriors, cavalries, giants, dragon knights, and elf archers. Join the millions of global hardcore players in the real time social system. Combine forces with your friends to fight in formation and conquer your enemies and occupy their kingdoms. Defend your city and fortress from those who would occupy or destroy it and face some of the most dangerous combat ever seen in the history of Rome.
If you’re a hardcore fan of war and empire games and you’re looking for a new warrior game, then look no further! Go back to the age of Empires and build a dynasty that will stand the test of time!
Features Overview
*Free to play this epic strategy MMO of Roman war.

*Research and upgrade innovative technologies that can boost your resource production and your combat abilities (Attack/Defend).
*Join your friends to form a mighty Alliance.
*Lead huge armies in real time PVP and Inter-Server battle.
*Conquer the enemy and occupy their territory.
*Employ cunning tactics and formations and organize your plans to defeat the enemy emperors.
*Chat with players across the world, any time. Organize your campaign in your own chat group.
*Use diplomacy and work together with allies to succeed in conflict.
*Train heroes and upgrade their leadership skills to get the upper hand on the enemy.
*Watch your battles play out in real time on the world map.
Experience true power in a true epic Roman strategy MMO!
Control every aspect of your territory from building, resource production, the research of technology and ancient tactics in this cool RTS game. Your leadership style will determine what a successful emperor you are.
Recruit the best soldiers!
A powerful army can help you expand and protect your territory. A city without an adequate army will become easy prey!
Battle together in real time!
Use tactics and strategy to set up your army and conquer your foes. Train warriors to lead your cavalry troops into conflict and watch the conflict in real time!
Forge powerful alliances with global hardcore players!
Band together with your allies and face the ancient world as one Alliances. Set your formations and organize your attacks and defensive schemes before conquering and occupying new kingdoms.
Research technologies that will help gain the winning edge!
A civilization is only as good as its technology. The higher the level of your technologies, the more you will gain from them in terms of resource production and combat ability.
Play the role of the hero in a beautiful Roman world!
Become a powerful leader in an RTS, historical world with great graphics. Experience the feeling of using tactics and legionaries, giants, archers and catapults on an assault to occupy and become a legendary emperor of countless ancient cities.

descriptionHTML:
■ Intro

Pokémon Duel is a strategy board game that uses Pokémon figures. Build a deck with your favorite figures and then leap into a League Match! Compete with players from around the world for a chance to enter the top League rankings in League Matches. You'll fight your rivals in real time! Win duels, get all kinds of cool figures and items, and make your deck stronger!

The rules are simple! The object is to be the first player to get one of your figures to your opponent's goal. How will you get to the goal? You'll need to carefully choose your route! In duels, you and your opponent take turns moving your figures. Set up a strategic formation and attack your opponent, or simply block their path—it's all about tactics! Plan your strategy and defeat your opponents in this game of cat and mouse!

In duels, your deck is composed of 6 Pokémon figures. There are all kinds of figures, each with different moves and abilities. Keep this in mind as you build your own custom deck!

Make use of your custom deck and the AI! The AI is a reliable ally who will determine good moves and take your turn for you. Make full use of the AI and crush your opponents!

■ Notes
- Terms of Use
Please read the Terms of Use before using this application.

- Device settings
You may not be able to launch this application, depending on your device’s settings and/or how it is used. In order to maintain fairness among players, some functions may become inaccessible if certain operations (such as jailbreaking) have been performed.

- Before making purchases
Android OSversion 5.0 or higher is required for this application. Available features may depend on your device’s OS version.
Please make sure that you can use the free-of-charge features of this product with no issues on your device before you make purchases.
Certain devices and/or configurations may also cause the application to fail to work.

- Device settings
You may not be able to launch this application, depending on your device’s settings and/or how it’s used. In order to maintain fairness among players, some functions may become inaccessible if certain operations (such as rooting) have been performed.

- For inquiries
Please visit support.pokemon.com to report issues about Pokémon Duel.

Now its TOO hard to gain coins to open cars and much exciting tracks.. no updates on additional tracks.. think the optjons should be reviewed. Its now once you get where you are the only way to gain more is to go online to TRY and get coins to get anywhere... which sucks!!!!!

descriptionHTML:
THE MOST WANTED DRIFT GAME EVER
More than 30,000,000 people around the world downloaded CarX!
Warning! Be careful, this application may attract you on many hours, don't forget to have a rest at least every 40 minutes!

THE REAL DRIFTING SIMULATOR
- CarX Drift Racing gives you a unique experience in the handling of sport cars by the simple and the intuitive way
- If you like to drift, get ready to spend many hours playing this game
- Use separate handbrake button to start drifting
- Paint donuts burning tires
- Animation of the deep smoke while drifting

THE MOST REALISTIC MOBILE RACING GAME
- Insane feeling of powerful sport cars
- Unique driving on different surfaces - asphalt, grass, sand
- Racing on high detailed tracks
- You can customize your handling scheme
- You can select different setups for every car - Stock, Turbo, Racing, Drift
- You can change color of your car and discs
- Live cameras and replays
- You can upload your best replays to youtube

CAREER MODE
- Win cups and earn coins
- Unlock 40 sport cars and new tracks
- Ghost Mode for competing with your best race

ONLINE WORLD TIME ATTACK CHAMPIONSHIP
- Compete with your friends and beat world records
- Time attack racing mode with worldwide ranking

TRUE ENGINE AND TURBO SOUNDS
- Original engine sound for every car
- Simulated turbo sound and the blow off valve!

ADDICTIVE MUSIC
NEW licensed sound tracks


TIPS:
- Your COINS, unlocked cars and tracks are saved on your device
DO NOT DELETE game before you update it, or all your progress will be LOST!
- To make game run faster close all another applications in task manager
[double click round button and drag another applications upside]
- LIKE facebook.com/carx2 for news and updates

If you like to play high-end racing games, get ready to spend many hours playing CarX.
Enjoy your time with CarX Drift Racing!

comments: I have played this game a long time.  It asked me to update now it doesn't work!  It opens up one step and that's all it does.  I wish I hadn't updated!  Please help.  I played this game with a lot of people.  It was my favorite ga   me.  Want to play again!!!!                            It now works but you started me over and took all my life's I had saved up.  I was on level 700.  I used to really like this game and played it every day.  I hope I don't have to delete this game because I am not starting over!  Put me back where I was with my life's!

Fun BUT SUPER GLITCHY! It will close itself out causing you to lose progress and rewards. It will also occasionally restart your phone. When you ask for help they will always 1st ask "is this the most updated edition", even if you already told them you game is on automatic update. Its a good game, just frustrating to deal with

March 15, 2018 update fixed what the March 9 one broke! THANK YOU! I love this game. ‚ù§
Lags a bit. Some times the whole screen goes black and I have to start all over.
Does not fully load when I am connected online. Please fix.

descriptionHTML:
To be the greatest, you gotta learn from the greatest. In the post-prohibition world of weed farming, elevated entrepreneur Wiz Khalifa teaches you how to plant, grow, and harvest the finest herb on earth in this epic new game.

Follow in Wiz Khalifa’s footsteps as you build your own weed empire from the ground up.

- Tap to plant and grow quality kush for your clients
- Swipe to get your weed to market and get your paper up
- Invest your profits to expand your grow operation
- Boost your harvest with hydroponics and LED grow lights
- Find friends on Facebook and grow the best buds with your best buds
- Level up to unlock accessories and rare mystery strains

Please note that Wiz Khalifa’s Weed Farm is free to download and play. Some in-game items are available for purchase using real money.

comments: Would be 5 stars if I could get back into the game. Have tried uninstalling but it still keeps crashing after the loading screen. A Mikaela screen comes up with a Start Download button and it crashes on this screen.  Update: I can't login on your website to log a ticket with your support team.

I do miss the old LOA - Fire Raider style of art and play, just came back after maybe a year or so and it was gone! But, Paradise seems pretty cool so far, only thing I'm not a big fan of is how everything deals with irl money while in the 'old' one you could build up gems or materials for certain things like VIP levels; also I heard about rewards being given to old players like me? That's pretty cool, will have to check that out... But yea, so far I like the game, miss the old style but it's still good to me, will update this later on when I play more.
Gave you people an opportunity to fix the stupid chibi icon characters. The latest update didn't fix that so uninstalled.  Also do not reply with a generic response cause you can kiss my ass

Only challenging for nonpaying playing. Not a big fan of pay to win games. But LoA is always addicting and just makes you want to spend your money. Not suitable if you're addicted to that overall. More nonpaying support would be reasonable for them to at least be able to compete.

Latest updates just added more to this already enjoyable game.  However I wouldn't encourage new players to spend any money on the game as the benefits are nonexistant for what you pay. Which means a limited lifespan for the game if no one is paying.  Still a good game to enjoy on a mobile device.

descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!

Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！

An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.

When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.

Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels!

[Game Introduction]
The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.

Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.


[Game Features]

Superb Visual Presentation:
- Stunning combat effects
- Dynamic 3D scenery
- Exquisite character art and design

Engaging Strategy:
- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil
- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategy

Multiple Progression Methods:
- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team
- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential
- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones
- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strength

Wide Variety of Gameplay:
- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre
- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!
- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals
- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goals


Visit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/
Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/
developerAddress: 12/F San Toi Bldg,137 - 139 Connaught Rd C,Sheung Wan,Hong Kong

summary: Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG AdventureÔºÅ
title: League of Angels-Paradise Land

comments: Love this game but when you are competing with SWGOH for mobile SW content I expect it to be better end game and more Special events. At lvl 8 and there's no more rewards or incentives , so I guess I'm done.   Also, As a busy person I have limited time to play and taking the entire game offline for maintenance, like right now is not a good way to keep me interested.  Dumb move devs.   Edit: good job with update but still need light and dark missions past level 7

You should be matched with someone in your Tier, not 4 Tiers above you. When you play against fellow Guild Members you shouldn't have your levels edited. There should be an option to leave matches during the match. It doesn't make sense to lose because you had something else to do. And here's my biggest problem "Oh hey, you won that match, here's 30 points." "Oh you lost that match? Lemme just have 51 points from you." It also doesn't make sense to have heroes with blasters against melee heroes. They end up at a disadvantage.  Fot example, I was just matched with a level 3 Kylo Ren, as a level One Padme. Sooo fair.

First the unbalance between the factions. Now the match making.. Are you folks fckng serious about it? Your matching a lvl 11 to 13 or 14? How could I win with my lvl 10 troops vs lvl 15 troops? No matter which side I play.. I have a lvl 3 hux and your great system matches me to a lvl 5 anakin with lvl 13 af walkers? Tell me this is a joke.

Won't let me put cards down at mid Battle again and again. Connection will slow you down not your opponent it seems run into this issue way to much. Then issues like won't let you move or play anything but energy goes up

Absolutely love this game. As a life-long Star Wars fan this ticks NEARLY all of the boxes. However, there is one thing that bothers me, hence the "nearly". And that is the matchmaking. I'm in tier 5 division 3, and for some reason it decides to pick a person from tier 7 division 2. Of course, I lost because it's unfair. Please sort this out.

My favorite game on mobile right now. It's a mix between a MOBA(League of Legends)  and Clash Royale. You control a hero AND manually deploy different troops in your lane. I've never spent a dime and own all the heroes in game so it is not really pay to win at all. All around great game.

descriptionHTML:
In Star Wars™: Force Arena, players will fight in some of the most intense real-time multiplayer battles in the galaxy!

Lead your own customized squad of Star Wars™ units into intense action-packed skirmishes requiring both elevated strategy and direct control.

Unleash powerful abilities that can single-handedly turn the tide of battle as you deploy a wide array of special cards to reach your ultimate goal: the destruction of your opponent’s shield generator.

Star Wars™: Force Arena seamlessly blends a robust character collection system, advanced upgrades, and intuitive touch controls to deliver the ultimate mobile gaming experience.

Lead your squad. Master the arena!


● BATTLE or join forces with other players and friends from around the globe in real-time 1v1 or 2v2 PvP arena battles.

●LEAD a team of iconic Star Wars™ troops, including Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, General Grievous, Han Solo, Princess Leia, and even new Star Wars™: The Last Jedi characters such as Rey and Kylo Ren!

● COLLECT character cards and upgrade your favorites Star Wars™ units while leveraging powerful character duos that boost your effectiveness in battle.

● COMPETE to earn rewards, special characters and other bonus items by participating in events as you climb to the top of the leaderboards on your journey for galactic dominance!



※ This app offer in-app purchases. You can disable this feature by adjusting your device’s settings.

By downloading this game, you are agreeing to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 3 years of age to play.

- Terms of Service: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/terms_of_service.asp?locale=en
- Privacy Policy: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/privacy_policy.asp?locale=en

I really like how you can choose the speed at which the balls are dropped and read out.  Perfect for someone like me who never plays bingo, so if I miss a number or two I get so flustered that I end up missing all the rest of the balls. Not anymore. I can pause the drop, there is a chart down the side just in case and the cards will give a tick if that number has just been drawn. And also flashes to let you know that you are one ball away from bingo.  This is in novice mode but it can be changed to suit everyone's needs.  Well done. Finally a game of bingo that I can actually play.

4 Stars I enjoy Bingo Heaven very much. I really like bingo games and this is one of my top five best and favorite games to play anytime! I really enjoy the different levels and rooms you can play to increase your tokens.             Not only do I play for enjoyment, I also use it distraction. Bingo Heaven is 1 of the games that helps to keep my mind from focusing solely on the pain I am experiencing and adding some fun into my life when I can't do very many physical activity. My favorite is special rooms.

Amazing It is awesome, it is a good time passer.I started at 8:30 then the next time I looked at the time after it it was 9:30. It is super addictive. It does drain your batterie though. One thing I would change though is if when you choose one card if another card poped up next to it on your tablet, phone, whatever and it started playing against you. That would give a little more challenge. It would make it a little more fun. I am going to tell my friends to try and get this so that we can play it together. Thanks

Im enjoying this but I would like to be able to see who Im up against and how we are all doing. A good positive for me is that the basic charts and ball numbers are clear and crisp.  I found a special room game but the pics were a bit difficult for me at times and although I won bingo on one of my two cards, I didnt get paid. Also I needed to slam the bingo button a few times before it reacted

comments: This game is very fun and addicting. My only complaint is there isn't enough variation in the astromons. Some of them you can tell they are based off of a certain elemental character that's say...water but then the fire version is the same looking just red instead of blue. It's strange. Maybe change up how they look a bit more like in Pokemon with all of eevee evolutions. But then again it's a free game and I have been having a blast playing it. Thank you.

As a beginner in the game, all the interaction menus and stuff you need to get to, or just wanna check out, take way to long to get to, as they're complicated and hold a lot of the game in them. It'd be great if there were an easier way to figure out what they do, to get the most out of the game as a newbie, instead of going through 30 tutorials of their own to find out. Otherwise, I love the gameplay, characters, and art. Great game all in all.

It's nice overall. But you gotta spend a lot if you want 5 star units. I already did 3-4 600 gem summons and everytime they just give you 1 4stars unit the rest are 2 and 3 stars even when they say 'chances up'.

Please fix the constant crashing during clan battles. Other than that its a wonderful games. Also it's becomes harder get gold as you level up which sucks. I love the game. Cute astromon, Wonderful evolutions, and even a nice story!

so I have been playing this game for awhile now and the only major flaw I have found is that if you choose to pay for astrogems they are ridiculous expensive for pretty much nothing. I understand it is probably so it doesn't come as a pay to win game but ya. Also I wish appearance rates for rares and up for better.  I love this game. Really not an understatement. It's the perfect time killer and for me I doesn't get old. The only thing I would change is on the hard and extreme levels I wouldn't have the astromon revert to their original forms after you catch them.

There is no other game that I have ever found quite like Monster Super League. It's fun to play, the monsters have great designs, and while spending real world money is an option, it's not required to progress. And progressing without spending money is easy. I wish there were more games like this one out there.

descriptionHTML:
# Adventure with the Astromons!
Monster Super League summons you to the fantasy world of Astromons!
From cute to stylish, catch & collect monsters of all sizes and shapes!
Collect over 550 types of Astromon in Monster Super League!

# I Choose You!
Catch wild Astromons out there in the field, or summon them by hatching the mysterious eggs!
Collect & evolve your favorite Astromons!

# Evolve and Grow!
Your Astromons will evolve to change in looks and gain additional skills.
Sometimes, they will evolve into very rare variants with even more power!

# Strategic Combat!
Even the same Astromons can differ by attributes & combat style.
Build your team to adventure through over 100 stages in various natural environments!

# Populate your Airship!
Astromons you catch & summon get to live on your airship.
Sometimes you might even have a surprise visitor!

# Socialize with friends!
Summon your friends from all around the world to chat and exchange gifts and tips!

# Become stronger in your own way!
Collect Astromons with different attributes to build your own best team.
Grow your Astromons faster by feeding fruits, and unlock additional powers with special runes!

# Immersive Content!
Dive deep into the story of Astromons through 8 different regions!
Challenge yourself in daily Dungeons for better rewards!
Battle against other players in the Astromon League!

Access requests for gameplay (Game services restricted if disabled)
1) Only for game installation purposes, this application requests access to external memory.

▷Monster Super League Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/monstersuperleague
Follow up on the latest news and events on the Monster Super League official community!

comments: I really love the characters. I also love how they all have there own troubles and personalities.

I love the game, played it for just one day. While I was playing it basically didn't let me collect rewards, so I exited the app and tried again, It just showed visual shower with background music. So I uninstall it and and installed it again. It won't get past Visual Shower screen.

As much as the game looks great and really fun to play its just I can't play it! Cause when I load the game it can't even pass the visual shower screen so im basically stuck listening to music while looking at the company's name and can't even play the game at all!!!!

On the real this game is awesome don't care what no one says just wish they had better discount and I play this all the time and akasha should be able to heal all team members to at least 95% or 100% when she completes her training
This is one of my favorite games of all time. I really love  the story, the gameplay and the designs of the characters. It's a really fun and enjoyable game that I can never get bored of

comments: I used to love this app. Now, they have removed the feature to watch a video for bonus rolls, scratchers rarely give any bonus rolls, and the game is so obviously rigged so you can't win that it will now be uninstalled and I will go with a Yahtzee type game that isn't so GREEDY! There are plenty of other apps, Scopely. You should at least bring back videos for bonus rolls. Game isn't fun without them. This game sucks now!

Love this game when it is working. Often has problems  opening. Requires  clearing cache etc and trying  again. Have had to uninstall it, then reinstall it, more than once. With last update, I had to reset my Galaxy tab4 7.0  back to manufacturer  settings, in order to get it to work. Lost all info.  I just uninstalled  it again. And again, I cant get it to reinstall, even after deleting several other apps, including facebook.   UGH!  -„ÄãThey do have great customer  service.  I just wish I didn't  need to use them all the time. At some point it won't  be worth it.  But I really do like it, when  it works!

I really enjoyed this game.  I have no problems with the app.   However, I would have gave it a five but the scratch offs are a joke.  They have 10 to 100 that never come in. I have been a member for years now.    So if you trying to get extra plays from scratch offs don't spend real money. Just play more.

Game seems to be a decent Yahtzee clone. I got it to play with friends and family. Unfortunately it requires you to hook up to Facebook or create and hookup to a Google+ account through Google Play. That's a big nope from me. (Words with Friends doesn't require it, so it can easily be done.)

I really liked playing the game. However, the format of the board is way too big. I have to constantly scroll to see what play I want to make. Slows the game down so much. Put the board back to normal size and single screen with no scrolling. Scratchers need to be a little more generous. The dice masters cheat. Miraculously they roll 5 of a kind to win the game on the last roll. Not cool. Used to be a favorite, but might stop playing.

I like the game, but wonder if you'll ever offer players the chance to unlock some new dice with diamonds. I bet I'm not the only player who has purchased every design possible. Now I'm sitting on over 20K in diamonds. For what?
description: Dice With Buddies puts a new spin on one of your favorite classic dice games by letting you play multiplayer board games for free with friends, family, or random opponents! Share the fun and play free dice games whether your opponent is sitting next to you or is thousands of miles away! Roll the dice with all your friends in a fun new social board game experience!Board games are now even easier and more exciting to play! Take on opponents with brand new Custom Dice, an improved interface, Biggest Winner events and premium dice tournaments! Play this exhilarating board game from the same account on any Android tablet or phone! Roll the dice with all your friends in a fun new social board game experience!How to Play Dice with Buddies:Dice With Buddies is a dice game where players need to score as many points as possible, by rolling five dice to make different combinations. This free dice game consists of 13 rounds with the scorecard having 13 categories. In each round, you can roll the dice up to three times and choose which scoring category is to be used for that round. Once a category has been used in the game, it cannot be used again. To get the best dice score, a player would have to roll five-of-a-kind and score 50 points; the highest of any category. The winner is the player who scores the most points.This dice game has also been referred to as Poker Dice since there combinations such as Full House, Three of a Kind, Four of a Kind, Small Straight, Large Straight ‚Äì all that resemble Poker.If you love Yathzee, Yatzy and Farkle you would love Dice With Buddies! descriptionHTML:
Dice With Buddies puts a new spin on one of your favorite classic dice games by letting you play multiplayer board games for free with friends, family, or random opponents! Share the fun and play free dice games whether your opponent is sitting next to you or is thousands of miles away! Roll the dice with all your friends in a fun new social board game experience!

Board games are now even easier and more exciting to play! Take on opponents with brand new Custom Dice, an improved interface, Biggest Winner events and premium dice tournaments! Play this exhilarating board game from the same account on any Android tablet or phone! Roll the dice with all your friends in a fun new social board game experience!

How to Play Dice with Buddies:

Dice With Buddies is a dice game where players need to score as many points as possible, by rolling five dice to make different combinations. This free dice game consists of 13 rounds with the scorecard having 13 categories. In each round, you can roll the dice up to three times and choose which scoring category is to be used for that round. Once a category has been used in the game, it cannot be used again. To get the best dice score, a player would have to roll five-of-a-kind and score 50 points; the highest of any category. The winner is the player who scores the most points.

This dice game has also been referred to as Poker Dice since there combinations such as Full House, Three of a Kind, Four of a Kind, Small Straight, Large Straight – all that resemble Poker.

If you love Yathzee, Yatzy and Farkle you would love Dice With Buddies! Play this classic dice game with your friends and family, and prepare to have fun!

===Dice With Buddies Features===

Board Games with Buddies! Multiplayer Games and More:
• Dice tournaments give you a new thrilling challenge each day!
• Dice Master Showdown! Beat the daily Dice Master for huge XP and bonus dice roll prizes!
• Dice tournaments give you a new thrilling challenge each day!

Dice Game Bonuses
• Dice games come with in-game scratchers to win bonus dice rolls
• Activate a bonus dice roll to get an extra boost right when you need it

Social Games with Friends
• Play with friends and family through Facebook
• Multiplayer games with random opponents – Play dice games with players around the world
• Dice game chat room – Joke and heckle with your opponents!

Dice Game Customization:
• CUSTOM DICE – Personalize your board game experience!
• Test your dice skills to level up your frames by earning Achievements!

Fans of card games and fun social experiences will LOVE Dice With Buddies! Addictive games with friends await in Dice With Buddies! Download today and roll the dice on your Android device!

descriptionHTML:
"A much-anticipated IDLE RPG masterpiece on Google Play Store!!!”
March your way through the evil lands, crush the gigantic bosses and free the princess in the epic IDLE role-playing game, Crush Them All.
Tap with one finger, collect and upgrade hundreds of heroes, find powerful artifacts and progress in this never-ending journey even while taking a break!

GAME FEATURES:

★ IDLE GAME :
Setup your heroes and let them fight while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger and will have collected tons of loot.

★ COLLECT and UPGRADE heroes to crush stronger enemies along your journey

★ EXPLORE 1000+ stages

★ GUILD RAID BATTLES :
Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy!

★ CRAFT 50+ powerful artifacts to give your heroes more powers


PLEASE NOTE! Crush Them All is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crush Them All.

A network connection is also required.
developerAddress: 208 Rocky Point Rd, Palos Verdes, 90274 CA
recentChanges: Welcome to the 1st update of the year. Great new features are packed in this update.
- New Expeditions to reward relics, gems, flooz and medals
- New VIP program to reward players for playing, watching ads and being supportive.
- Slay Bosses: new Star Fever event + 300e do much more damage than before
- Awakening improves your hero's stats by 2x
- Dungeons can be raided without entering the battle.
summary: The unique IDLE RPG on Google Play. Upgrade your heroes and battle for victory!
title: Crush Them All

comments: It needs an option to turn the sound off independently. I don't want to have to constantly turn my media volume level up and down every time I begin or end playing the game. Sometimes two ads in a row before you can get back to the game. Otherwise it is a satisfying games to play.

I really like it. Has your mind thinking. I like the fact that after awhile if you don't get the word it helps you out without having to use the hint option. Even my 9 year old likes it.. he plays it with me sometimes

Great game to pass the time away. My only gripe is the daily challenges, the timings don't really work for me so I often miss the morning ones. Would be better if it went midnight to mid-day and then mid-day to midnight.

It's not very challenging like some of the other word games I've played. I was at level 50 in a matter of mins. To me anyway thats way too easy. My 4 yr old granddaughter could probably play this game with ease

Good game. Does have alot of adverts u can claim coins so far on level i am at. Played b4 a while ago and i could only claim 4 times coins for over 24 hours. Maybe once u get to certain level u can only purchase coins. But generally good game. Still  good game thank you.

My sister introduced me to this game and I am addicted!!!!!!. I find it challenging And like that they will give you a hint so that you can clear that level and be able to move on. Thanks for the mind challenge

comments: Nice game, im still playing but it should be an easier way (for ppl that dont want to spend real life money on these games) to get diamonds. Cost for outfits/shoes/jewlery are extremely high 189 diamonds for a dress i mean come on. Only can watch one video to earn 1 diamond thats disappointing. I'll give 5 stars if getting diamonds gets easier or mini games to get diamonds would be great.

I Love this game but recently it has disappointed me. To move on to the next task I have to buy an expensive house which I can't afford (Hollywood mansion). I can't even buy the coins to afford it because the coins are so expensive too. There is no way of getting around it, I have tried making movies and moving up levels but I am always stuck with the same problem. I can't even skip the task! I am on the verge of rage quitting this game.

This is the best game I have ever played. This must be the world's NO. 1 game. Please make lessen the amount of money that you have for the London Mansion. Please add more stories as I have finished all the stories (except the London Mansion). The last thing is that this game should have more updates as in my IPad there is a new version of this game. Thank you.

I really do love it, but 95% of the clothing requires a ton of diamonds that are very rare and difficult to earn but when you do receive them you only get a couple. Also, it's very frustrating that searching for random objects consumes your energy. Please, PLEASE fix those.

I would give it 5 steers but every time I try to go into a Beverly hills store my game crashes and I have to close the game and I try again and it keeps happening also the losing is slow. If you fix this I will give it 5. Thanks.

This game is toooo Goooooood. But the dresses are very costly, no new hair styles, in spin wheel i never got 500 or 1000 diamonds, also i want to have this character a baby. Please reduce the prize of the dressed. Also London is nothing in front of a Hollywood mansion

comments: Works good on my Sony Xperia XZs. Only problem is if I'm doing an impoppable track and I'm using Monkey Engineers. On those few levels where a mass of regeneration bloons come in, the game lags like hell. My workaround for that has been to be lame and just get sun gods

Bloons TDs have always been a favorite of mine. But I'm only giving 3 stars because of a technical issue that's mind boggling. I'm on a galaxy note 8, and I start to experience game halting slowdown on level 79. I had played this game on my note 4, and could easily double that before the hardware struggled. Please please fix it

I love this game. It works great on my phone.  My only problem is that I had to reinstall it and I don't know how to get everything back. If you could help that would be great. Also to be totally honest, I'm pretty sure I didn't save it to the cloud or my Facebook account.

Extemely good game for pretty much any age or level of play. Easy to get into and there's enough depth of game that it will take a lot of playing to get bored. Also works well on any platform - I have it on my ipad and Samsung phone. :)

I love this game only problem is I broke my phone and had to get a new one. Trying to figure out how to get everything back. I have purchased alot of things. $31000 and now only have $100. Logged in with my Facebook account still nothing. Help!!!! Please so I can get back to enjoying this game!

Too many bugs. In Co op, you can't send money to anyone if anything is under the menu that comes out to give money and the menu covers a good 30% of your side to do so. Also it doesn't let you play towers close to the outside edge in Co op even though you can in single player. And it is SOOOO stupid after every round, it cancels towers you are trying to place. That makes me mad especially since you can't talk to your team mates during a match to tell them to wait so I can place a tower.
description: Five-star tower defense with unrivaled depth and replayability.Build awesome towers, choose your favorite upgrades, hire cool Special Agents, and pop every last invading Bloon in the best ever version of the most popular tower defense series in history.Bloons TD 5 delivers hours of fun and challenging play to fans and new players alike, with awesome features like this:- 21 powerful towers with Activated Abilities and 2 upgrade paths- 50+ Tracks- Two-player co-operative play on custom co-op tracks- 10 Special Agents- 10 Special Missions- 250+ Random Missions- New Bloon enemies - tougher Camos, Regrower Bloons, and the fearsome ZOMG- 3 different game modes- Freeplay mode after mastering a track- 3 difficulty settings and family-friendly theme so anyone can playAnd that's just the beginning - regular updates will keep Bloons TD 5 fresh, fun, and challenging for many months to come. Now it's time to pop some Bloons!Note on Permissions: Bloons TD 5 requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage so that you have the option to interact with rewarded video ads that earn free Monkey Money. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.
descriptionHTML:
Five-star tower defense with unrivaled depth and replayability.

Build awesome towers, choose your favorite upgrades, hire cool Special Agents, and pop every last invading Bloon in the best ever version of the most popular tower defense series in history.

Bloons TD 5 delivers hours of fun and challenging play to fans and new players alike, with awesome features like this:

- 21 powerful towers with Activated Abilities and 2 upgrade paths
- 50+ Tracks
- Two-player co-operative play on custom co-op tracks
- 10 Special Agents
- 10 Special Missions
- 250+ Random Missions
- New Bloon enemies - tougher Camos, Regrower Bloons, and the fearsome ZOMG
- 3 different game modes
- Freeplay mode after mastering a track
- 3 difficulty settings and family-friendly theme so anyone can play

And that's just the beginning - regular updates will keep Bloons TD 5 fresh, fun, and challenging for many months to come. Now it's time to pop some Bloons!

Note on Permissions: Bloons TD 5 requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage so that you have the option to interact with rewarded video ads that earn free Monkey Money. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.

title: Bloons TD 5

comments: I think it is a great game and great concept. Then in the stories characters would send pictures and videos. Great except you have to pay to see them. Not pay and boom you see stuff permanently, but its a weekly, monthly, or yearly thing like its a PlayStation plus account. There are ways of making money without doing this, its called advertisements. Yea they are annoying but they work. I would rather deal with ads and experience the full game then have the game be free but I have to pay for parts locked behind a pay wall. Aside from that the game is great.

Well the reason I put a zero on the graphics was bc I didn't get to see them.üò¢ I just wanted to let you know that I want to request a update on the game maybe just like let people see the video chats and not the pictures. It was really hard knowing what it was talking about. Overall I like it!üòÄ

I love these stories because they're  breathe taking, mysterious, juicy, horrifying, gruesome and just amazing. I find clifhanger inspiring because it gives me bazaar ideas for when I want to write a horra story. However, I don't like the idea of paying because when I first downloaded this app I read the first story and while I was reading the story a blurred picture appeared so I was so excited but when I went to click on it, it said I hat to pay which was quite disappointing but other then that I feel like this app was a realy good idea I feel like it was well made well organised and well planned

I understand this would be good entertainment for some, but honestly the set up you have is bad. having to pay multiple time to see a video or anything that is added as an extra is bad enough, having wait time are worse. On top of all of it the stories are lack luster. Please fix it.
I love the app it's amazing. I advise u to download it but pls put ads bc u have to wait 14 mins I mean I'd rather watch ads than wait 14mins it just makes me angry.

Love the whole concept, great how the phone actually rings like someone is calling you. Sadly this main novelty is hidden behind a subscription wall. Advertisements I can deal with but a subscription I point blank refuse.

comments: Great game over time, fast paced so you should have the best device and connection, the game provides most features others don't.. its almost perfect, spend most money and you will be at the top rank, the game is mostly fighting, nothing else.. just fight fight and fight. After the server merge recently, the game usually gives yellow ping.. so.. thats just about it.

Excellent Mmorpg. Definitely best of its kind. Not to big of a dowload. It is only about half a gigabyte. Very complex upgrading systems compared to most. Enjoy many story line quests. Many other missions. Mount system. Many martial arts. Pets. Marraige system. Guilds. Many shops. Nice vanaties. Multiple classes. Definitely a must download. Best of all progression may take time but does not require top up.  Edit: please fix keyboard. Barely works since update.

After latest update it will not install update, comes up wiith ERROR, forums are also offline as well cannot access them anymore. I miss playing this game and now it just wont install the update. and yes my device is now FULL and the last time it update it deleted old info to make more space, Ive already uninstalled 8 different apps to make room and it STILL wont install

I play Sword of Shadows and this game was recommended to me by Google play. Well. I downloaded it and now i cant even play it. It comes up with an updater error code 121 and wont even try to load. Please fix this as im sure this is a great gane and i would relish the opportunity to play it!!
I like this game, but 1 of my character stuck with current quest. Its because when I took the quest I dont know that my inventory is full. So lost my quest item. Can you help me with this problem?

descriptionHTML:
The New update for Age of Wushu Dynasty is finally coming to Android platform! Be prepared for the challenge from the legendary faction, Murong Manor. Test the skills of a true master in the new mode Survive In Impasse. Obtain hidden martial art scroll the Great Vajra Finger. Get in the adventure full of dice, sand, and gold. Learn the fourth internal skills, Indefinite Breath Skill! Are you ready to Overturn Heaven and earth?

"An awful lot of things just right!" – Pocket Gamer
"Best Mobile Game at E3” – OnRPG
"Excellent visuals and aesthetic martial arts!” – Touch Arcade
"Sure to be a gorgeous, action-packed game for all to enjoy!” – App Advice

Enter a Stylized World set in Ancient China

Explore a visually stunning virtual world filled with peaceful peach blossom orchards, bustling city streets, and scorched battlefields! With full 3D animations and PC-level graphics, Age of Wushu Dynasty transports heroes to Ming Dynasty China, with stylized era outfits and authentic environments modeled on real locations!

Struggle for Power with 7 Schools

Choose from seven Martial Arts Schools to join on the path to discover the power within! Each school offers unique opportunities in an deep character customization system – master the Taichi Sword as a noble Wudang hero, or rain ninja death from the shadows as the cunning Tangmen. Join a school, master the arts, and compete with opposing schools to discover your destiny!

Heart-pounding Revolutionary Combat

Become a true master of martial arts with Age of Wushu Dynasty’s revolutionary combat system. Go beyond simple hack ‘n slash mechanics with tactical real-time combat. Block incoming attacks, time your parry, and execute feints to break through defenses and defeat your opponent. Master unique skill sets to fight with blades, staffs, daggers, and bare hands! Ignite your Kungfu fire with powerful Rage attacks and destroy your adversaries!

Challenge Rivals in PvP

Who will be the ultimate champion of Jianghu? Enter a cut-throat world of ninja assassins and Kungfu heroes, as players battle it out in organized and open world PvP. Fight your way to the top in 1 on 1 Arena battles. Sneak behind enemy lines with Spycraft, and join together in Guilds to battle for supremacy in PvP Guild Raids!

==Connect==
Visit our official site to learn more about Age of Wushu Dynasty: http://aowd.snail.com/en/
Join the Age of Wushu Dynasty community and learn more on Facebook and our official Forum:
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ageofwushudynasty
Community Forum: http://aowdbbs.snail.com/en/

comments: It's an OK game with pretty complex party building mechanics. But, it also has terrible progression that almost pushes you to spend cash if you're not patient.    And the controls...  For a mobile game, the controls is not very responsive, sometimes I decided to drag a character to attack and the game decided to instead move the character forward and switches with the front unit, in a game where formation matters, this breaks the whole system, and so in order to prevent that, you'll have to drag it slowly, so it registers properly   The hit box is also pretty terrible, sometimes I decided to attack but then it didn't register because I didn't hit the right hit box.   Overall the game itself is not bad, but it has slow progression and getting the 5* (which is very necessary especially the raid class item) is very hard, definitely play this game if you are a very patient person.
Problems solved. Thank you
I give this a 5. I'm F2P and the ??

It's can be fun game(for a short)if you are not interested in the competitive aspect. If you want to be competitive you gotta spend a lot of real money because of prestige.Prestige xa give you additionnal stats to your unit.  You need to spend more than 800$ to have every stats bonus only avaible with prestige. You can gain a few prestige every year but they increase the prestige cap faster.  Pvp is boring, from bronze to silver all i had to do is put a tank on capture point to win. And now i have been losing 95% of all of my matches in gold( and i cant fall back i silver even if i only losses)  Guild arent interesting if you arent super powerfull as you do 0.1% of what a big player does.  It takes a long time to even be somewhat strong.  Pve is ok but really short if its the only thing you do.

This game can be spendy but even without buying anything, you can still advance quickly. There are known bugs but it is address very quickly. I definitely enjoy the gameplay and involvement of the whole community to grow your team.

Normally, I don't give freemium pay to win games 5 stars, but this one is different. Basically all the money options are crazily overpriced, but if you put the time in they give you tons of premium currency just for playing. I've been playing for awhile and it hasn't slowed down yet. I just wish they had a decently priced option because I'd like to support the developers, but there isn't really a good option, monetarily, to do that. Everything cheap is lackluster and anything worthwhile is expensive.    If you like tactics games this game can definitely holds your attention for awhile.

descriptionHTML:
Valiant Force, the highly-anticipated mobile strategy RPG (role-playing game), is finally here! Forming teams from over 200 unique heroes and 40 diverse jobs, players are tasked to explore the vast and dangerous world of Arathos to save its inhabitants from an awakening evil. Embark on an epic adventure in Valiant Force now!

KEY GAME FEATURES

☆ Turn-based strategy RPG
Test your strategic skills on the classic 3x6 grid battlefield. Move your heroes to the right positions, and trigger each hero's aura. Become a true master of tactical combat!

☆ 40+ specialized jobs, 200+ unique heroes
Valiant Force offers a variety of specialized jobs and heroes to choose from. Form your team and choose your paths!

☆ 500+ items to craft and collect
Power up your heroes with different rarities of equipment obtained from dungeon loot or crafted using materials. There are over 500 different items to collect!

☆ Epic boss events
Face off against the most terrifying boss monsters found in Valiant Force in special boss event dungeons. Awesome loot awaits!

☆ Build and upgrade your Garrison
Build your garrison to buff heroes, send them on expeditions, get more gold, gems, experience points, and much more. With limited land, choose your structures wisely!

☆ PVP Arena
Test you mantle and squad strength in the PVP arena! Climb up the rankings in the most intense strategy-based PVP system ever, and become a true tactician of the battlefield!

☆ Rune System
Strengthen your heroes using the grid-based Rune System. Mix and match the runes which will aid your hero during battles. Unique unlockable passive skills await!

☆ Guild System
Gather your friends and families to form guilds! Exclusive features and bonuses awaits all guild member, with more features in development.

☆ Audio masterpiece
Immerse in Valiant Force's music, composed by former Square Enix veteran, Mr Hitoshi Sakimoto and Basiscape.

☆ Visual masterpiece
Stunning 2D art drawn in-house at XII Braves, along with detailed 3D models

Coming soon:

- New heroes
- New items
- New maps
- New Conquest mode
... and more!

Connect with us on social media!

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ValiantForce/


Copyright © 2016 XII Braves and FunPlus. All Rights Reserved.

comments: I think this game has potential. The gameplay is fun and so far I enjoyed the pvp battle. I gave a 4 star because the game lacks variety in the early levels - I don't feel myself making any progress after playing for two hours. Also,  the game is pushing too hard to sell their ingame currency and bundles, reminds me of those cheaply made games with a sole purpose to scam your money.  Please create a better sales strategy because this game has more potential than that

I would have given it a 5 however the game will not connect to play unless it is via wifi. The game is great and it's fun to play. It's unfortunate that this game now has such a connect issue. I am a few days from uninstalling the game. Again, its a great game, adicting and plays beautifully...until this last update.
BAD CONNECTION ISSUES WITH LATEST PATCH. Pretty fun, but it's never able to find a game while on 4G. I have to connect to wifi (slower!) for matchmaking to work.
Pretty good. I am able to go pretty far without purchasing anything but I am sure money makes it easier.   Only complaint is there are no PVE missions. That would totally make this a 5 star game.

I might've given 4/5 stars for this game but i rate it lower due to game lack of honesty. 90 or 80 percent chance of success means 90 or 80 percent of failure. im fed up being failed upgrade despite 90 percent chance of success failed several times on highest tier ship which req lits of golds. ssounds like a rigged slot machine but too obvious
Three different options for the controls, including a "pro" option, but  no option for inverted y-axis. Clearly the developer has no idea what pro actually means.  Uninstalled as soon as I saw that.

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers.

Space beta testing:
Please be aware that the game is still in development and does not represent a final version. This is a beta release. Please take this into account when leaving comments and ratings.
The game is not complete, and many aspects of it remain to be completed and polished in the future. We ask you to keep this in mind with your comments and ratings. We’re working hard on Planet Commander Online so you can enjoy it!

About:
Have you always dreamed of spaceships and space combat space battles? Check out the first mobile online game with direct control of your own spaceship and space travel.

In Planet Commander manticore, you are the captain of a galaxy spaceship. You start with a small spaceship, but as your pilot character grows and develops, you will end up commanding huge battleships and super-heavy spaceships. Battle galaxy on fire online with real opponents in the multiplayer space wars game mode and develop your space fleet.

The galaxy on fire and space need a commander like you! Become a legend in a galaxy on fire! Let the spaceship battles begin!

Planet Commander’s online space battles features:
- 5 spacecraft interstellar spaceships classes (from light to super-heavy vehicles: frigates, destroyers, battleships, carriers, super heavy warships), each can carry a variety of equipment.
- More than 20 spaceships to choose from, entering combat with different tactics.
- Each space battleship can be fully customized and improved: Planet Commander features over 100 different armaments and modules. You can even add your own logo and repaint your ship!
- Eve online dreadnought spaceships ""like"" gameplay
- Beautiful homeworld locations: enter battles aboard spacecraft with your squad in space as well as within planetary atmospheres and space exploration!
- Awesome space game mobile 3D graphics!

Join Planet Commander’s game space battle community!
Online galaxy on fire space ships game:
https://www.facebook.com/planetcommander/

comments: Great gameIncredible game. But when you move up in lvls the cost of every detail is ludacris! I've played this game a month and spent good money on it.  I am not into waiting a half a day so I can gain a 5 min advantage, then turn around and do it again. Only this time, just wait longer! .... Or of course you could just spend be re $.... Awesome game... makers are greedy!

I'm not happy that I can only send 20 gold from my accounts to one of my accounts per day. I'd like to send more gold per day. Annoying 2 alliance war battle limit should be gotten rid of. It's annoying, expensive and takes a very long time to reach each level of the game. Overall, it's a good game to play but it can be improved

The last few days this game become completely useless and unplayable. The matchmaking has been tweaked to the point where I'm being attacked by significantly higher players, without even a possibility to retaliate! At the same time when I try to attack in quick match, the level of my opponents is being so high, that I have zero chances winning a simple attack.  I'm thinking about uninstalling this game permanently. When contacted, Zynga employee suggests to spend more money to upgrade my defenses. How is that for "humanly friendly" customer service? Horrible service.
After getting to HQ level 10 it just got so boring.  To be honest don't like the game play playing against other people either.  The play is slanted toward the attacker .  Deleted

It's quite unreasonable that the nuke is too close to other command items! So, please give me back a nuke, and 40000 fuels as well as 5000 metals for reviving robot and retraining tanks! Also put the nuke to other corners!

Game has a fun, friendly community of players. Load times kinda slow. Occational bugs and glitches. Usually following after updates. Overall though a fun game that has new features added frequently, keeping it interesting.
