comments: Lovely relaxing gam. I enjiuy it...so far. Now i'm at 115,  got the puzzle pieces to go to 116 but it's not taking me there,why? Is there not a next level? I am in the 3rd stage and i went to update the game as it keeps freezing, and now I'm back at 115! And if i read the reviews here i am not the only one that has this problem. And seems you guys don't care. I will defnitely rate this minus 1!!!! 28.12.2017

Submitted a report yesterday and you made out I was lying. I've submitted 2 reports since then with no reply.  When I pass a level my ticket count is not going up I'm now at the gate that is telling me I need a 100 tickets its pointless me going over other levels as the ticket has not increased. I was told to tell you when I'm at the gate, which I have done twice. Still ignored.  I really likes the game until this happened.

A fantastic match-3 game for all ages. Kudos to the creator of this game. How about coming out with a Rio 2: Match 3 Party? I'm not even close to the end on this one, if there is an end.  Just asking basically if it had been thought about. More levels are great too, with more birds. Love these critters. Thanks!!!

Haven't been able to play for 2 weeks. Submitted report after report and nothing has been done to fix the problem. Not very user friendly. Have full Wifi so that's not the problem. All my other games work great. No thanks. I shouldn't have to jump through hoops to play a game. Delete.

Love this cute and challenging game but with all of these types there should be an option to turn off auto hints.. Really annoying and I like to figure out the next move myself.. Same thing with the constant tutorial, match 3 isn't rocket science... Otherwise great job!!!

GREAT GAME, ADDICTIVE, LOVE IT!!!!!! HOWEVER, I have completed the first 2 locations, got the tickets that I need to proceed on the third location, but the game won't load the other levels... It keep saying i need atleast 77 tickets... I have 120 of them. I have uninstalled & reinstalled the game THREE TIMES but I am STILL stuck waiting. FIX THIS ASAP, PLEASE

descriptionHTML:
It’s Carnival time in Rio, and Blu is planning the most amazing party in all of Brazil! He invited all of his friends, including Jewel, Pedro and Nico. Everybody is expecting the fun to start at any minute, but Blu isn’t ready yet!

Help Blu get everything he needs to throw an awesome party by solving puzzles, collecting medals, and unlocking new locations and party favors. Play beautiful levels of Match 3 gameplay set across stunning Brazilian landscapes. Have fun with all of your favorite characters from the hit movies or play against your friends!

***PUZZLE PARADISE***
Match, crush and swipe your way through hundreds of levels set within glorious locations, like the Amazon Jungle, Rio City and Copacabana Beach, with new ones being added all the time!

***MEET YOUR NEW FEATHERY FRIENDS***
Collect all of your favorite characters from the Rio universe including Jewel, Nigel, Nico and others!

***PLAN THE BEST PARTY IN THE WORLD***
Progress by earning tickets and unlocking new levels! Upgrade your map with balloons, banners, confetti and a DJ Stage!

***POWER UP***
Unlock super abilities by collecting gold and unleashing the power of the birds! Each character has their own unique special abilities, so which one will you choose?

***PARTY WITH FRIENDS***
Login with Facebook to send and receive gifts to your friends! See their progression on the map and compete in tournaments to win prizes!


Rio: Match 3 Party is completely free to play, but has optional in-app purchases to make your gaming experience even more exciting. Time to get this party started!

comments: I enjoy this game. graphics are pretty good for mobile game. By lvl 30ish though its gets grindy and there are some quest where the quest items are so hard to get.   I just wish the skill and stat descriptions gave more detail. I had to dig through the forum and googls to find info (if any) of certain stat and skill effects. Overall fun game.

I dont know if it has PVP.. Im still starting to explore this.. so far, I like it.. It's just the skill is somehow hard to click as you need to click the list first.. It would be really great if it is displayed on the lower right around the map.. instead of attack tab, skill tab should be separated each specialty :)
This is the best RPG game for mobile! It worth downloading it. They only have minor bugs but take a long time to load the data when you start playing it for the first time. Still, I LOVE THIS GAME

Its ok but for anyone thats new to a rpg game will get lost because some important tutorials aren't included in the beginning that should be. Like stat distribution and how to enhance your skills. Fixing that will make the game a bit more user-friendly.
After last update my attack power is half it use to be. Why?? That sucks. I need a lot attack just to kill low level monster

I really like this game, I used to be an avid player of this company's game Avabel, but I found that game was a bit too restricted to a single path for a character, but the function of multiclassing and skill stacking in Toram was a much needed freedom, I enjoy it allot and hope the game continues to grow. And on a personal note I think it'd be awesome to one day see the addition of a friendship and marriage system to help improve the communication between players, Considered the friendship system that is currently used only reaches as far as friending people, and it can't be shared publicly unless stated by the player, but a marriage feature which would be accompanied by a public stats page for each player would be awesome, and having in this page a status for whether or not this character is married to another character, and if they are married would carry over the name of the person they are married to. I think this would further expand the reaches of how customizable a character can be in the game.

Hundreds of years ago, the ground was split by the cataclysm all of a sudden.

You will meet various people in this world, experience numerous adventures, and face the mysterious existences underworld...

comments: I'm honestly about to uninstall. I've been playing 3 days and it's making it impossible to complete the daily task. I can't even invite friends... Edit: it won't allow me to invite friends, I'm able to play one game a day unless I continuously buy more tokens...but with ads after every game, they get funding from them. I installed this game because the reviews were the best, but maybe it's just got a grudge against me!

I understand they are trying to make money off this app, but if you are going to charge someone 320 tickets to play 4 cards, the reward should be more than 70 tickets per win.  I mean, really?! Some people want to play bingo, but want something to work toward without being bored.  I played Bingo story and deleted it, because I had a lot of credits, but EVERY BOARD WAS THE SAME.  Also, the powerups in this game should be limited to what you have available, and not have to purchase because you are out of said power up.  It might make more people play if they are rewarded.  .  I mean the quests saying you will win 600 tickets if you complete the quest, but you're spending on the normal side 280+ tickets, really?  And no other options besides watching ad videos for free credits?  And I'm not saying to add a "download this app and run it for 3 tickets.  Reach level 300 for 40 tickets."  Rant over

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

comments: Love this game. Second time I've played it. At level 46 I unlocked the whistles, at level 90 I finished the first puzzle, at level 95, I got my first carousel, at level 100 I had unlocked everything except the puppies...still need red puppy, at level 101 I got my first ferris wheel, at level 105 I got the first swinging ride, at level 121 I unlocked tier 7 & at lvl 130 I finished 2nd puzzle. Only thing I hate is the adds popping up as I touch the board, so it goes to the game & I have to exit. Edit: third time playing. March 2018. So much has changed!!! Quests, boxes, keys & now my game is saved...had to start from scratch but wont lose it again!!!

I've run 2 other apps to get bonus coins both at almost 1k each and I never got my coins. I finished the tutorial like it said I had to but zero coins were given for it. U shouldn't offer free coins to run other apps if u aren't going to give the coins for it. Will probably give up and delete bc of it.  Tried to give it a 2nd chance and did the flash light purchase to get 2268 coins and never got my coins. Why offer free coins if u won't give the free coins?  I emailed like recommend and sent proof like requested and still nothing. I smell a lawsuit for false advertisement. My $4.99 spend on a flashlight is going to make me thousands. Thanks for not doing ur job.

Extreme amount of ad pop ups. Usually loses dollars and coins. Fun but with all the flaws its not worth it. I played so far and it started over out of nowhere. Can't load or anything. Waste of my time

It's is nearly impossible to play because of the amount of pop-ups. In one minute, I counted 15 pop-ups. Even if you aren't touching the screen, whilst waiting on coins, it jumps from advertisement to advertisement. A decent game ruined by pop-ups.

It has its moments. With the abundance of ads present and the fact that the game gives notifications for things you cant get and the forced instructions at times it is a okay game but pretty boring after a while.

I really enjoy this game..I  originally began playing to earn credits for another game but drifted past level 7,which was the required level I intended to complete and stop playing. Next thing I knew I was clicking away, determined to get the next cute "prize," down the centre aisle. I looked up to see I was at level 10! Geez! I knew I was hooked when I found myself looking at my coin balance..found it satisfactory...smiling...i forgot my original game...now that's an addictive game!! Lol! I blame the cute puppy dog prize that lured me with its overwhelming cuteness..

This is a fascinating game where you're a concubine battling it out with the thousands upon thousands of other concubines (players) vying for the emperor's affection. The YouTube ads are a bit misleading, and don't represent actual gameplay. Most of the game involves you getting an army of souls of historical  figures so you can fight other people's armies to continue the story  or get crucial items that will help level up your army. There's the option to slap/curse people, but most of the existing players apparently take this game WAY too seriously, and you can cause party wars and get disowned by your own party just by ÂÆÆÈ¨• ing easily offended people, which is pretty dumb since this game actively encourages you to do it. I've been told and reprimanded (?!?!?) to "play nice so everyone can have a good time," which defeats the purpose and entertainment of this game...? There's definitely many layers to this game, and a complete time-suck (usually takes me about 2-3 hours of daily gameplay to finish all the missions to get the daily rewards). Very entertaining (and would be more entertaining if most of the players had thicker skin and don't flip out and try to get you destroyed in the game just because their avatar looks bruised for like an hour after a slapping).
Ever sinve the latest update, my phone has been constantly overheated.

comments: Perty good Edit: We're in the middle of an event and the game won't load. Finally says down for maintenance. It would be nice to get a heads up on when that happens. Gonna put a hindrance on the event that's over on Friday. Do hope it's resolved soon. Still like the game tho, but would like it better if I can play.

Well a very basic game, as any other idle game. Has no real extra things that would wow you. Notifications less than a minute after closing the app (or simply pressing home) can get very annoying. As if I need a notification to tell me I closed the game.

Right.  First off, If you are not a fan of Idle games, then don't play. This is the epitome of an Idle game.   The Early game is pretty simple. Click, Collect, Make your way to Level 80. You have the option to buy gold, but I wouldn't bother.   Multiplyers come from a variety of Sources, and regular events give permanent boosts to the Main game.   Good to pick up and play for 10 minutes at different points of the day, Deep enough to just about keep my intrest beyond this.   Issues. Events: They keep adding new things to Events and not really following up on them. Betting hasn't been used in a while, Costumes are confusing, and the card collection in a previous event was a fairly obvious cash grab, requiring that upgrade the cards you have using gold.  Event's are often straight copy pastes of previous events, and will sometimes continue to reference previous events'  All in, pretty good.

Well guess they deleted my last post cause I complained that the game took up 1.8 gig till I uninstalled it and reinstalled it then lost my saves because of bad programming.   Don't waste your time or money on this company.

One of the best "tap" games. Love the satirical theme. Who would have thought that politics and money were SO interconnectedüòÅ. Just to be clear to some, I AM being sarcastic!!!! Great time waster. And that's NOT fake news.

They put so many buttons to purchase things ion the main screen. When tapping as is the nature of the game, it brings up confirmation for your purchases. If you're trying to play fast, you could easily spend $20 in mere seconds without noticing. Put all the purchases in one place instead of cheating players.
description: Build the best democracy that money can buy in this innovative political idle game! Enlist the help of lobbies in order to raise money for your political campaigns. However, lobbies won‚Äôt be enough to get you to the top by themselves. Recruit staffers to help generate revenue and woo endorsements from top politicians for unique and powerful bonuses.Tap your way from a lowly campaign volunteer up to the highest office in the land!KEY FEATURES:*Political Tapping Fun - With tons of way to earn money and rise to new and more powerful offices, how you go about doing it is up to you. Do you concentrate on tapping for cash, pay staffers to do it for you, or focus on powerful political lobbies to passively generate money while you‚Äôre offline?*Deep Strategy - Deciding which party to run for or which lobbies to invest in is just the tip of the iceberg. Retire from your campaigns in order to score coveted political capital that you can spend on endorsements from powerful party leaders.*Tons of Content - Unlock dozens of powerful upgrades that open up even more possibilities to play the game any way you want. Love achievements? There are oodles of trophies just waiting to be collected!Please Note: Pocket Politics is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
descriptionHTML:
Build the best democracy that money can buy in this innovative political idle game!

Enlist the help of lobbies in order to raise money for your political campaigns. However, lobbies won’t be enough to get you to the top by themselves. Recruit staffers to help generate revenue and woo endorsements from top politicians for unique and powerful bonuses.Tap your way from a lowly campaign volunteer up to the highest office in the land!

KEY FEATURES:

*Political Tapping Fun - With tons of way to earn money and rise to new and more powerful offices, how you go about doing it is up to you. Do you concentrate on tapping for cash, pay staffers to do it for you, or focus on powerful political lobbies to passively generate money while you’re offline?

*Deep Strategy - Deciding which party to run for or which lobbies to invest in is just the tip of the iceberg. Retire from your campaigns in order to score coveted political capital that you can spend on endorsements from powerful party leaders.

*Tons of Content - Unlock dozens of powerful upgrades that open up even more possibilities to play the game any way you want. Love achievements? There are oodles of trophies just waiting to be collected!

Please Note: Pocket Politics is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

comments: Took me a very long time, but I beat this game and absolutely loved it! I can't wait for the next chapter!  Please keep updating and adding new things! My only suggestion is maybe if someone takes the time to watch an ad for a lavastone maybe give them 2 or something those ads are long lol

I do really like this game. But I have to admit I do not think it is as good as the other virtual villager games. Looks fantastic but it's missing the schools and other things. I miss being able to get a master doctor. I also think compared to the other games. The tech points are harder to get and it's not as fun or exciting upgrading in this game as it was with the other games.. I still enjoy it but I just feel like it's missing something.

I love this series. One thing I would like to say is things should happen at a set time or after you finish something. I still have 4 puzzles that I am no closer to finishing then I was a week ago. But these games are fun and are a great way to pass the time. I actually play it on my laptop so it's a little easier for me.

I love the game so much! I have played every other virtual villagers game and I love all of them; they are the best games ever. It's really challenging to get items that you need so you can complete a puzzle. It took me forever to finish chapter 1, but I finally finished 3 months ago, so now I'm waiting for chapter 2. It's really fun. Although it took forever to get the box to decorate the tree and to get the crab, but they were not as difficult as trying to get the pan to pan the gold because I couldn't see where it's location was and I looked everywhere, but I ended up finding it. Then there was the problem with trying to get the gold, becase the pan disappeared after getting the first gold. It was difficult to find the location to get the other two gold nuggets because I couldn't tap the area to find it, I could only find it by dropping a villager on it ( again I don't know where the location is) to get the gold. But I ended up finding them and in a way it was actually pretty fun for me to try and get the gold because it was challenging, but it did take forever. All'in'all it's a really good game; I just suggest (for the sake of other players) to make it possible to find the pan and the location to get the gold. I still love the game and I can't wait for chapter 2, and I hope for more in the future, you guys are the best so keep up the good work.  Thanks for the great game.

Game has no instructions, no way of knowing what needs to be crafted etc,  huts can only be built when technology is learnt, and then no huts are used? Etc love shack and crafting... there are certain things you CANT pick up despite being told you can... no way of lighting the fire, no way of mixing herbs without water, but you have water in the craft hut?   No way of catching butterflies... i relised a giant octopus that sits and dose nothing..lolol crazy game massive improvements needed hence the 3 stars...

I really  like  this game and all the villager games, also virtual families  2. I'm  disappointed  that  I  had to start over because of an upgrade issue that was not fixed. I lost all my progress. Luckily  I didn't  lose the heron and lemur that I paid for. Customer services  could use improvement .
description: ** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! ** Return to the famed and mystical island of Isola and be drawn into the latest sequel in the beloved Virtual Villagers series! In the wake of a volcanic terror on the neighboring island of Asura, a family has made their way to Isola, seeking a new home. As their boat lands on the beach, they are greeted by a strange man and begin to explore this mysterious new world. The beautiful and curious island of Isola was once a paradise home to a thriving civilization but has gone to ruin and untamed jungle. The twists and turns will leave you discovering new, interactive, magical moments at every turn! Here are some of the amazing features we can‚Äôt wait to share!! - Be the master of your own village: With real-time simulation, the ability to customize your villagers‚Äô names and game-changing, random island events, no two tribes will ever be quite the same!- Train villagers to become proficient at various skills to perform tasks around the island and survive their new-found world.- Explore the charmed island to solve all-new puzzles, and uncover mysterious island secrets.- Gather and combine resources from around your new virtual home to craft rare resources and unlock rewards from completed collections.- Breed, heal and care for your beloved village children and families; build a sustainable village up from ruins; unlock improved food sources with farming and fishing; craft unique resources for puzzles and collections; and so much more! - Power-up villagers with magical necklaces, and improve productivity, life expectancy and much more for your entire village with magical totems and potions!- Acquire homes for two unique island pets that will help weed out pests and discover magical items around the island. - Reincarnate cherished villagers with all their skills.- Earn daily rewards! Also available in the Last Day of Work franchise:- Virtual Villagers Series (Origins, A New Home, New Believers, Lost Children, Secret City and The Tree of Life) - Virtual Families 2 Series- Virtual Town- Fish Tycoon Series- Plant Tycoon- San Francisco Zoo
descriptionHTML:
** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! **

Return to the famed and mystical island of Isola and be drawn into the latest sequel in the beloved Virtual Villagers series! In the wake of a volcanic terror on the neighboring island of Asura, a family has made their way to Isola, seeking a new home. As their boat lands on the beach, they are greeted by a strange man and begin to explore this mysterious new world.

The beautiful and curious island of Isola was once a paradise home to a thriving civilization but has gone to ruin and untamed jungle. The twists and turns will leave you discovering new, interactive, magical moments at every turn!

Here are some of the amazing features we can’t wait to share!!

- Be the master of your own village: With real-time simulation, the ability to customize your villagers’ names and game-changing, random island events, no two tribes will ever be quite the same!
- Train villagers to become proficient at various skills to perform tasks around the island and survive their new-found world.
- Explore the charmed island to solve all-new puzzles, and uncover mysterious island secrets.
- Gather and combine resources from around your new virtual home to craft rare resources and unlock rewards from completed collections.
- Breed, heal and care for your beloved village children and families; build a sustainable village up from ruins; unlock improved food sources with farming and fishing; craft unique resources for puzzles and collections; and so much more!
- Power-up villagers with magical necklaces, and improve productivity, life expectancy and much more for your entire village with magical totems and potions!
- Acquire homes for two unique island pets that will help weed out pests and discover magical items around the island.
- Reincarnate cherished villagers with all their skills.
- Earn daily rewards!

Also available in the Last Day of Work franchise:
- Virtual Villagers Series (Origins, A New Home, New Believers, Lost Children, Secret City and The Tree of Life)
- Virtual Families 2 Series
- Virtual Town
- Fish Tycoon Series
- Plant Tycoon
- San Francisco Zoo

summary: Craft, build, farm, breed and solve puzzles in a village right in your pocket!

comments: I enjoy playing! Daily Quest could be better. (I don't get the daily magic wheel) But they have events to earn stuff. And I absolutely love my lil pets and their powers üòä and the ingame friends I have are helpful. edited: I completed a purchase and did not recieve anything like the quest said I would. Also developers never responded to my email regarding something else. I've spent $40 bucks on this game in the 1st few days I've been playing and I think I'll keep my lil money to myself now since they haven't fixed the issue.

Would give 5 stars but after you get to a certain level you have to spend real money to get farther. I have spend 65 dollars on this game so far and have been scammed so many times. Its a super fun game but so hard to get anywhere. You should be able to stock up shields. Also its stupid that you have to pay to talk. I might get the VIP if some things changed.

The problem I have is you haven't given the radio toy for the bear and also you can't unfreeze the guy because you don't give out the items to do it even after defeating the monster. You still can't get enough fire logs plus still no radio toy for the bear? Plus should give more coins it is a lot in higher levels

Losing some snowballs...... Would like to get more than six spins in one hour..... especially when there are large amounts needed to buy..... Mining pigs....really so much when we pay large amounts and our pay is so low.....

I helped my friend defeating leonardo.i used 10 bombs .but when i attacked leonardo .there was still 1 % left .so someone else had complited it.and now i went there to claim reward there was no reward for me.i have not claimed that reward. 2nd thing you have made puzzle number 9 so much rare not even me but everyone is not getting it. Please fix this.i will give 5 stars back.

Loved this game my planet gets distroyed everyday once I almost get it built. I played several times all day. Loved this game. I used to get angels but not any more. Been on same island for weeks. I love building my planet so fun. But not getting distroyed a minutes later. I've noticed alot of my friends stopped playing too due to same problem. üò•

descriptionHTML:
***Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers***

Piggy:" Lords and Ladies, one of your friends just attacked your island, you must commit revenge! Spin the wheel to earn more gold and shields!" --Invite your Facebook friends to join Piggy Boom!

Build your exclusive islands of your own with the help of little cute pets, push the button and spin the wheel, win some luck today!

Have fun with other players and steal their gold, protect your island from invasion with your pets

▶Features
• Magic Wheel
Every one loves having some luck in a game and Piggy Boom gives you free daily chances to spin the wheel and win heaps of coins!

• Theme islands
Every casual game players love to build and have a customized avatar!
In Piggy Boom, hundreds of themed islands wait for you to unlock them and build. The more you build, the more islands you will have


• Play with Friends
Invite your best friends and compete with global players. Are you under attack and want a revenge? Call your friends and attack together.

• Miner System
Be a miner and keep digging, a rich gold mine is waiting for you to explore in the game! Become the richest player in the game for a second.

• Cute Pets
Get your daily dose of cuteness with your adorable pets and protect your island together. Remember to feed your cute pet and level it up.

More features for you to find in Piggy Boom. Join us today and play with millions players all over the world!

NOTICE: Items are available for purchase in the game.

In process of the game, we may need permissions listed as below:
1. WRITE/READ EXTERNAL STORAGE
We use this permission to help players send their screenshots to us, in cases when bugs have occurred. This helps us locate where the problem is and solve it.
2. READ/RECEIVE/SEND SMS
We use this permission to verify the identities of users, retrieve accounts, guarantee the safety of accounts, and allow players to share the game to friends at the same time.
3. RECORD_AUDIO
We use this permission to allow players to audio chat in the game.
------------------------------------------
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyBoomApp/

comments: Fun, easy to play, complex to reach higher levels, this game has, so far, been great. No microtransactions (thus far) to continue playing, which is a huge plus. A few have stated a couple of bugs, which I agree with, adding only one other comment; I do wish their was an offline option for at least some gameplay. Online still necessary for a lot, but offline to run some dungeons. This could, in theory, help with some server space, as well.

This game is one of the best game I ever played in mobile. I love the graphic which is cute and there is so many content, so it's not boring. And another positive side, you can get the special currency easily in the game. It's not a p2w games ^^ but the sign board was one of the best micro transaction I've ever seen. Try it and you'll see.. it's a lot of fun ^^

I've been looking for a game like this for ages! I was a fan of Runestone Keeper and wanted something similar for my phone. These guys knocked it out of the park. I rarely spend money on phone games, but these guys deserve every penny and accolade coming their way. Fun and  simple, yet brilliant in execution and design. Tons of content already, and I can't wait to see what's next. Keep up the great work!

This game is so much fun! My only complaint is that the gear is gone when done with the maze, so you start it over. As well as "learning new titles". It gets kinda old having to start that over every time you beat a full maze. But that aside, this game is definitely addictive! Keep up the great work!

Your game is amazing. You guys are amazing. After everything you went through, you deserve these stars at the very least. Your game isn't pay to win, it's just a grand experience and I love it.  One of the BEST games on the market easily.  Keep up the good work, you're all doing fantastic.  Respect

I've been playing like nine months and it's very addictive you really grow and have many choices. It's truly free to play and gems are everywhere. Buying a signboard for real money is the best bang for your buck and a lizard if you feel like buying something else.  Totally recommend it. I only hate getting creator gumball is so expensive other than that it's a great game. It's a game that goes as fast or as slow as you feel like playing.

descriptionHTML:
Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)

DESCRIPTION
This is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.

FEATURES
● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements
● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...
● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.
● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...
● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly
● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the game

SUPPORT
Are you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.

Forums & Guide:
English: https://goo.gl/ecChhs

Wiki:
http://gdmaze.wikia.com

Terms of Service:
http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.html

It's necessary to use the below permissions:

RECORD_AUDIO
There is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.
The video below shows how it works in the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be

GET_ACCOUNTS
In order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.

comments: It's a fun game you can win a lot and sometimes you can lose a lot but you never know how it's going to end up. The game that I'm playing right now makes you feel like you're really lucky and sometimes you really are. That's what makes this site so good. I love the colors the details and the sounds. You don't have bells and whistles going off in your ear at the whole time and that's a nice change. I love playing slots and I think this is one of the best.

I hope you don't make the same mistake I did and download this app. All the five star reviews you read are in the first ten levels. That's when you win the most and have fun playing, after that you is the ture nature of this app. Terrible to say the least.

250 spins today at 100k each. Got one feature which paid 1m. Today was a good day its usually a higher ratio. There is absolutely no satisfaction in this app. No longevity. comments: Awesome game. just a few comments. you guys should have the stuff that's automatically generated (mining for example) running in the background even while the app is closed because otherwise you're just getting maybe 100 every now and then and you feel like you're getting nothing. would be nice for the money that comes every minute to also still run even while the app is off

Great idle game that you can play as much or as little as you want, even if you only have a few minutes. My only gripe is all the inactive guilds. Finding a guild with an active guild master is virtually impossible, and when the gm quits all guild upgrading is over. It's also frustrating that all the upgrades you earn for a guild stay with the guild so if your guild master comes back after 6 months and kicks you, you get to start from scratch with no bonuses.

This game is actually really good. Not as confusing as the picture shows. Lots to explore.   The only thing I would change for a 5 star it to not stop us from battling after 1 hour of playing.  Hypecrafter NX youtuber Sighing out.
I am not able to access the members list after the upgrade, please fix this problem. I have too many inactive players I have to kick out. Kindly fix this asap

great game, but one of the advertisements with a game in it caused my game to crash, and now i get nothing from watching the advertisements, I'd suppose because its still waiting for a reply from the advert. it was a casino advertisement with 3 buttons, and it led me to the top one. other than that, the app is good. definitely didn't expect an attack from the tribe of stretchy nipples.

i love the game but having issues with pick the "hero mini game bonus" i di click on correct character... nothing happens..please fix this because it's stuck in this mode... I'm not happy please fix this glitch

descriptionHTML:
It is a defense game to protect the castle from enemy attack.
If growth can be placed in the castle tower and the hero on each floor.
Archer of the town is becoming a lot more more powerful the more upgrades.

More than 120 heroes can use their own skills.
Some heroes are made to give a strong archers of the town, another hero is cursed enemy.
This strategy is important because only a hero can be mounted up to nine.

When you build colonies and hire workers, you can earn more gold.

Clear up to a higher level, wave and check out your rankings.
Create or join a online guild. You can communicate and play with people around the world.

※ Features
Online guild system
Real-time rankings
Hero promotion system
Addictive without reason
Build your own castle

comments: This game is a PLAY TO PLAY and I don't mean a few quid. There are people who spend thousands in the game. Even then the Developer does NOT reply to emails. The one above the have supplied to Google bounced back.  The one they advertise in game gets ignored. Take your money oh yes they sure WILL given the daily but this offers. NO SUPPORT REPORTING TO GOOGLE as support email is fake.

This game is wildly disproportionate.... There are players who spend thousands of dollars on in-app purchases and have insane amounts of power so they pick on the players who can't afford to do the same. The amount of resources required to upgrade technology and buildings becomes astronomical very quickly and mining for the resources needed is impossible due to the fact that the huge players hunt mines. Adding to this, every time your fleet gets hit on a mine or a base you lose 20% of that fleet, which costs you more resources to build it back up, compounding the impossibility to grow unless you spend insane amounts of money. If you don't have ridiculous amounts of money to waste on this game, don't bother downloading it.

The game is useless loaded with players with multiple accounts . And nothing but RACIST and FOUL LANGUAGE  players are berating players with bullying tactics not a game to play . Looking to maybe take the owner to court for not doing anything about stopping this illegal activity of sexual harassment ect.

The game developer keeps changing things so they can make more proffit it's not for the benefit of the players it's for the benefit for they can make more profit do not spend the money to start this game you're good so far along and then he'll change it on you or cost you more just to stay status quo

Lee, the developer, offers items via in-game advertising and frequently fails to deliver ALL of the content you were promised. Then when you complain, he purposely delays any response for 48 hours because that takes you outside of the Google Play store Return Policy...thus forcing you to either continue to not be responded to OR contest the entire transaction as fraud through your bank.  It's a shyte app with a greedy AF developer. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
You should be able to sell supplies for you choice in resources
description: The highly anticipated AAA title War of Warship is the latest in a series of free-to-play, historical online combat games to be added to the wargames portfolio. Command history's most iconic war vessels as you build your own massive naval fleet. Level up important tech modules and prepare to dominate the oceans!With four classes of ship, a myriad of upgrades and strategically designed environments, the action never ends. Every match is a unique experience. Hours of strategy, tactical gameplay and pulse-pounding combat await all who take the helm in War of Warships!= Features =Construction of naval base!All over the world can build a naval base, you also need to defend against enemy attacks.Naval construction!Build a powerful naval fleet, more than 20 kinds of types of warships.Form huge Alliances!Join players from around the world, make friends and become allies. There is strength in numbers, so you can work together and take on others in exciting campaign.World War!As you get stronger, you can wage war on other countries and occupied them.Research cutting edge technology!Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.
descriptionHTML:
The highly anticipated AAA title War of Warship is the latest in a series of free-to-play, historical online combat games to be added to the wargames portfolio. Command history's most iconic war vessels as you build your own massive naval fleet. Level up important tech modules and prepare to dominate the oceans!

With four classes of ship, a myriad of upgrades and strategically designed environments, the action never ends. Every match is a unique experience. Hours of strategy, tactical gameplay and pulse-pounding combat await all who take the helm in War of Warships!

= Features =

Construction of naval base!
All over the world can build a naval base, you also need to defend against enemy attacks.

Naval construction!
Build a powerful naval fleet, more than 20 kinds of types of warships.

Form huge Alliances!
Join players from around the world, make friends and become allies. There is strength in numbers, so you can work together and take on others in exciting campaign.

World War!
As you get stronger, you can wage war on other countries and occupied them.

Research cutting edge technology!
Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.
developerAddress: lijianhua3721@gmail.com
recentChanges: Version Changes:
1. Added City Scramble.
Occupy the cities and factories in the world to gain benefits for the Alliance.
2. Fixed some bugs and improved some functions.
summary: War of Warship:Pacific War is a naval strategy game
title: War of Warship:Pacific War

comments: It's enjoyable enough but the prices are an absolute joke. I usually spend quite a bit of money on apps, so I was all set to buy the premium package, expecting it to be between 2 and 4 quid a month. This is absolutely ridiculous - almost ¬£10 a month, as if the game isn't already dripping with ads. It's greedy.
The cost for extra packs is unbelievably expensive! I would not pay more than 10.00 TOTAL. Also every day you should get 3 hints and 2 hints for solving each game

One of the best free apps out there. Almost every puzzle seems overwhelming, but if you skip the ones you don't know, and solve the ones you do know, it starts filling in the blanks and most of the time you can solve the whole puzzle with no hints. Fun game!
Good game but over $20 per month is WAY beyond my budget. Too bad as I was hooked until I saw the price. Please contact me if you ever lower the cost to a reasonable amount. :(
This is one of the most   addictive games I've ever played!! Keeps me up for hours, even when I have an extremely hard time keeping my eyes open!  I could play 24/7, it's that much fun!!

Love this game! Would give it 5 stars if the paid piece wasn't subscription based and so expensive. 20 bucks per month is ridiculous, wish it was more affordable so I could support the developers. Once I finish the free section I will have to uninstall.

Travel across space and time as you unveil our planet's history and humanity‚Äôs accomplishments through themed puzzles in this challenging word game. Solve crosswords and explore beautiful sceneries, use your knowledge and skills in a one-of-a-kind word game, where every correct answer takes you closer to completing the puzzle and revealing the secret word! Highlights: - Explore beautifully designed worlds with hundreds of levels to play the best crosswords - Each world brings new themes and genres that will challenge the wisest of puzzle lovers- Have some fun while testing your knowledge with brain games- Innovative gameplay that brings a new twist to crossword puzzles- Test your language skills through these brain games- If you get stuck on a question in our word game, use the power-up to reveal a letter- Solve crosswords to train your brain - Sync your progress across all devices by connecting to Facebook- Solve crosswords and play different levels in offline mode if you don‚Äôt have internet connection (with limited features)- You can play tons of puzzles for free on adventure mode or subscribe for special packs in this word game.About subscription:- A subscription is offered within the app for enjoying special themed puzzles in your desired difficulty (hard, medium, easy and kids) with fresh new content every week.
descriptionHTML:
- Best of 2017 Google Play store
- A new crossword experience
- Challenge yourself with countless puzzles
- Relax while exploring thematic worlds
- Become a trivia master
- Word games reinvented
- Solve puzzles and have fun while you learn
- Enjoy this exclusive crossword gameplay
- Excel at brain games

Join CodyCross, a friendly alien that has crash-landed on Earth and counts on your help to learn about our planet! Travel across space and time as you unveil our planet's history and humanity’s accomplishments through themed puzzles in this challenging word game.
Solve crosswords and explore beautiful sceneries, use your knowledge and skills in a one-of-a-kind word game, where every correct answer takes you closer to completing the puzzle and revealing the secret word!
Highlights:
- Explore beautifully designed worlds with hundreds of levels to play the best crosswords
- Each world brings new themes and genres that will challenge the wisest of puzzle lovers
- Have some fun while testing your knowledge with brain games
- Innovative gameplay that brings a new twist to crossword puzzles
- Test your language skills through these brain games
- If you get stuck on a question in our word game, use the power-up to reveal a letter
- Solve crosswords to train your brain
- Sync your progress across all devices by connecting to Facebook
- Solve crosswords and play different levels in offline mode if you don’t have internet connection (with limited features)
- You can play tons of puzzles for free on adventure mode or subscribe for special packs in this word game.
About subscription:
- A subscription is offered within the app for enjoying special themed puzzles in your desired difficulty (hard, medium, easy and kids) with fresh new content every week.

description: War Storm: Clash of Heroes is a Global Strategy MMO mobile game. Players take control of the legion of heroes and a castle, a stronghold, a nation, and all its subjects. Summon brave heroes of war to your cause, hone their skills or magic in combat, send them to the frontier, and use their unique abilities to turn the tide of battle, watch the epic scene of clash of elites! Form alliances with other players, defend Alliance Strongholds and castles against your enemies and take your revenge with your ally by Rally Attacks, take the chance and wow the world! Become a royale king of civil age and clash off the invading demon legions, or those vicious warlord armies who surge into ally's city. Write your own epic story in chaos; let the glory of might shine in honor!-GAME FEATURES-‚óè Free Social Strategy MMO Mobile Game‚óè Innovative world map tactics! Take control of resources to expand your royale empire and position your forces in camps around the map to protect the kingdom in chaos!‚óè Complete Quests to win Heroes to your cause, or Summon them from beyond with Soul Shards recovered in the frontier of battle.‚óè Craft weapons & armor for your Heroes from rare hearth materials found around the world map.‚óè Form alliances with friends around the world to complete Alliance Quests, Send Aid to ally's nation, and Rally Attack your enemies!‚óè Seize, develop and defend an Alliance Stronghold with your allies.‚óè Sectioned World Map - growing your empire might give you access to new places!‚óè Build diverse legions of foot soldiers, archers, mages, catapults and more! Outsmart your enemies by outfitting the winning combinations in battle.‚óè Fight hellish monster legion under the leadership of Arch Demon. Become a powerful clasher and you might have to fight the Demon himself!Problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support via email: support@hourgames.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarStormCOH
descriptionHTML:
War Storm: Clash of Heroes is a Global Strategy MMO mobile game. Players take control of the legion of heroes and a castle, a stronghold, a nation, and all its subjects. Summon brave heroes of war to your cause, hone their skills or magic in combat, send them to the frontier, and use their unique abilities to turn the tide of battle, watch the epic scene of clash of elites! Form alliances with other players, defend Alliance Strongholds and castles against your enemies and take your revenge with your ally by Rally Attacks, take the chance and wow the world! Become a royale king of civil age and clash off the invading demon legions, or those vicious warlord armies who surge into ally's city. Write your own epic story in chaos; let the glory of might shine in honor!

-GAME FEATURES-

● Free Social Strategy MMO Mobile Game
● Innovative world map tactics! Take control of resources to expand your royale empire and position your forces in camps around the map to protect the kingdom in chaos!
● Complete Quests to win Heroes to your cause, or Summon them from beyond with Soul Shards recovered in the frontier of battle.
● Craft weapons & armor for your Heroes from rare hearth materials found around the world map.
● Form alliances with friends around the world to complete Alliance Quests, Send Aid to ally's nation, and Rally Attack your enemies!
● Seize, develop and defend an Alliance Stronghold with your allies.
● Sectioned World Map - growing your empire might give you access to new places!
● Build diverse legions of foot soldiers, archers, mages, catapults and more! Outsmart your enemies by outfitting the winning combinations in battle.
● Fight hellish monster legion under the leadership of Arch Demon. Become a powerful clasher and you might have to fight the Demon himself!

Problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support via email: support@hourgames.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarStormCOH
developerAddress: Rm. 19C, Lockhart Ctr., 301-307 Lockhart Rd., Wan Chai, Hong Kong
recentChanges: - Added new customer service system
- Fixed some exist bugs
- Optimized the display for part of the text
summary: Lead epic heroes to feel warlord clash with army, castle, and kingdom.
title: WarStorm: Clash of Heroes

comments: This looks nothing like advertised. After a certain level the additional research que is disabled and you're expected to buy it back. No explanations on some features, you have to figure it out by trial and error wasting resources. I'm at castle level 15, dragon level makes no difference so far only troop level does. Events are useless because the top spenders take everything before you can even find the location. Misleading descriptions in-game costing you resources. This is utter BS and far from anything tactical as advertised. Drains battery faster than any app/game I've ever encountered

Well not only do i get friend requests from people who haven't sent them I get endless Agatha messages about world tip bosses I can't fight bloody annoying tried in game customer services but the form won't  load!

Love this game love creativity love the dragons would also like to know how to upgrade the dragons though that is my only concern other than that this is a really supportive game nice community group easy power easy levels and I love it keep up the good work guys
It's a game that I want to keep. I think that they should fix somethings but it's a great game in my opinion.
A really addictive fast past game but it's still developing but it's still really fun.
Where is alliance farm !!! ?

descriptionHTML:
★★★Blood Tyrant——A Magical Strategy Game★★★

☆Battle for the Throne☆
Win the battle and showcase your best tactics. Blood Tyrant is an MMO game that lets you destroy enemy empires to defend your honor.

☆Free game: tactical multiplayer game☆
A thriving alliance system allows you to join an alliance, so you can protect and develop your troops. All alliance members will conquer the world side by side. This is a wise choice! This is an RTS game, all game tactics and decisions are made in real time. Compete with players from around the world; and do your utmost to become the most powerful king!

☆Establish and guard your empire☆
Attacking is important and so is development. In Blood Tyrant, you can establish a vast empire, upgrade all kinds of buildings, train troops and build traps. Will the enemy have the guts to declare war against you?

☆Stories and chapters☆
Enchanting stories and chapters, so you will know the world and have a sense of immersion!

★★Features of Blood Tyrant★★
☆Real time battles! You will fight with your enemies in a free and magical world!
☆Faster march speed. Get to the battlefield faster and participate in battles!
☆Speedup time! You will become the strongest faster!
☆An unprecedented Grand Alliance design. An alliance can unite with other alliances or join a Grand Alliance with alliance diplomats. Become the biggest alliance with flexible alliance tactics.
☆Expand your Grand alliance area in the World and conquer the bloody battlefield!
☆There will be lots of kings in the Blood Tyrant, but there will be only one true king. Will that be you?

title: Blood Tyrant

comments: I reckon this game is so good! I reckon it needs a test mode track so when you finish fixing the car fully to 100% you can test it. And probably alot more cars to fix, and also instead of having just one place where there are garages. You can go all over the world to different type of country's where there are different cars like Australia has commodores, Japan of skyline etc. Love this game so much ‚ù§ hope you take this into exception

Overall the game is exactly what you think it would be, a mobile version of car mechanic simulator 2018. That being said the rotate and zoom features of the camera can be a little irritating at times. It's also very hard to make money to get to your 4th level of tools when you can't completely repair the majority of cars that you get. It can be a little frustrating to purchase a car only to realize that you cannot completely restore it.

Great game and efforts of game generating team are appreciated. I wld suggest to add few things like  tires wheel rims tinted glass at extra cost and if used will pay more while selling. Also sometimes when we buy car from barn in some cases few parts could be made missing so that player wld need to search and then purchase new to add more fun. After u get all tools and all cards then it is boaring....

Trying to find a support link?? I have all tools yet wont give me a bonus.... Love the game. Camera can be a pain sometimes but you learn where to and where not to touch parts. Also why not have buyers or clients stop in... Finishing a car 100% and only making 2k after putting wok into the car Then 10k into parts... I would fire the guy selling cars... Just my two cents.

For the developers: this game is broken. I play on tablet Galaxi tab A   Start the game Remove battery Buy new battery Install new battery Cant tap the sell option Game freeze Nothing work Retart the game 5 times always the same

Nothing like the older apps like this. Camera control is hard, going from warehouse to parts catalogue constantly to remember bad parts to replace is a pain, then an add plays further impairing your memory. Disassembly  got way less interactive and so far I can't repair parts, just  purchase from a catalog.

comments: The game is good (played like 5 missions so far) but i feel like there should be a jump and crouch feature, even if its just a jump feature. Maybe make some levels where you gotta utilize the jumping, maybe throw in some jet packs during some missions/raids to get to a certain area to either continue the mission and/or find some hidden crates. Also, maybe add some melee weapons too?  Besides that, the game is fun, the graphics are beautiful, the gameplay could improve tho.

Its awesome. Running smooth with maxed graphics on s8+ and I had no problems while playing it for 10+ hours.  May be starting area could be expanded along with more multiplayer features and interactions. More unique missions between lvl 11 and 15. Also smaller package (5$) could be added. P.S crashes when collecting contract rewards ...Puzzles sucks. Avoid multiplayer and arena untill is fixed

This game has little bit inspiration from many big games like destiny (duh), titanfall, doom. The game does have similarities to dead trigger. All the random loot is cosmetic, guns are easily obtained through missions. Good performance on my S7, but need internet 24√ó7 to run, even during campaign.

The graphic is awesome.But the game sometimes crashes when entering the casino full of people. Also, add chat system in co-op modes. It's hard to make people understand the puzzles without a chat. Add jump,crouch. It will make the game more attractive and the things are also needed for a game like this. I love the game. Keep adding new things, just don't turn the game into mostly pay to play game.Thanks.

Literally the best mobile game I have ever played. All IAP so far is cosmetic, which is great. Very similar to destiny with it's own flavor. I do wish you we're able to jump though and shotguns in pvp are OP. Game is optimized well for my mid-grade device. However, it won't run on my gf's ZTE Grand X Max which is very unfortunate considering it's basically the same phone as mine. Hopefully this changes soon because we really looked forward to playing together. Download this game!!!

Giving the review after 24hrs of gameplay. Have to say that it's awesome. Cudos to the creators. Loving the gaming experience. Graphics rendering should be calibrated more. Make sure to do that in next update. Coins and slots are hard to obtain. Many of them don't want  to spend real money so better give some daily tasks to complete and earn coins.

descriptionHTML:
Download the best mobile RPG shooting game for free now!

Experience an epic story campaign, competitive and cooperative multiplayer, and an innovative social hub, all in one game!

In the futuristic world of Shadowgun Legends, humanity is under attack from a deadly alien invader. The last line of defence are the Shadowguns, legendary warriors and heroes. You are a young Shadowgun recruit with limitless potential who can turn the tide of war. So what are you waiting for? Join the fight and show the galaxy who’s boss!

GAME FEATURES

THRILLING STORY CAMPAIGN
Save humanity from an alien invader in an epic Story Campaign spanning over 200+ mission on 4 diverse planets

CO-OP MISSIONS AND RAIDS
Join forces with up to three friends and defeat giant enemy bosses for glory and legendary loot

REAL-TIME PLAYER VERSUS PLAYER TEAM BATTLES
Fight your rivals in unique multiplayer game modes and diverse PvP arenas

RPG ELEMENTS AND CUSTOMIZATION
Choose from over 200 unique weapons including Handguns, Assault Rifles, Sub-Machine Guns, Heavy Machine Guns, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles and Rocket Launchers. From plasma beams to good old-fashioned lead bullets.
Collect over 200 armor pieces and build your armor sets. Fortified juggernaut, sleek infiltrator or something else entirely? The choice is yours!
Make your Shadowgun stand out with 150+ cosmetic items
Pick your own skills and create your own playstyle - no classes, no restrictions!

INNOVATIVE SOCIAL FEATURES
Interact with other players, visit vendors, accept missions, party hard and much more in game’s persistent Hub
Chat with friends, create battle squads and form guilds

UNIQUE REWARD SYSTEM - FAME
Become a celebrity of the Shadowgun Universe
Get rewarded for how you play the game. Your every action is appreciated with our unique fame system. The more famous you are the more the world will react to your actions!

✔ Play the best RPG Shooting Game for FREE! Join the fight now!

Shadowgun Legends is a groundbreaking mobile game that blurs the lines between console and mobile gaming.

Dive into this free feature-packed FPS RPG and battle a terrifying alien menace, the Torment, who are rampaging across the Galaxy destroying everything in their path.

As a new Shadowgun recruit you will create your ultimate rockstar warrior with hundreds of weapons, dozens of combat skills, thousands of armor pieces, and a wild collection of cosmetic items and skins. As your fame grows you will indulge in the wild celebrity lifestyle of the most famous warriors in the Universe and carve your name into mankind’s history.

When you’re not mastering shooting skills you can unwind with your friends in the Shadowgun’s neighbourhood, where you’ll hang out with other players, hit the bar, chat, interact with NPCs and most importantly...party!

You can enjoy all this with MADFINGER Games’ renowned cutting edge visuals, intuitive controls and wicked sense of humor.

At MADFINGER Games we’ve always challenged ourselves to push the boundaries on mobile devices, and we’re proud of our console quality first person shooters. From our cutting edge graphics to our precise control system, over 180 million players worldwide have been blown away by our innovative approach and dedication to quality. Now we’re taking things to the next level. Shadowgun Legends is the ultimate persistent world shooter in the palm of your hand, a hardcore gaming experience that you can take with you anywhere.

comments: I feel inlove with the game the second I opened it! being a huge naruto fan I had high expectations! and most of them were met.  I have two issues! it's seems the only way to get hero fragments is through the shops which is only 10 at a time. or special attack missions which keep changing! makes it very hard to awaken shinobi.  also why only 8 chapters in story mode! You have a whole two anime to base off and we only get 8 chapters! how disappointing.

I am a little disappointed in the game right now. I saved up for the Jiriya banner which is supposed to have a higher drop rate, got one Jiriya card in a multi 10xs summon. I would like to know why that happened seeing as with every other banner I have ever pulled on had numerous cards for that shinobi, sometimes even the full kit minus an ult. I am not looking for an ultimate every time. But when I pull on a banner I would like the rate to actually be reasonable thank you very much.

Everything was working just fine until not long ago. All of a sudden, everytime I try to play any kind of mission on my android, a message will pop up saying, 'Due to an unknown error the game will return to the title screen'. It's been happening for over a week now, I've tried to reinstall but nothing works. Please fix.

4 days ago i was having a problem of playing missions. I couldnt start it because the screen showed "due to an unknown error the game is returning to the title screen". The issue was resolved yesterday and again today the same old stuff. Is this a joke going on with my account?

To BANDAI NAMCO... Just suggesting a few thought about this game. I've taken liken this game more than any other I played so far.  I just thought during the mission about the choosen characters. I think this game will be more stratigical if you can switch characters during the mission. It just doesn't make any sense if the main character you control died right away. Since in a story there's still a chance to turn the table on your side. Just like in Naruto series though their team captain may die the subordinates will carry their will and a chance to win. And in this game,  If the main character died the rest automatically dies though there's still a lot of spare life. Hope you call consider.  Just making suggestion. Your AWESOME making this game BANDAI NAMCO.

I really like this game, the only reason im giving it a 1 star. Is because I've tried to send them a message involving an issue but I cant seem to find the way to do it. In regards to the issue I hope they see this message and fix it, for some reason it wont let me do any missions. I have updated it and deleted the cache but the problem persist.

descriptionHTML:
The characters from TV animes BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN are finally united in NARUTO X BORUTO!

Create your very own fortress, then attack rival fortresses! Defend your base with strategic and deadly traps while you raid enemy bases with your friends for resources and honor!
Experience a brave new style of ninja battle:
a fusion of action and strategy!

--------------------------
■Game Overview
--------------------------

[Characters]
All your favorite characters are joining the battle, including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Kakashi Hatake, and Sakura Haruno from NARUTO SHIPPUDEN,
along with Boruto Uzumaki
from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

[Action]
Simple controls that let you perform blazing fast combo attacks and all types of Ninjutsu!
All the heroic action you expect from NARUTO and BORUTO, using beautiful graphics, including powerful Ninjutsu attacks such as Naruto Uzumaki's Rasengan, and Ninjutsu power-ups like Sasuke Uchiha's Sharingan!


[Strategy]
Position traps and the Shinobi that you've trained
to protect your village from other players' attacks, all while
creating your very own ultimate fortress!

[Battle Rankings]
Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses. Try to get the
highest ranking by competing with players from all over the country!

[Multi-Player]
Online multi-player missions also available!
Team up with a maximum of 4 players and defeat mighty enemies!

comments: Loved this on my iPad, so I'm glad I can put it on my phone now. However, when a puzzle requires a lightning bolt, multiple are taken instead of just 1.  I will be uninstalling once I run out.  It's a shame, I really loved doing these puzzles on my phone.

I just downloaded to my new tablet. I can not get the puzzles I had purchased on my old device, plus I get 20 plus  seconds of an ad before I can play. That didn't happen on the old one!  About to go find another app.
I like the app except the sound effects goes out a lot.
Love Magic puzzles, upgraded my phone and my tablet. Had issues getting it setup but with help from their support team both are working fine.
Don't like how pricy it is to buy the packages and think that there should at least be like 5 or something free puzzles cuz not everyone can make purchases but want to complete special puzzles aswell
I don't like that we have to pay for new puzzles come on now!

description: Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet‚Äôs Settings.
descriptionHTML:
Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!

Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.

Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!

However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.

- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.

- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.

- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.

- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!

- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.

Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Llacuna 166,
Planta 10
08018 Barcelona
Spain
recentChanges: Good news: Now you‚Äôll be able to purchase more tables! More tables mean more orders, and more orders mean a faster progress! Update now and see your restaurant grow.
summary: Manage it all from the farm to the kitchen to build your dream restaurant!
title: Tasty Town

comments: An absolutely wonderful game. Even better then Hearthstone if you ask me. It's so good that even I, Solaire of Astora who hails from Dark Souls, absolutely praises this game. 100% recommend. This only issue that one could run into is lag, but this is only due to the fact that I have an older phone. I'm sure that if you have a better phone, this game would be EVEN better. Praise the Sun \[T]/

Elder scrolls legends is a game with a elder scrolls taste and mechanics. Its choices, game modes and progress systems works perfect. It's story is great, and serve as a tutorial for the big part of the game. You can even unlock new dlc and decks through your progress in the game. This is truly a marvelous game. Problems like connection break occurs very rare and does not affect the game. If you like CCG and ELDER SCROLLS, then this game is highly recommended.

I'm a huge card player of all kinds and really didn't expect much of this game, but have loved all of the console ELDER SCROLLS so I gave it a try. Immediately hooked, and the best part is how well balanced the game is in terms of card power. I have made 4 decks of separate play styles with equal win rates. 5 stars for sure

Hands down one of the best card games I have ever played. The gameplay is simplistic yet emersive. The different combinations of cards and deck types you can build is vast allowing you to adapt to any challenge you may encounter. While the gameplay is phenomenal, it's very easy to gain an understanding of how to play and the cards themselves. Bethesda has yet again made a game that has captivated me. Well done üëç

The first three turns of the game has an incredibly small amount of finite moves.  You wouldn't know this because the typical player will take more than 30 seconds on their first, second, and third turns.  You start to realize that on "draft" games, you will benefit more if you concede the game when your opponent is taking an agonisingly long time on the first few turns because they're putting so much thought into the only play in their hand.

Week 1: *Going to try to make this an ongoing review*. Had to lower this to 4 stars overall, because you have to either pay or grind to access all of story mode. I'm gonna buy it, but I think it shouldn't cost more than $14.99. Just mho. PvP is fun and you actually play LIVE people, not an AI running someone's cards. Level rewards seem generous and worthwhile.  Runs a bit slow, but I know it's my phone and not the app's fault. Gameplay is very fluid and makes sense. I already like it FAR BETTER than Hearthstone.
description: The Elder Scrolls¬Æ: Legends‚Ñ¢ - Heroes of Skyrim"The first real challenge to the CCG throne." - ShacknewsBuilt for skill, not chance, The Elder Scrolls¬Æ: Legends‚Ñ¢ - Heroes of Skyrim is a strategy card game based on the world and lore of the award-winning Elder Scrolls series.Enter the world of Skyrim, full of formidable dragons and fan-favorite characters and heroes. Play for hours or minutes across many card battle game modes that are easy to learn but challenging to master.¬†Battle against opponents in challenging card games, and examine the arena to come up with a strategy that will end in your victory.Enjoy card collecting combined with intense multiplayer PVP card games. Collect cards and level up your existing deck heroes to take on even more challenging opponents. Can you survive the world of Skyrim?The Elder Scrolls¬Æ: Legends‚Ñ¢ - Heroes of Skyrim Features:PLAY RPG CARD GAMES ON YOUR OWN- Strategy card games ‚Äì Learn the best strategy for winning card battles in Story Mode.- Earn legendary heroes, Legends cards, decks, and packs when you play solo.- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle a series of computer opponents.ONLINE PVP AGAINST OTHER PLAYERS- Multiplayer games let you test your deck strength against friends.- Online PVP games ‚Äì Challenge online opponents in ranked play.- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle other players who have done the same.PICK YOUR CARD BATTLES- Expand strategy options with Legends gameplay, which features a divided battlefield with ‚Äúlanes.‚Äù- Card strategy ‚Äì Carefully place your cards in either lane to attack your opponent and their cards.- Strategy is key ‚Äì Make sure you‚Äôre prepared for whatever your opponent plays next.LEVEL UP BATTLE CARDS- Crafted battle ‚Äì Collect cards and tailor your deck to your play style.- Deck heroes and other cards can be upgraded by winning games against decks that contain the same card.- Level up battle cards to improve your decks and give yourself more flexibility.MONTHLY CCG UPDATES- Why play a strategy card game if It doesn‚Äôt change? Add a new card to your deck every month.- Trading card game constant updates to keep the meta-game fresh and interesting keeps the game fresh and competitive.Explore the world of Skyrim and battle challenging opponents in intense card games. Discover the best card game strategy, and add legendary heroes and fan-favorite characters to your battle decks in The Elder Scrolls¬Æ: Legends‚Ñ¢ - Heroes of Skyrim.Download now and play multiplayer card games.
descriptionHTML:
The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim

"The first real challenge to the CCG throne." - Shacknews

Built for skill, not chance, The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim is a strategy card game based on the world and lore of the award-winning Elder Scrolls series.

Enter the world of Skyrim, full of formidable dragons and fan-favorite characters and heroes. Play for hours or minutes across many card battle game modes that are easy to learn but challenging to master. Battle against opponents in challenging card games, and examine the arena to come up with a strategy that will end in your victory.

Enjoy card collecting combined with intense multiplayer PVP card games. Collect cards and level up your existing deck heroes to take on even more challenging opponents. Can you survive the world of Skyrim?

The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim Features:

PLAY RPG CARD GAMES ON YOUR OWN
- Strategy card games – Learn the best strategy for winning card battles in Story Mode.
- Earn legendary heroes, Legends cards, decks, and packs when you play solo.
- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle a series of computer opponents.

ONLINE PVP AGAINST OTHER PLAYERS
- Multiplayer games let you test your deck strength against friends.
- Online PVP games – Challenge online opponents in ranked play.
- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle other players who have done the same.

PICK YOUR CARD BATTLES
- Expand strategy options with Legends gameplay, which features a divided battlefield with “lanes.”
- Card strategy – Carefully place your cards in either lane to attack your opponent and their cards.
- Strategy is key – Make sure you’re prepared for whatever your opponent plays next.

LEVEL UP BATTLE CARDS
- Crafted battle – Collect cards and tailor your deck to your play style.
- Deck heroes and other cards can be upgraded by winning games against decks that contain the same card.
- Level up battle cards to improve your decks and give yourself more flexibility.

MONTHLY CCG UPDATES
- Why play a strategy card game if It doesn’t change? Add a new card to your deck every month.
- Trading card game constant updates to keep the meta-game fresh and interesting keeps the game fresh and competitive.

Explore the world of Skyrim and battle challenging opponents in intense card games. Discover the best card game strategy, and add legendary heroes and fan-favorite characters to your battle decks in The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim.

Download now and play multiplayer card games.
